MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「うぃす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝'Sup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝'Sup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つもの顔ぶれが朝食の場に揃う。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again, the usual suspects had gathered for breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again, the usual suspects had gathered for breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: は猫にミルクを与えている（恐らく新入りのレノンだ）。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was feeding her cat (probably the new one, Lennon).
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was feeding her cat (probably the new one, Lennon).

MESSAGE.JP: 介は新聞を読みながら、食べている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was reading a newspaper while eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was reading a newspaper while eating.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんか目を引く事件でもあったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Anything happen that catch your eye?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Anything happen that catch your eye?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…嫌な事件が世の中起こるもんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... Hideous incidents are going on all over the world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... Hideous incidents are going on all over the world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴、たまには新聞でも読んでみないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, why don't you try reading a newspaper once in a while?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, why don't you try reading a newspaper once in a while?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「猫の食事に集中しすぎていて、聞いてないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's so absorbed in what she's doing, she can't even hear you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's so absorbed in what she's doing, she can't even hear you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「漫画ばっか読んでるおまえが言える台詞か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is that something you, who reads nothing but manga, should really be saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is that something you, who reads nothing but manga, should really be saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、そういう俺も４コマ漫画目当てなんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, the manga strips are one of the reasons I'm reading it too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, the manga strips are one of the reasons I'm reading it too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 局そこなのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what it comes down to in the end...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what it comes down to in the end...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お、面白いじゃないか。当たりだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, isn't this interesting? That's awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, isn't this interesting? That's awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、最近まで図書室に新聞を読みに通っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been frequenting the library to read newspapers myself, until recently.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been frequenting the library to read newspapers myself, until recently.

MESSAGE.JP: も…恭介の言うとおり、世の中嫌な事件ばかりで暗い気分になるから、ある報道を境にやめてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: But... it's just as Kyousuke says. Nothing but hideous accidents happen in the world, and reading about them was depressing. That's why I stopped after a certain incident.
MESSAGE.Translation: But... it's just as Kyousuke says. Nothing but hideous accidents happen in the world, and reading about them was depressing. That's why I stopped after a certain incident.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…４コマが当たりだったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Aah... That manga strip was great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Aah... That manga strip was great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ、そ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、最近まで図書室に新聞を読みに通っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been frequenting the library to read newspapers myself, until recently.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been frequenting the library to read newspapers myself, until recently.

MESSAGE.JP: も…ある報道を境にやめてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I stopped after a certain incident.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I stopped after a certain incident.

MESSAGE.JP: が携帯を取り出して、ちまちまとメールを打ち始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin took out her cellphone and started typing a message.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin took out her cellphone and started typing a message.

MESSAGE.JP: がてポケットの中の僕の携帯が震える。
MESSAGE.EN: Not long after that I felt a vibration coming from the cellphone in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not long after that I felt a vibration coming from the cellphone in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: り出して開いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took it out and opened it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took it out and opened it.

MESSAGE.JP: 休みじかんいもむしみてくる』
MESSAGE.EN: [I'm going to see what this caterpillar thing's about during the break.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I'm going to see what this caterpillar thing's about during the break.]

MESSAGE.JP: 日の手紙の件だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must be referring to that letter from yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must be referring to that letter from yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: 気を付けて』
MESSAGE.EN: [Be careful.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Be careful.]

MESSAGE.JP: れだけを打って返す。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all I typed in reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all I typed in reply.

MESSAGE.JP: は僕を見て、こくんと頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked at me and nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked at me and nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、みんなに隠してるわけじゃないんだから、口に出して言えばいいのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, since when was this a secret? It'd be better to just say it out loud instead...
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, since when was this a secret? It'd be better to just say it out loud instead...

MESSAGE.JP: 緒にしておきたいのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she planning to keep everyone else in the dark?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she planning to keep everyone else in the dark?

MESSAGE.JP: 々と食べ続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: We kept eating without breaking the silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kept eating without breaking the silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Fuh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Fuh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さて、腹もこなれたし、そろそろ謙吾と戦うか、なっ、理樹っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now then, since you've already finished stuffing yourself, isn't it about time you fought Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now then, since you've already finished stuffing yourself, isn't it about time you fought Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、しないって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の教室。
MESSAGE.EN: The classroom in the morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classroom in the morning.

MESSAGE.JP: Ｒも終わり、ぼーっとしていると、不意に教室のドアが開く音。
MESSAGE.EN: Homeroom was over, and I was just idling around, when suddenly I heard the door open.
MESSAGE.Translation: Homeroom was over, and I was just idling around, when suddenly I heard the door open.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やー、おはよう、おはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ya～, morning, morning～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ya～, morning, morning～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つものように、三枝さんはクラスメイトたちの間を泳ぐようにやってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: As always, Saigusa-san came in, making her way through my classmates.
MESSAGE.Translation: As always, Saigusa-san came in, making her way through my classmates.

MESSAGE.JP: っすぐ僕の机のところを目指してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was coming right toward my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was coming right toward my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「理樹くんおはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, morning～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun, morning～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「真人くんもはよーすっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Masato-kun, g'morning to you, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Masato-kun, g'morning to you, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おぅ、おはよう、っておまえなんで来んだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, morning... wait, why are you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, morning... wait, why are you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「一限はお休みなのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I don't have first period.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I don't have first period.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、教科担任の先生、休みなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, is your homeroom teacher on leave?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, is your homeroom teacher on leave?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んーん。違うよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Nope, he isn't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Nope, he isn't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは小首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san tilted her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san tilted her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、なんで休みなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, why are you on break?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, why are you on break?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んー、つまりなんだ、ぶっちゃけ、自主休講？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hm... to put it simply, I cancelled the class independently?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hm... to put it simply, I cancelled the class independently?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それ、サボってるだけだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's just truancy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's just truancy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そうとも言うねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, you could put it that way too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, you could put it that way too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうとしか言わないよっ！　まったくもう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't even try to put it any other way! Seriously...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't even try to put it any other way! Seriously...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「相変わらず成績のことを考えない恐ろしい女だぜ、三枝…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝She doesn't give her grades the slightest thought, as always... What a frightful girl, that Saigusa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝She doesn't give her grades the slightest thought, as always... What a frightful girl, that Saigusa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「井ノ原並みだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝She's on Inohara's level, no less...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝She's on Inohara's level, no less...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かれる言葉に三枝さんは嬉しそうに顔をほころばせた。
MESSAGE.EN: A broad smile spread across Saigusa-san's face in reaction to the murmuring around her.
MESSAGE.Translation: A broad smile spread across Saigusa-san's face in reaction to the murmuring around her.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あ、私、誉められた？　誉められた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, are they praising me? Are they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, are they praising me? Are they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まじかよ、へ、照れるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you serious? Eh, how flattering...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you serious? Eh, how flattering...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいやいや…ふたりともおかしいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way, no way, you two are just being ridiculous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way, no way, you two are just being ridiculous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ちぇ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Che～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Che～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちぇ～、じゃないってば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't ❛che～❜ me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't ❛che～❜ me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は呆れながら苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I was forced to smile out of astonishment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was forced to smile out of astonishment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで、今日は何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what's the matter today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what's the matter today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うむ、よくぞ訊いてくれました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Right, I'm glad you asked.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Right, I'm glad you asked.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはなぜか胸を張った。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason she puffed out her chest while saying this.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason she puffed out her chest while saying this.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「実はね、今朝のここの様子はどうかな～、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Actually, I was wondering how things were going here this morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Actually, I was wondering how things were going here this morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、今朝の様子…って、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: と真人を見るとしかめ面している。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly, Masato's face distorted into a grimace.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly, Masato's face distorted into a grimace.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まさか、三枝…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't tell me, Saigusa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't tell me, Saigusa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「扉に黒板消しをゴムひも使ってくくった挙げ句、水が入ったバケツを床に幾つも置いたのはおまえかっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tying a blackboard eraser above the entrance with a string and placing a number of buckets filled with water on the floor, that was all your doing!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tying a blackboard eraser above the entrance with a string and placing a number of buckets filled with water on the floor, that was all your doing!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「イヤーそのー、ナンダ？　ワタシじゃないですヨ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Uh-oh, what might you be talking about? It wasn't me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Uh-oh, what might you be talking about? It wasn't me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだその棒読みはっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's with that hollow voice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's with that hollow voice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえのせいでな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's your fault that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's your fault that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まさか、真人…それに引っかかっちゃったの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato... could it be, you triggered it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato... could it be, you triggered it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いや、オレは濡れ衣を着せられただけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I was just falsely accused of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I was just falsely accused of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It was you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It was you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「あのような下らぬ真似を…剣道着を朝から洗濯する羽目になっただろうがっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Thanks to that worthless joke of yours, I ended up having to wash my kendo uniform in the morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Thanks to that worthless joke of yours, I ended up having to wash my kendo uniform in the morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うわ、謙吾くん、珍しい格好してるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Uwah, Kengo-kun, so unusual to see you dressed like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Uwah, Kengo-kun, so unusual to see you dressed like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ…おまえのおかげでこんな様だ…なんだこの格好は。わけがわからん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... It's all thanks to you that I look this way now... What's with this outfit? It just doesn't make sense...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... It's all thanks to you that I look this way now... What's with this outfit? It just doesn't make sense...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、授業は制服で受けるほうが正しいから謙吾のほうがわけわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, actually it's more correct to wear your school uniform during class, so Kengo, you're the one who doesn't make sense...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, actually it's more correct to wear your school uniform during class, so Kengo, you're the one who doesn't make sense...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おかげで朝からオレも一緒に洗濯させられたんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thanks to you, I was forced to help with the laundry first thing in the morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thanks to you, I was forced to help with the laundry first thing in the morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「腹立ってきたから、洗剤頭からぶっかけてやったけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I was getting ticked off, so I poured detergent over his face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I was getting ticked off, so I poured detergent over his face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そのせいでジャージまで洗う羽目になったんだろうがっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Thanks to that we had to wash my jersey too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Thanks to that we had to wash my jersey too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わ…そこまで制服着るの嫌なんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Whoa... Does he hate wearing the school uniform that much...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoa... Does he hate wearing the school uniform that much...?

MESSAGE.JP: のふたりに詰め寄られる三枝さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san was drawing closer to the two.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san was drawing closer to the two.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「実は昨日の放課後、仕掛けの実験をしようと思って設置したんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝To be honest, I tried setting up this trap yesterday after school, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝To be honest, I tried setting up this trap yesterday after school, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だけど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はなんとなく続きが予想できた。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, I could already anticipate the rest of the story.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, I could already anticipate the rest of the story.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「…誰も来ないから飽きちゃってさ～。放置して帰っちゃったのですヨ、コレが。あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...No one was coming, so I gave up～. I just left it there and went home, ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...No one was coming, so I gave up～. I just left it there and went home, ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「『帰っちゃったのですヨ』じゃねーよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The heck you just ❛went home❜!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The heck you just ❛went home❜!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「というわけで、ひっかかったヒト、居るかなーって確認を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That's why, I came here to confirm whether anyone had set it off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That's why, I came here to confirm whether anyone had set it off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「見ろ、この無様な姿を、どうだ、そんなに滑稽か、楽しいかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Look at this unsightly form, is it to your liking? Do I look funny enough? Are you happy now!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Look at this unsightly form, is it to your liking? Do I look funny enough? Are you happy now!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とても毅然としてるけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you have a very dignified look...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you have a very dignified look...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「なんだぁ、冷たいぞー、ガイズーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What's wrong with you? You're so cold, guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What's wrong with you? You're so cold, guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「冷たいのはバケツに足突っ込んだこっちだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The one who felt cold was me, after crashing into the bucket.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The one who felt cold was me, after crashing into the bucket.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やはは、これが本当のクールガイ。良かったねー、謙吾くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yahaha, that's a ❛cool guy❜ indeed. I'm glad for you, Kengo-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yahaha, that's a ❛cool guy❜ indeed. I'm glad for you, Kengo-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「こいつ…ぜんっぜん反省の色が見えねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This girl... no sign of remorse whatsoever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This girl... no sign of remorse whatsoever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さ、三枝さん、仕掛けたものは回収しなくちゃダメだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sa-Saigusa-san, you did wrong not clearing up the trap you laid...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sa-Saigusa-san, you did wrong not clearing up the trap you laid...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ね、謙吾も、今回は大目に見てあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, Kengo, can you let her off the hook this once?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, Kengo, can you let her off the hook this once?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「く…屈辱だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hu, humiliating...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hu, humiliating...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺が制服着ると、違う気（け）がある人に見られてしまうんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wearing this uniform, I feel as though I'm being perceived as a different person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wearing this uniform, I feel as though I'm being perceived as a different person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んと…そんな理由だったのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: So that was the reason...
MESSAGE.Translation: So that was the reason...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹、ここは謙吾のためにもけじめってもんが必要じゃねぇのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, don't you think it's necessary for her to take responsibility for Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, don't you think it's necessary for her to take responsibility for Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あー、姉御ー、ノート見せてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hey, Anego, show me your notes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hey, Anego, show me your notes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「聞いちゃいねぇ!?　てめぇはオレを怒らせた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ignoring me!? You're making me angry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ignoring me!? You're making me angry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ちなみに、おまえも俺を怒らせた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝By the way, you too are making me angry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝By the way, you too are making me angry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「やんのか、てめぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You asking for it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You asking for it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それはこっちのセリフだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's my line.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's my line.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 係のないところで張り合いを始めるふたり。
MESSAGE.EN: They were getting worked up over something completely unrelated.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were getting worked up over something completely unrelated.

MESSAGE.JP: めようとした次の瞬間、ばぁん！と扉が開く音がして、みんながそっちを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just when I was about to stop those two, everyone's attention was diverted to the door that opened with a loud sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just when I was about to stop those two, everyone's attention was diverted to the door that opened with a loud sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員@「三枝葉留佳！　寮長室からバケツを持ち出したままなのはあなたでしょう！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect@❝Haruka Saigusa! Was it you who took a bucket from the dorm heads' room!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect@❝Haruka Saigusa! Was it you who took a bucket from the dorm heads' room!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うぁんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Whoa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Whoa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはそそくさと僕の後ろに隠れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san hastily hid herself behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san hastily hid herself behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、三枝さん僕を壁にしないでよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha-, Saigusa-san, don't use me for cover.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha-, Saigusa-san, don't use me for cover.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ちょっと隠してよ理樹くんっ。いませーん、三枝葉留佳はここにいませーんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Play along, Riki-kun. I'm not here～. There is no Haruka Saigusa here～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Play along, Riki-kun. I'm not here～. There is no Haruka Saigusa here～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーあ、なんだ三枝がまた追われてるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah, she's just being chased, as always...
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah, she's just being chased, as always...

MESSAGE.JP: んな感じでクラスメイトたちは瞬く間に興味をなくしたように元の会話に戻ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: After realizing this, everyone in the class lost interest and returned to their previous discussions.
MESSAGE.Translation: After realizing this, everyone in the class lost interest and returned to their previous discussions.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「お下げ見えてるじゃないですか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝I can see your pigtails!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝I can see your pigtails!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 紀委員（推定一年生）数名は臆することなく教室にどかどかと足音高く入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Several members of the school disciplinary committee (most likely first year students) dauntlessly waltzed into the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Several members of the school disciplinary committee (most likely first year students) dauntlessly waltzed into the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「ほら、さっさと来てください、今朝も清掃のペナルティを受けていたはずじゃないですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Come on, get over here. Weren't you supposed to do the morning clean-up as punishment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Come on, get over here. Weren't you supposed to do the morning clean-up as punishment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あー、いやーほらー、途中でヤボヨーが出来たからさ、ヤボヨーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah～, y'know, on my way a little accident happened, a little one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah～, y'know, on my way a little accident happened, a little one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは無意味に胸を張った。
MESSAGE.EN: She had no reason to, but she still puffed her chest out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had no reason to, but she still puffed her chest out.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「忙しいのですヨ、私はっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm such a busy person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm such a busy person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っきまでだべっていただけな気がするんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed to me that she was just leisurely chatting away until now...
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed to me that she was just leisurely chatting away until now...

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「弁明は委員会にて聞きます！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Keep your excuses to yourself until the committee meeting!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Keep your excuses to yourself until the committee meeting!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ちぇ、わかったよぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Che, I got it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Che, I got it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「行ってあげるよ、可愛い後輩が頼むから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'll come with you, since I was asked to by such cute juniors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'll come with you, since I was asked to by such cute juniors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「しょーがないナァ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It can't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It can't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「またそんな減らず口をっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝That insolent mouth of yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝That insolent mouth of yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: るずると風紀委員たちに三枝さんは引っ張られていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The disciplinary committee members dragged Saigusa-san away.
MESSAGE.Translation: The disciplinary committee members dragged Saigusa-san away.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「じゃーねー、理樹くん、あでゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝See you later, Riki-kun. Adieu～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝See you later, Riki-kun. Adieu～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: を振る三枝さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san waved goodbye.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san waved goodbye.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あはは～って、うわちょっと、スカートまくれてるまくれてるっ！　ひゃわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ahaha, wait, my skirt's rolling up, rolling up! Hya～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ahaha, wait, my skirt's rolling up, rolling up! Hya～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃん！　ドアが閉まり、再び教室はざわついた朝の空気を取り戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: After the door closed, the usual noisy atmosphere returned to the classroom once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the door closed, the usual noisy atmosphere returned to the classroom once again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんはこんな具合に僕たちの教室にすっかりとけ込んでいるのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Saigusa-san seemed to blend in with our class perfectly.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Saigusa-san seemed to blend in with our class perfectly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とけ込んでいるのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or does she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or does she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: し疑問に思わないでも、ない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was some tingling doubt in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was some tingling doubt in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: のことが気になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was a little worried about Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was a little worried about Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 門のいもむし問題とはなんなのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What was that caterpillar problem at the school gates about?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was that caterpillar problem at the school gates about?

MESSAGE.JP: こから校門が見えないものかと試してみるが、だめだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked whether it was possible to see the school gates from here, but it wasn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked whether it was possible to see the school gates from here, but it wasn't.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうした理樹、きょろきょろして。謙吾と戦う気になったか？　あるいはオレの筋肉か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong, Riki? What are you looking around restlessly for? Can it be you're finally in the mood to fight Kengo? Or is it about my muscles?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong, Riki? What are you looking around restlessly for? Can it be you're finally in the mood to fight Kengo? Or is it about my muscles?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、どっちでもないけど…（特に後者は意味不明だ）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's neither... (the latter possibility is especially disturbing).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's neither... (the latter possibility is especially disturbing).❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうした理樹、きょろきょろして。筋肉ならここにあるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up, Riki, looking around so restlessly. If it's about muscle, I have some right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up, Riki, looking around so restlessly. If it's about muscle, I have some right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、たんまりあるね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right, and quite a lot too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right, and quite a lot too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こへちょうど携帯が震え、メールを受信する。
MESSAGE.EN: At that instant my cellphone vibrated, telling me I'd received a message.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that instant my cellphone vibrated, telling me I'd received a message.

MESSAGE.JP: からだ。そこには一言…
MESSAGE.EN: It was from Rin, and the only thing written in there...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was from Rin, and the only thing written in there...

MESSAGE.JP: こまちた』
MESSAGE.EN: [Im in trouel.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Im in trouel.]

MESSAGE.JP: は解読を試みる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to decipher it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to decipher it.

MESSAGE.JP: っとこれは『こまった』と打ちたかったに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no doubt about it, it was meant to say ❝I'm in trouble❞.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no doubt about it, it was meant to say ❝I'm in trouble❞.

MESSAGE.JP: としたら、助けを必要としているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If that's the case, I'd better go help her out.
MESSAGE.Translation: If that's the case, I'd better go help her out.

MESSAGE.JP: は携帯をポケットに仕舞い、教室を飛び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I stuffed the cellphone back in my pocket and dashed out of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stuffed the cellphone back in my pocket and dashed out of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: を見つける。
MESSAGE.EN: I found Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: の近くには用務員のおじさんが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The school janitor was standing next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school janitor was standing next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: っていって僕は話しかける。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I got close enough, I asked them.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I got close enough, I asked them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、見ろ、いもむしだらけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, look, it's full of caterpillars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, look, it's full of caterpillars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って鈴は$K90葉桜$K0を指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered while pointing at the $K90sakura tree$K0.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered while pointing at the $K90sakura tree$K0.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「このせいで誰もよりつかなくなったらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It seems like because of that everyone's avoiding this place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It seems like because of that everyone's avoiding this place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「たくさんの女子生徒で賑わう校内でも人気のある場所だったんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝This place was always crowded with female students. It used to be a real campus hotspot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝This place was always crowded with female students. It used to be a real campus hotspot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そして、用務員さんに文句がきたそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And so, our school janitor has received complaints.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And so, our school janitor has received complaints.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どのような文句が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of complaints?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of complaints?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「ようは駆除しろ、とですな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝Putting it plainly, demands to get rid of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝Putting it plainly, demands to get rid of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そんなこと言われても困るだろ、いもむしが悪いわけでもないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Even though they say that, it's not like the caterpillars have done anything wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Even though they say that, it's not like the caterpillars have done anything wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうしたらいい。理樹はいい知恵ないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What should we do? Riki, do you have any good suggestions?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What should we do? Riki, do you have any good suggestions?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「たくさんの女子生徒で賑わう校内でも人気のある場所だったんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝This place was always crowded with female students. It used to be a real campus hotspot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝This place was always crowded with female students. It used to be a real campus hotspot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う用務員が詳しく説明してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The school janitor explained to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school janitor explained to us.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でもな…えらいことになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So you see... it's a terrible trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So you see... it's a terrible trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えらいこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A terrible trouble?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A terrible trouble?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「このようにいもむしが大量発生してからは、ここでお昼を過ごす生徒はいなくなり、その文句が次々に私へと来た次第です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝As you can see, ever since the outbreak of caterpillars, this place has been deserted and I've received complaints one after another.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝As you can see, ever since the outbreak of caterpillars, this place has been deserted and I've received complaints one after another.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どのような文句が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of complaints?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of complaints?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「ようは駆除しろ、とですな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝Putting it plainly, demands to get rid of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝Putting it plainly, demands to get rid of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でもな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But, you see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But, you see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それも、なんていうか、えらいことなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is also a, how should I put it... a terrible trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is also a, how should I put it... a terrible trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えらいこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A terrible trouble?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A terrible trouble?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「一方的に駆除してしまうのは可哀相だと、そう思って困っているわけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝She's feeling sorry for them, so she can't simply stand by and watch them be disposed of so one-sidedly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝She's feeling sorry for them, so she can't simply stand by and watch them be disposed of so one-sidedly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「というわけなんだ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So that's how it is, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So that's how it is, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一言で言うなら…そうだな、えらいことだらけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I were to describe it in one word... right, a terribly big trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I were to describe it in one word... right, a terribly big trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「むしろ鈴はその一言しか言ってなかったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's the only thing you've been saying, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's the only thing you've been saying, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「用務員さん説明ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for explaining the situation, sir.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for explaining the situation, sir.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を言っておく。
MESSAGE.EN: I expressed my gratitude.
MESSAGE.Translation: I expressed my gratitude.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうしたらいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「殺さずに一匹ずつ捕まえて、裏山に逃がすとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Instead of killing them, how about collecting them one by one and taking them back to the hill?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Instead of killing them, how about collecting them one by one and taking them back to the hill?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…それはえらいことじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What... Isn't that a terrible trouble?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What... Isn't that a terrible trouble?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、えらく大変なことだろうね。でもそれぐらいしか手はないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, terrible or not, there's not much else we can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, terrible or not, there's not much else we can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それとも農薬かなんかで殺しちゃう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, how about using pesticide to get rid of them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, how about using pesticide to get rid of them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それはいやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't want that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't want that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それだったらえらくても山に返す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If it's come down to this, even if it's a terrible trouble, we should take them back to the hill.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If it's come down to this, even if it's a terrible trouble, we should take them back to the hill.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「そうかい、なら段ボール箱を持ってこよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝I see, then I'll go fetch a cardboard box for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝I see, then I'll go fetch a cardboard box for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かるとばかりに用務員のおじさんは校舎に駆けていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Saved from having to do the work himself, the school janitor sprinted toward the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saved from having to do the work himself, the school janitor sprinted toward the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: れと入れかわりに歩いてくるのは真人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, Masato came walking in from the opposite direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, Masato came walking in from the opposite direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ…鈴と理樹の対決じゃなかったのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, so it wasn't a face-off between Riki and Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, so it wasn't a face-off between Riki and Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちっ、やってきて損したぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk, what did I come all this way for...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk, what did I come all this way for...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人も手伝ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Help us out, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Help us out, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なにを？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝With what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝With what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「イモムシ取るの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Collecting the caterpillars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Collecting the caterpillars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の指さす先、木の枝を見上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I pointed at the tree branch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pointed at the tree branch.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおぉっ、仰山いるじゃねぇかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wow, there's a mighty lot of them there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wow, there's a mighty lot of them there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オーケー、オレ様に任せておけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, just leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, just leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は、数歩後ずさると地面に指をつき、クラウチングスタートの構えをとる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato took a few steps back and, putting his fingers on the ground, made ready for a crouching start.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato took a few steps back and, putting his fingers on the ground, made ready for a crouching start.

MESSAGE.JP: っ、と駆け出すと、全体重をかけ桜の木へショルダーアタックをかます。
MESSAGE.EN: He shot off and struck the trunk of the tree with his shoulder, putting all of his weight behind it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He shot off and struck the trunk of the tree with his shoulder, putting all of his weight behind it.

MESSAGE.JP: ぅん
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*,
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*,

MESSAGE.JP: と木が揺れる。
MESSAGE.EN: the tree shook heavily.
MESSAGE.Translation: the tree shook heavily.

MESSAGE.JP: たぼたとイモムシが落ちてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: One by one, caterpillars were raining down from the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: One by one, caterpillars were raining down from the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うわぁっ、わぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uwaa, wa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uwaa, wa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の上にも何匹ものイモムシが。
MESSAGE.EN: And several of them fell onto Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: And several of them fell onto Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「人が下にいるのになにすんじゃ、こらーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do you think you're doing when I'm still under the tree!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do you think you're doing when I'm still under the tree!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うっ、うっ、次はちゃんと確認しますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ugh, urgh. I'll give a proper warning beforehand next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ugh, urgh. I'll give a proper warning beforehand next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「次なんてあるかーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There won't be a next time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There won't be a next time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の後は地道に虫取り網で一匹ずつ捕まえていくことに。
MESSAGE.EN: After that we diligently caught them using an insect net, one by one.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that we diligently caught them using an insect net, one by one.

MESSAGE.JP: れは休み時間をまたぎ行われた。
MESSAGE.EN: This activity took up our entire break.
MESSAGE.Translation: This activity took up our entire break.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もう蹴っても落ちてこねぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No more are coming down, even when I kick the tree.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No more are coming down, even when I kick the tree.❞

MESSAGE.JP: して、裏山に放しにいく。
MESSAGE.EN: We then set them free on the hill.
MESSAGE.Translation: We then set them free on the hill.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ばいばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Bye-bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Bye-bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の隣で鈴が別れを告げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Standing next to me, Rin bade them farewell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Standing next to me, Rin bade them farewell.

MESSAGE.JP: ってくると、僕たちがイモムシを駆除していたのを見ていたのか、すでに女子生徒がその下を占拠していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon our return, there was already a group of girls sitting underneath the tree... were they watching us dispense with the caterpillars?
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon our return, there was already a group of girls sitting underneath the tree... were they watching us dispense with the caterpillars?

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「現金なものだよね、まったく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝Such selfish people, honestly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝Such selfish people, honestly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れを見て、用務員のおじさんは苦笑いを浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: The school janitor smiled wryly as he looked at them.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school janitor smiled wryly as he looked at them.

MESSAGE.JP: 子のひとりがこちらに気づき、近づいてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: One of the girls noticed us and began walking toward us.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of the girls noticed us and began walking toward us.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「あら、棗さんじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝My, if it isn't Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝My, if it isn't Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の声は…聞いたことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: This voice... I know I've heard it somewhere before.
MESSAGE.Translation: This voice... I know I've heard it somewhere before.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「笹瀬川佐々美！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sasami Sasasegawa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sasami Sasasegawa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が跳ねるように反応して防御の姿勢をとる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin jumped back a bit, striking a defensive pose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin jumped back a bit, striking a defensive pose.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたが、イモムシを駆除したんですってねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It seems you got rid of the caterpillars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It seems you got rid of the caterpillars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「何か謝礼がでるの？　それとも人気とり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Was there a reward? Or were you trying to win some popularity?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Was there a reward? Or were you trying to win some popularity?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「両方とも違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Both are wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Both are wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「両方」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Both.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Both.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh～～～～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh～～～～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が先に驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: My surprise was premature.
MESSAGE.Translation: My surprise was premature.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ばか、両方ちがうと言おうとしたんだ、最後まで聞け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Stupid, I was saying that both are wrong. Listen to the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Stupid, I was saying that both are wrong. Listen to the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんだ、びっくりしたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, you startled me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, you startled me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そう、だったらいいのだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Really, fine then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Really, fine then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなた男子にほんのちょっぴり人気があるようだから、調子に乗って誰かの気を引こうとしてるのかと邪推してしまいましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Since you have a teeny bit of popularity with boys, I figured you got carried away and were just looking for attention.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Since you have a teeny bit of popularity with boys, I figured you got carried away and were just looking for attention.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うでもいいが、この人ものすごく悪役っぽいキャラだなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Not that it really matters, but this person really has a villain-ish character...
MESSAGE.Translation: Not that it really matters, but this person really has a villain-ish character...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そんなことない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それは安心しましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That makes me relieved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That makes me relieved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: をたなびかせ、背を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hair fluttered as she turned away from us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hair fluttered as she turned away from us.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「授業が始まるわ。みなさんいきましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Class is about to start. Time to go, everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Class is about to start. Time to go, everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う取り巻き（？）に告げて、校舎に向けて歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Having conveyed this to her minions(?), she headed back to the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having conveyed this to her minions(?), she headed back to the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ごめんあそばせ、とか言いそうなキャラだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She's probably the type that'd say she's going to powder her nose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She's probably the type that'd say she's going to powder her nose...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きっと言ってると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure she really does say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure she really does say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の授業が終わると、鈴は誰よりも早く教室を飛び出していった。
MESSAGE.EN: After the next class was over, Rin was the first to dash out of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the next class was over, Rin was the first to dash out of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: とつめの課題はクリアした。すると、ふたつめの課題が届いているはず。
MESSAGE.EN: Since the first task had been completed, the next one might already have arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since the first task had been completed, the next one might already have arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: はそう考えたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That's probably what she was thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's probably what she was thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: て、どうしよう…と考え始めたところで僕は昨日の夜の出来事を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: When I thought of what to do next, I remembered what had happened last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I thought of what to do next, I remembered what had happened last night.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。女生徒の生徒手帳を拾ったんだ。返しにいってあげなくちゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to return that student handbook I picked up to the girl who owns it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to return that student handbook I picked up to the girl who owns it...

MESSAGE.JP: のほうは、放っておいても問題はないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe Rin should be fine by herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe Rin should be fine by herself.

MESSAGE.JP: が猫と話をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was conversing with the cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was conversing with the cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…おまえたちにはなんでひげがあるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why do you have whiskers?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why do you have whiskers?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃう？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ひげはいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is it great to have them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is it great to have them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃにゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow-meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow-meow.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そんなにいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is it really that great?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is it really that great?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしにはないからわからない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't have any so I wouldn't know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't have any so I wouldn't know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あると便利なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are they convenient?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are they convenient?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃう。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえのひげはなんか一本だけすごい長さだなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But one of your whiskers is just so incredibly long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But one of your whiskers is just so incredibly long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「邪魔だろ絶対。…邪魔じゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It has to be getting in your way... or isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It has to be getting in your way... or isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「水滴とかついて邪魔になるだろ。ミルク飲みにくいだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝When water drops stick to it, it probably gets in your way. It's probably hard to drink milk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝When water drops stick to it, it probably gets in your way. It's probably hard to drink milk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「びょんびょん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Byon-byon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Byon-byon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Unyaa.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unyaa.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「びょんびょんびょん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Byon-byon-byon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Byon-byon-byon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー…。
MESSAGE.EN: Nya～...
MESSAGE.Translation: Nya～...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「びょんびょ…
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Byon-byon...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Byon-byon...

MESSAGE.JP: あっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: Uwa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「指で触っていたら抜けてしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It fell out when I was playing with it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It fell out when I was playing with it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「な、なんてことをしてしまったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wh, what a thing to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wh, what a thing to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえの大事なひげを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your precious whisker...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your precious whisker...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「伸ばしていたんだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You've been growing it for a long time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You've been growing it for a long time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はうなだれている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くっつかないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Will it stick back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Will it stick back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃにゃ？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くっつけっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Come on, stick!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Come on, stick!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「無理か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Impossible, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Impossible, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうしよう…養毛剤、買ってきたほうが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What should I do... I'd better buy some hair tonic...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What should I do... I'd better buy some hair tonic...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、すぐ伸びるのか？　伸びないだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait, will it grow back immediately? It probably won't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait, will it grow back immediately? It probably won't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃにゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow.

MESSAGE.JP: るり、と猫が顔を洗う仕草をする。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat started washing its face with its paw.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat started washing its face with its paw.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お、おまえ、ひげ少なくなってるぞ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Y, you're going to lose all your whiskers!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Y, you're going to lose all your whiskers!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ってなんだ…毛変わりの時期か？　ひょっとして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh... could it be, it's just time to change your coat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh... could it be, it's just time to change your coat?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ声をかけよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should call out to her soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should call out to her soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あ、理樹だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ah, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ah, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: っと呼ぶと、僕に気づいて、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: After being called quietly, she noticed me and stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: After being called quietly, she noticed me and stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえら、重いっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're heavy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're heavy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふかーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: らばらと猫が落ちていって、鈴と猫たちだけの聖域が壊れていく。
MESSAGE.EN: So the exclusive sanctuary of Rin and her cats was broken, and cats were falling off her.
MESSAGE.Translation: So the exclusive sanctuary of Rin and her cats was broken, and cats were falling off her.

MESSAGE.JP: を引き剥がす。その手にはまた手紙が。
MESSAGE.EN: She was tearing cats off herself. In one hand she was holding another letter.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was tearing cats off herself. In one hand she was holding another letter.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今度はなんて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言でこちらに紙を突き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Without saying anything, she just handed it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without saying anything, she just handed it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: れを受け取り、読む。
MESSAGE.EN: I took it from her and started reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took it from her and started reading.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子寮共用部分の衛生問題を解決せよ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Solve the bathroom's hygiene problem in the boys' dorm.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Solve the bathroom's hygiene problem in the boys' dorm.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…そうだね、かなり汚れてるねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... That's right, it's gotten pretty dirty lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... That's right, it's gotten pretty dirty lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の惨状を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered that horrible spectacle.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered that horrible spectacle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕らの管轄だし僕がやっておこうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's within my jurisdiction, so I'll deal with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's within my jurisdiction, so I'll deal with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う提案すると、鈴は人差し指を立て、ちっちっちっち、と左右に振る。
MESSAGE.EN: I just proposed this, but Rin extended an index finger and shook it at me with a ❝Tsk-tsk-tsk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I just proposed this, but Rin extended an index finger and shook it at me with a ❝Tsk-tsk-tsk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そんだけではダメだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That won't do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That won't do.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それだけじゃ、この問題は解決されない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝With just that, the problem won't be solved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝With just that, the problem won't be solved.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それだけじゃ、この問題は解決されないと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With just that, the problem won't be solved?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With just that, the problem won't be solved?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was right on the money...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was right on the money...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まぁ、確かに。スケジュール管理してちゃんと回さないと、すぐまた汚くなるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you're right. If there's no cleaning roster, it'll get dirty again right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you're right. If there's no cleaning roster, it'll get dirty again right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「作っておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's make one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's make one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なにを？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, make what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, make what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「掃除当番表」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A cleaning roster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A cleaning roster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほんとに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you serious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you serious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: りん、と首を縦に。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell on her head chimed as she nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell on her head chimed as she nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: ーん…できるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm... Can we really do it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm... Can we really do it...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そろそろ戻ろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go back already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go back already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: く考えるのはやめて、教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped pondering the problem and returned to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped pondering the problem and returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: っておこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd better leave her be...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd better leave her be...

MESSAGE.JP: て、どうしよう…と考え始めたところで僕は昨日の夜の出来事を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: When I thought of what to do next, I remembered what had happened last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I thought of what to do next, I remembered what had happened last night.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。女生徒の生徒手帳を拾ったんだ。返しにいってあげなくちゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to return that student handbook I picked up to the girl who owns it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to return that student handbook I picked up to the girl who owns it...

MESSAGE.JP: を知らないので、ひとりでは見つけようがない。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no idea what she looks like, so I'm going to need someone's help.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no idea what she looks like, so I'm going to need someone's help.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりの女生徒を捕まえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked up to one of the nearby girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked up to one of the nearby girls.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「朱鷺戸さんって…どの人かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you tell me... who is Tokido-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you tell me... who is Tokido-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「あの中心の子よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝That girl right in the center over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝That girl right in the center over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中心。
MESSAGE.EN: Center...
MESSAGE.Translation: Center...

MESSAGE.JP: かに人に囲まれた女の子がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There really was someone standing in the center of a crowd.
MESSAGE.Translation: There really was someone standing in the center of a crowd.

MESSAGE.JP: 女とも呼べる幼い顔立ち。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone with a young, almost childish face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone with a young, almost childish face.

MESSAGE.JP: れが柔和に微笑んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a gentle smile on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a gentle smile on it.

MESSAGE.JP: れは本当に美しく…誰もの心を奪ってしまうような…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her beauty was quite enough to captivate anyone's heart...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her beauty was quite enough to captivate anyone's heart...

MESSAGE.JP: して、親しみも覚える。いつかどこかで会ったような。
MESSAGE.EN: There also was something amiable about her, that made you feel as if you'd met before.
MESSAGE.Translation: There also was something amiable about her, that made you feel as if you'd met before.

MESSAGE.JP: ばし僕は見とれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood mesmerized for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood mesmerized for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 徒手帳が床に落ちる音で、何をしにきたのか、思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I came to my senses when I heard the student handbook hit the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I came to my senses when I heard the student handbook hit the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: れを返しにきたんだ、と拾い上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Right, I was here to return it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right, I was here to return it.

MESSAGE.JP: も、どうやって？
MESSAGE.EN: But how?
MESSAGE.Translation: But how?

MESSAGE.JP: の輪の中に入っていくのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I just push my way through the crowd?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I just push my way through the crowd?

MESSAGE.JP: れともここから呼ぶのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Or simply call out to her from here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or simply call out to her from here?

MESSAGE.JP: んなが一斉に僕を見るだろうな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone would be staring at me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone would be staring at me...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っき話しかけた子を呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to the girl I talked to just now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to the girl I talked to just now.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これを…朱鷺戸さんの生徒手帳。拾ったから返してあげて…ほしいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is Tokido-san's student handbook... I found it, so can you please... give it back to her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is Tokido-san's student handbook... I found it, so can you please... give it back to her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「え？　なら呼んであげるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Huh? I'll just go get her for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Huh? I'll just go get her for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな気兼ねする相手でもないように、そう言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Her tone implied I didn't have to be so reserved around her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her tone implied I didn't have to be so reserved around her.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「ねぇ、朱鷺戸さーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Hey, Tokido-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Hey, Tokido-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、輪の中に向けて。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke toward the group of students.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke toward the group of students.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「はーい、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yes, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yes, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鷺戸さんが振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Tokido-san turned back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tokido-san turned back.

MESSAGE.JP: の綺麗な瞳が僕と女生徒を交互に見た。
MESSAGE.EN: She surveyed both of us with her beautiful eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She surveyed both of us with her beautiful eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「あなたが落とした生徒手帳だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝He says he found your student handbook.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝He says he found your student handbook.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「え…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: までにこやかに話していた彼女。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been happily chatting away until then.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been happily chatting away until then.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「……あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 着の内ポケットを手で押え、それがないことにようやく気がついたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She realized that something was missing from her inside pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She realized that something was missing from her inside pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: きの表情を素早く消して、まっすぐ僕を見つめた。
MESSAGE.EN: After quickly hiding her expression of surprise, she studied me intently.
MESSAGE.Translation: After quickly hiding her expression of surprise, she studied me intently.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…っ」
れは一瞬だったのに、僕は固まってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: It lasted only a moment, but her look made me tremble.
MESSAGE.Translation: It lasted only a moment, but her look made me tremble.

MESSAGE.JP: ちらに歩いてきた彼女は、生徒手帳をちらり、と見て言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked over and moved her eyes to the student handbook.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked over and moved her eyes to the student handbook.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「朱鷺戸です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'm Tokido.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'm Tokido.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっと、直枝です、これ落ちてました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, I'm Naoe. I found this on the floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I'm Naoe. I found this on the floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 徒手帳を渡すが、声がうわずる。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed it over to its rightful owner. My voice sounded strained.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed it over to its rightful owner. My voice sounded strained.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「直枝くんね、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Naoe-kun? Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Naoe-kun? Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 代を払いたくなるような笑顔で、受け取ってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the student handbook, giving me the kind of smile that made me feel both blessed and grateful.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the student handbook, giving me the kind of smile that made me feel both blessed and grateful.

MESSAGE.JP: ャイムが鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: The chime rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chime rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I should be going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I should be going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手で挨拶を済ませ、僕は自分の教室へ戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved my hand and returned to my classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved my hand and returned to my classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: れにしても可愛い子だったなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was really cute...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was really cute...

MESSAGE.JP: 徒手帳は放課後にでも落としたのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Had she dropped her student handbook after school?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had she dropped her student handbook after school?

MESSAGE.JP: いに乾いた銃声の音を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly I remembered the faint sound of a gunshot.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly I remembered the faint sound of a gunshot.

MESSAGE.JP: の校舎で銃撃戦？
MESSAGE.EN: A shootout at the school?
MESSAGE.Translation: A shootout at the school?

MESSAGE.JP: は、まさかね…。
MESSAGE.EN: Haha, yeah right...
MESSAGE.Translation: Haha, yeah right...

MESSAGE.JP: １０分で休み時間というとき。
MESSAGE.EN: When there were only ten minutes before recess.
MESSAGE.Translation: When there were only ten minutes before recess.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯が震えていた。メールを受信したのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My phone vibrated. I got an email.
MESSAGE.Translation: My phone vibrated. I got an email.

MESSAGE.JP: の下で開いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stole a glance at my phone under the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stole a glance at my phone under the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 信者名は…不明だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sender was... unknown.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sender was... unknown.

MESSAGE.JP: 容を確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to look at the message.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to look at the message.

MESSAGE.JP: 先ほどはありがとうございました。次の休み時間屋上で待ってます　Ｔ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Thanks for before. I will be waiting for you on the rooftop next recess. - T]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Thanks for before. I will be waiting for you on the rooftop next recess. - T]

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ朱鷺戸さんだと気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't take me long to conclude the sender was Tokido-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't take me long to conclude the sender was Tokido-san.

MESSAGE.JP: れにしても、なんだろう、改めて。
MESSAGE.EN: But what could she possibly want from me?
MESSAGE.Translation: But what could she possibly want from me?

MESSAGE.JP: でもされるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Say thanks?
MESSAGE.Translation: Say thanks?

MESSAGE.JP: 思議なのは、どうして、僕のメールアドレスを知ってるのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What baffled me even more was how she got my email in the first place.
MESSAGE.Translation: What baffled me even more was how she got my email in the first place.

MESSAGE.JP: いさっき初めて会ったばかりだというのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Didn't we meet for the first time just a while ago?
MESSAGE.Translation: Didn't we meet for the first time just a while ago?

MESSAGE.JP: 上へと続く階段。
MESSAGE.EN: At the staircase to the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the staircase to the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: の前には立ち入り禁止の文字。
MESSAGE.EN: The no entry sign was there as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: The no entry sign was there as always.

MESSAGE.JP: は張ってあるロープを乗り越える。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to step over the tape.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to step over the tape.

MESSAGE.EN: However...
MESSAGE.Translation: However...

MESSAGE.JP: は転けそうになり、前に手をつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost tripped, thrusting my hand forward just in time to catch myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost tripped, thrusting my hand forward just in time to catch myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 履きが脱げた。
MESSAGE.EN: My shoes came off.
MESSAGE.Translation: My shoes came off.

MESSAGE.JP: り返ると、上履きは階段に張り付いたままでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned back to find them stuck to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned back to find them stuck to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 段に粘着質の何かが塗られていたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was some sticky substance spread over the staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was some sticky substance spread over the staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: 履きはみごとに左右とも張り付いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of my shoes had been glued to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of my shoes had been glued to it.

MESSAGE.JP: ろうとするが、瞬間接着剤だろうか、びくともしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to tear them off, but the glue had likely been instant, and I had no luck.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to tear them off, but the glue had likely been instant, and I had no luck.

MESSAGE.JP: ち入り禁止を無視して入り込んだ罰か…。
MESSAGE.EN: Was it punishment for ignoring the no entry sign...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it punishment for ignoring the no entry sign...?

MESSAGE.JP: ぼ初対面に近い女の子と靴下のまま会うなんて、ひどく惨めな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: The prospect of meeting with a girl I barely know in my socks hardly seemed attractive.
MESSAGE.Translation: The prospect of meeting with a girl I barely know in my socks hardly seemed attractive.

MESSAGE.JP: で恭介に靴をはがす方法を相談して、回収だけはしておかないと。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave up on getting them back, thinking it wise to ask Kyousuke for help later.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave up on getting them back, thinking it wise to ask Kyousuke for help later.

MESSAGE.JP: りあえずは靴下のまま、屋上へ。
MESSAGE.EN: I made my way to the rooftop in my socks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made my way to the rooftop in my socks.

MESSAGE.JP: だ来ていないようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But she wasn't there yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she wasn't there yet.

MESSAGE.JP: に来ていたら、彼女があの接着剤の犠牲になっていただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If she came after me, she'd probably had fallen victim to that glue.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she came after me, she'd probably had fallen victim to that glue.

MESSAGE.EN: Hm?
MESSAGE.Translation: Hm?

MESSAGE.JP: ったら、教えてあげないと、同じ目に遭う。
MESSAGE.EN: Which means I should warn her of the threat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Which means I should warn her of the threat.

MESSAGE.JP: り返ったその先、非常口の入り口に彼女は立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I turned back she was standing there, at the emergency exit.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I turned back she was standing there, at the emergency exit.

MESSAGE.JP: 下を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃんと上履きを履いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She had her shoes on.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had her shoes on.

MESSAGE.JP: うか、僕の上履きの運命を目の当たりにすれば、すぐ気づくか。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have figured it out when she saw mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have figured it out when she saw mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰かのいたずらにひっかかっちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Someone pulled a prank on me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Someone pulled a prank on me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は恥ずかしく思いながら、話しかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her, embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her, embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そうね。可哀想に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Indeed. How unfortunate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Indeed. How unfortunate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ違和感を覚える。
MESSAGE.EN: Something was off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something was off.

MESSAGE.JP: の朱鷺戸沙耶はさっき教室で見た彼女ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: The Saya Tokido standing before me wasn't the same Saya Tokido I saw in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Saya Tokido standing before me wasn't the same Saya Tokido I saw in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: の可愛らしい表情はどこにいったんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Where did that charming expression on her face go?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did that charming expression on her face go?

MESSAGE.JP: ているだけの別人のように…僕には映った。
MESSAGE.EN: She was similar in appearance, but seemed like an altogether different person to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was similar in appearance, but seemed like an altogether different person to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She declared to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She declared to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたは死ぬのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're going to die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're going to die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: え？
MESSAGE.EN: Huh...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh...?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの…なんて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: き返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたは死ぬの、これから。可哀想に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're going to die. How unfortunate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're going to die. How unfortunate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はあ？
MESSAGE.EN: What...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What...?

MESSAGE.JP: けがわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't make sense of her words...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't make sense of her words...

MESSAGE.JP: うしてぶしつけにそんなことを言われなきゃならないんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Why would she have said something like that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why would she have said something like that?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕が死ぬって…どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going to die... But why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going to die... But why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そうね。夜中に校舎をうろついていたからでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Indeed. That's the price you pay for wandering around the school at night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Indeed. That's the price you pay for wandering around the school at night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女は歩き始めた。僕に向かって。
MESSAGE.EN: She started moving toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started moving toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はぁ…それが僕が死ぬこととどういう関係が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Err... What does it have to do with me dying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Err... What does it have to do with me dying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたは後日、今夜にでもそうね、執行部に拉致されることでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Soon, maybe even tonight for all I know, you're going to get kidnapped by the Executives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Soon, maybe even tonight for all I know, you're going to get kidnapped by the Executives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れるほどの距離まできても、彼女は歩みをやめない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't stop even after she was within arm's reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't stop even after she was within arm's reach.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それも表向きの執行部ではない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝And I don't mean the Executives who run businesses or the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝And I don't mean the Executives who run businesses or the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「闇の執行部に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝The Darkness Executives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝The Darkness Executives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のままぶつかってきそうだったので、僕は後ろに下がり始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She was almost on top of me, so I had to step back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was almost on top of me, so I had to step back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やみの…？　なにそれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Darkness...? What's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Darkness...? What's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そして尋問を受ける。夜の校舎で誰と出会ったかを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You will be interrogated. They'll want to know who you met at the school last night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You will be interrogated. They'll want to know who you met at the school last night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら、クラスメイトの人達も同じじゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then what about your classmates?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then what about your classmates?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたは違うじゃない。それはあたしのことだと知っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're different because you know it was me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're different because you know it was me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　あぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こでようやく気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: It finally dawned on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It finally dawned on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きみだったんだ、あそこに居た子」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So that was you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So that was you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「え…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「まさか…気づいてなかった!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't tell me you didn't figure it out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't tell me you didn't figure it out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I didn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I didn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「墓穴掘った…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I dug my own grave...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I dug my own grave...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、あの、朱鷺戸さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝U-um, Tokido-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝U-um, Tokido-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「なによ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What is it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What is it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そうよ、勘違いして墓穴掘ったのよ、滑稽でしょ、笑えるでしょ、笑えばいいじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's right, I was mistaken and dug my own grave. What a joke. Don't you find that hilarious? Laugh all you want!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's right, I was mistaken and dug my own grave. What a joke. Don't you find that hilarious? Laugh all you want!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、何があったかはわからないけど、落ち着いて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Listen, I have no idea what happened, but why don't you calm do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Listen, I have no idea what happened, but why don't you calm do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Twitch*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Twitch*!

MESSAGE.JP: を上げた朱鷺戸さんは毅然としていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When she lifted her face it was resolute.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she lifted her face it was resolute.

MESSAGE.JP: うやら立ち直ったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently she got ahold of herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently she got ahold of herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「例え知らなかったにせよ、尋問で結果的に、そこに居たのがあたしだということを彼らは探り当てるわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Even if you didn't know it was me, if they interrogate you they would have figured it out sooner or later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Even if you didn't know it was me, if they interrogate you they would have figured it out sooner or later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「鼻の利いた猟犬のように…そう、購買部に新メニューが出ることを知った生徒たちのように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They're like trained hounds... Like students who know new stuff is coming to the school store in advance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They're like trained hounds... Like students who know new stuff is coming to the school store in advance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇ…なんだかすごいね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm... Sounds impressive...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... Sounds impressive...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きなり例えが身近になった。
MESSAGE.EN: She provided an analogy that was easy to understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She provided an analogy that was easy to understand.

MESSAGE.JP: れど次に彼女が口にしたのはあまりに異質な宣言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: But the next words that came out of her mouth left me dumbfounded.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the next words that came out of her mouth left me dumbfounded.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「だから、その前にあなたは死ぬの。ここで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝This is why you will have to die, right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝This is why you will have to die, right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女はまるで僕に抱きつくように、一気に寄ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She instantly advanced on me, as if attempting to hold me in an embrace.
MESSAGE.Translation: She instantly advanced on me, as if attempting to hold me in an embrace.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずさった僕。背中に当たるのはフェンス。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped backward. My back met the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped backward. My back met the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「ゲーム…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Game...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Game...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「スタート」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちっと音がして、僕の体重のほとんどを支えているはずのフェンスがはずれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a screeching sound, and the fence that had been supporting my weight gave way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a screeching sound, and the fence that had been supporting my weight gave way.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちる！
MESSAGE.EN: I'm falling!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm falling!

MESSAGE.JP: を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I extended my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I extended my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: れが破れたフェンスの端を掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My fingers gripped the edge of the broken fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: My fingers gripped the edge of the broken fence.

MESSAGE.JP: んな簡単にどうして!?
MESSAGE.EN: Why did it break so easily?!
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did it break so easily?!

MESSAGE.JP: や、それよりも、なんとかのぼらないとっ。
MESSAGE.EN: But more importantly, I have to climb back.
MESSAGE.Translation: But more importantly, I have to climb back.

MESSAGE.JP: 上には朱鷺戸さんの姿が。
MESSAGE.EN: Tokido-san was standing above my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tokido-san was standing above my head.

MESSAGE.JP: けない話だが、絶体絶命のこのピンチを救えるのは彼女しかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt pathetic, but in that dire situation only she could save me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt pathetic, but in that dire situation only she could save me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「助けてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Help me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Help me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: っ、と彼女の鼻が鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: She sneered at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sneered at me.

MESSAGE.JP: の顔に彼女はなんと上履きの裏を突きつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then pushed her foot against my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then pushed her foot against my face.

MESSAGE.JP: けてもらうどころか、まったく逆だ。蹴り落とそうとしている！
MESSAGE.EN: Instead of helping me, she was trying to knock me off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead of helping me, she was trying to knock me off.

MESSAGE.JP: の子に、『そして、親しみも覚える。いつかどこかで会ったような』なんて思ってた僕はなんなんだ!?
MESSAGE.EN: Did I actually say that ❝there also was something amiable about her, that made you feel as if you'd met before❞ about her?!
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I actually say that ❝there also was something amiable about her, that made you feel as if you'd met before❞ about her?!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「勘弁してよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Give me a break!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Give me a break!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女まで巻き込んでなるものか。
MESSAGE.EN: What if I drag her into this?
MESSAGE.Translation: What if I drag her into this?

MESSAGE.JP: 力でなんとかなるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I should be able to get out of this mess by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should be able to get out of this mess by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: こう。
MESSAGE.EN: I need to act.
MESSAGE.Translation: I need to act.

MESSAGE.JP: っ、と彼女の鼻が鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: She sneered at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sneered at me.

MESSAGE.JP: ろうとする、僕の顔に彼女はなんと上履きの裏を突きつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I tried to climb back, she pushed her foot against my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I tried to climb back, she pushed her foot against my face.

MESSAGE.JP: の子に、『そして、親しみも覚える。いつかどこかで会ったような』なんて思ってた僕はなんなんだ!?
MESSAGE.EN: Did I actually say that ❝there also was something amiable about her, that made you feel as if you'd met before❞ about her?!
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I actually say that ❝there also was something amiable about her, that made you feel as if you'd met before❞ about her?!

MESSAGE.JP: れじゃ上れない！
MESSAGE.EN: I can't get back!
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't get back!

MESSAGE.JP: れじゃ上れない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't get back...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't get back...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「足をどけてよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Move your foot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Move your foot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えはない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't respond.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't respond.

MESSAGE.JP: こには完全な『殺意』だけがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt her malevolent gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt her malevolent gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: はこのまま落ちるはずだったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to fall...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to fall...

MESSAGE.JP: 女の罠により。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked right into her trap.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked right into her trap.

MESSAGE.JP: も、どうして？
MESSAGE.EN: But why?
MESSAGE.Translation: But why?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「朱鷺戸さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tokido-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tokido-san...❞
