MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「君はなにか勘違いしてるよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think there's been a misunderstanding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think there's been a misunderstanding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あたしの行動は、女生徒然としているべきなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'm trying to act like a normal student.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'm trying to act like a normal student.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そして、今もイレギュラー。とっとと終わらせて、友達の輪の中に戻らなきゃならないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝This is an anomaly. I have to go back to my friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝This is an anomaly. I have to go back to my friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕を殺して？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By killing me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By killing me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Exactly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Exactly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はきみの敵じゃない、何も喋らないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not your enemy. I won't tell anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not your enemy. I won't tell anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「薬には抵抗できない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝All futile if they use drugs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝All futile if they use drugs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰がそんなもの使うんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who in the world would do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who in the world would do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「闇の執行部」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Darkness Executives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Darkness Executives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やみのしっこうぶ？　そんなの聞いたことないよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Darkness Executives. I've never heard of them!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Darkness Executives. I've never heard of them!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女は足の裏を僕の顔からどけた。
MESSAGE.EN: She moved her foot off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She moved her foot off.

MESSAGE.JP: れ替わりに突きつけられたもの。
MESSAGE.EN: And shoved something else into my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: And shoved something else into my face.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「じゃ、これは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Then how about this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Then how about this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは…銃口だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a... gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a... gun.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まさか…ほんもの…じゃないよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't tell me that's real...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't tell me that's real...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「偽物を隠し持つ理由がどこに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Why would I go through all the trouble of hiding a fake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Why would I go through all the trouble of hiding a fake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃ…例えば…こうやって脅すときとかさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... You could use it to threaten people like you're doing now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... You could use it to threaten people like you're doing now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れが本物であろうと、なかろうと…
MESSAGE.EN: Real or not, it didn't matter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Real or not, it didn't matter.

MESSAGE.JP: は力の限界だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't hold on any longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't hold on any longer.

MESSAGE.JP: う落ちるしかないことを…。
MESSAGE.EN: The only way was down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only way was down.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「理樹ーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: から声が。
MESSAGE.EN: A voice came from beneath.
MESSAGE.Translation: A voice came from beneath.

MESSAGE.JP: 人だ！
MESSAGE.EN: It was Masato!
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Masato!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「校舎の壁をロッククライミングか、てっぺんまで行きやがってすげぇじゃねぇか！　よし、すぐ追いついてやるぜっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Have you scaled the wall all the way to the roof?! Awesome, wait a second, I'm gonna catch up to you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Have you scaled the wall all the way to the roof?! Awesome, wait a second, I'm gonna catch up to you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕を助けてからにしてよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How about helping me first!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How about helping me first!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の限り叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouted at the top of my lungs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouted at the top of my lungs.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうした、登りきれねぇのかよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up, can't climb all the way up?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up, can't climb all the way up?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当に限界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no more strength left.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no more strength left.

MESSAGE.JP: 人…
MESSAGE.EN: Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: まく受け止めてくれたら、なんでも言うことを聞くよ。
MESSAGE.EN: If you catch me, I'll do whatever you want.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you catch me, I'll do whatever you want.

MESSAGE.JP: から…頼んだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: So, please... I'm counting on you.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, please... I'm counting on you.

MESSAGE.JP: を放し、僕は重力に身を任せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I released my hands giving in to gravity.
MESSAGE.Translation: I released my hands giving in to gravity.

MESSAGE.JP: 後に見えたのは半眼で無表情に僕を見下ろす朱鷺戸さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The last thing I saw was Tokido-san staring expressionlessly at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The last thing I saw was Tokido-san staring expressionlessly at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 目覚めたのはベッドの上だった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I came to, I was in a bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I came to, I was in a bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の背中が見える。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see Masato's back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see Masato's back.

MESSAGE.JP: けてくれたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He saved me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He saved me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よぅ、起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, got up already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, got up already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ気づいて、僕のほうを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: When he noticed I was awake, he turned to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When he noticed I was awake, he turned to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「すげぇキャッチだったんだぜ。だが誰もいやしねぇ。ったく、みんなに見せてやりたかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That was one hell of a catch. Too bad no one was there to see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That was one hell of a catch. Too bad no one was there to see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとう。信じてたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you, I knew you'd save me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you, I knew you'd save me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…ったくなんで目撃した奴がいねぇんだ…すげぇアンラッキーじゃねぇか…幸い中の不幸というか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why wasn't there anyone to witness it... I'm glad nothing happened to you, but what misfortune...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why wasn't there anyone to witness it... I'm glad nothing happened to you, but what misfortune...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はラッキーだったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I was lucky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I was lucky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そっか。じゃ、いいや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Really? Good then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Really? Good then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「にしても危なっかしいったらありゃしねえ、フェンス弱ってたみてぇだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That was a pretty dangerous thing to do, looks like the fence was loose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That was a pretty dangerous thing to do, looks like the fence was loose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みたいだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So it would seem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So it would seem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなタイミングよくちぎれるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: What are the chances it'd break right then?
MESSAGE.Translation: What are the chances it'd break right then?

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@『ゲーム…スタート』
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❛Game... start.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❛Game... start.❜

MESSAGE.JP: う告げた彼女の姿を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a flashback of her saying that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a flashback of her saying that.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「とりあえず助かってなによりだ。危機一髪だったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Either way, I'm glad you are safe. That was a close call.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Either way, I'm glad you are safe. That was a close call.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、真人とその筋肉には何遍礼を言っても言い足りないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, I can't thank that muscle of yours enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, I can't thank that muscle of yours enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「はっ、よせよ、筋肉が恐縮してるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, cut it out, my muscle is humbled.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, cut it out, my muscle is humbled.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sigh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sigh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は朱鷺戸さんの殺意を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered Tokido-san's hostility.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered Tokido-san's hostility.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてそんなものを覚えられたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What made her so hostile to me?
MESSAGE.Translation: What made her so hostile to me?

MESSAGE.JP: の校舎がどうとか言ってたけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: She mentioned something about being in the school building at night...
MESSAGE.Translation: She mentioned something about being in the school building at night...

MESSAGE.JP: 方的にだけど、そこで出会ってたんだ、僕らは。
MESSAGE.EN: We must have met there, without my realizing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: We must have met there, without my realizing it.

MESSAGE.JP: れが彼女にとっては致命的な出来事だったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: And this was somehow critical to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And this was somehow critical to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 一方的にもほどがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Talk about being selfish...
MESSAGE.Translation: Talk about being selfish...

MESSAGE.JP: ちらは何ひとつ事情を知らないというのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why she might be doing whatever she's doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why she might be doing whatever she's doing.

MESSAGE.JP: 回は通りかかった真人に奇跡的に助けられた。
MESSAGE.EN: This time, by some miracle, Masato happened to be passing by and saved me.
MESSAGE.Translation: This time, by some miracle, Masato happened to be passing by and saved me.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、こんな偶然二回とは続かない。
MESSAGE.EN: But miracles don't happen twice.
MESSAGE.Translation: But miracles don't happen twice.

MESSAGE.JP: た僕を殺すための罠をどこかにはって、待ちかまえてるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I bet she'll set a trap to murder me somewhere else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bet she'll set a trap to murder me somewhere else.

MESSAGE.JP: 考えるほどにおかしな気分になってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The more I thought about it, the more I realized how silly all of it was...
MESSAGE.Translation: The more I thought about it, the more I realized how silly all of it was...

MESSAGE.JP: す？　生徒が生徒を？
MESSAGE.EN: Murder? Aren't we just ordinary students?
MESSAGE.Translation: Murder? Aren't we just ordinary students?

MESSAGE.JP: してその理由は僕が尋問を受けるから？
MESSAGE.EN: Simply because she fears me being interrogated?
MESSAGE.Translation: Simply because she fears me being interrogated?

MESSAGE.JP: 鷺戸さんが夜の校舎にいたことを話してしまうから？
MESSAGE.EN: Because I'm going to reveal that Tokido-san was in the school at night?
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I'm going to reveal that Tokido-san was in the school at night?

MESSAGE.JP: に？
MESSAGE.EN: To whom?
MESSAGE.Translation: To whom?

MESSAGE.JP: の執行部に。
MESSAGE.EN: Darkness Executives.
MESSAGE.Translation: Darkness Executives.

MESSAGE.JP: 気か…僕は？
MESSAGE.EN: Am I even... sane?
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I even... sane?

MESSAGE.JP: んな状況、誰に話しても笑われるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd be laughed out of the room if I tried to tell anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd be laughed out of the room if I tried to tell anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: に闇の執行部なんてものすごくユーモアに溢れたネーミングだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Darkness Executives does sound like a pretty comical name.
MESSAGE.Translation: Darkness Executives does sound like a pretty comical name.

MESSAGE.JP: 級映画のようじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Straight out of a B movie.
MESSAGE.Translation: Straight out of a B movie.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Exactly...
MESSAGE.Translation: Exactly...

MESSAGE.JP: は一番単純な答えに辿りつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached the simplest explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached the simplest explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてその可能性を考えなかったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why didn't it occur to me earlier?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why didn't it occur to me earlier?

MESSAGE.JP: ながらまぬけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was so stupid.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was so stupid.

MESSAGE.JP: う。これは、恭介のどっきりなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's it, this is one of Kyousuke's pranks.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's it, this is one of Kyousuke's pranks.

MESSAGE.JP: どうだ、臨場感たっぷりで楽しかったろう？
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Must have felt pretty real. You enjoy yourself?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Must have felt pretty real. You enjoy yourself?❜

MESSAGE.JP: う僕を見て、子供みたいに笑うんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He would say with an innocent smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: He would say with an innocent smile.

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ終わる頃なんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Then it should be over soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then it should be over soon.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐにも出てこようとドアの向こうで待ってるのではないか。
MESSAGE.EN: He could well be waiting for me behind the door now.
MESSAGE.Translation: He could well be waiting for me behind the door now.

MESSAGE.JP: は起きて、ベッドから立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I got up from the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got up from the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「授業か？　一時間ぐらい休もうが平気だろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Going to class? No one will mind if you skip it, why don't you rest?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Going to class? No one will mind if you skip it, why don't you rest?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「確かめたいことがあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need to check something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need to check something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ャイムが鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: The chime rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chime rang.

MESSAGE.JP: だ人気はない。これから休み時間なんだ。ちょうどよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't anyone around. Next period was recess. Great.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't anyone around. Next period was recess. Great.

MESSAGE.JP: は恭介のクラスを訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed to Kyousuke's classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed to Kyousuke's classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 画に没頭していた。
MESSAGE.EN: He was immersed in reading manga.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was immersed in reading manga.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ん？　どうした、こんなところまで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hm? What brought you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hm? What brought you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そろそろ、今度の遊びは終わりにしない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This new game of yours, why don't you give it a rest?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This new game of yours, why don't you give it a rest?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「遊び？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Game?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Game?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、朱鷺戸さんとか、闇の執行部とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Exactly, with Tokido-san and Darkness Executives and whatnot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Exactly, with Tokido-san and Darkness Executives and whatnot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「闇の執行部だと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Darkness Executives...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Darkness Executives...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の顔色が変わった。
MESSAGE.EN: The look on his face changed at once.
MESSAGE.Translation: The look on his face changed at once.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その名をどこで聞いた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Where did you hear that name...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Where did you hear that name...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、朱鷺戸さんっていう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, from Tokido-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, from Tokido-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いいか、よく聞け、理樹…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Listen well, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Listen well, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は僕を抱き寄せるようにして、口を耳元まで持ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: He pulled me closer and whispered at my ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: He pulled me closer and whispered at my ear.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「誰から聞いたであれ、二度とその言葉を口にするな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Whoever you heard it from, do not ever say it out loud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Whoever you heard it from, do not ever say it out loud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そして、決して関わるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And keep your nose out of it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And keep your nose out of it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is that clear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is that clear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当に存在するんだ…闇の執行部…。
MESSAGE.EN: They really exist... Darkness Executives...
MESSAGE.Translation: They really exist... Darkness Executives...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、そいつらのせいで、いや、そいつらと敵対する女の子に殺されかけたんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I was almost killed by a girl who's their enemy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I was almost killed by a girl who's their enemy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っと、恭介ならなんらかの策を講じてくれる。いつでもそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke will figure out what to do, he always does.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke will figure out what to do, he always does.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「悪いが…俺にはどうしてやることもできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry, but there's nothing I can do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry, but there's nothing I can do...❞

MESSAGE.EN: What?!
MESSAGE.Translation: What?!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな…どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... Why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... Why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「奴らは俺の天敵のような存在なんだ。俺の弱点を奴らは知っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They're the worst kind of enemy for me. They know my weakness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They're the worst kind of enemy for me. They know my weakness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の弱点…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke's weakness...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke's weakness...

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: What could it be...
MESSAGE.Translation: What could it be...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴の存在だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな…恭介が動くと、鈴に危険が及ぶってこと…。
MESSAGE.EN: No way... Will Kyousuke's involvement put Rin into danger...?
MESSAGE.Translation: No way... Will Kyousuke's involvement put Rin into danger...?

MESSAGE.JP: してくれとばかりに、恭介は目を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke closed his eyes, as if saying he could talk no more.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke closed his eyes, as if saying he could talk no more.

MESSAGE.JP: は呆然としたまま、教室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Completely dismayed, I left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Completely dismayed, I left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: ると、なぜか恭介は笑顔になった。
MESSAGE.EN: Then suddenly a smile flickered across his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then suddenly a smile flickered across his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんだよっ、気に入ってくれたのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't tell me you enjoyed it that much?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't tell me you enjoyed it that much?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よしっ、それ以上何も言うな。俺に話しかけんな。俺は熱く語りすぎちまうからなっ、ネタバレしちまうぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, don't say anything. Don't talk to me, or I'm gonna blurt out everything. You don't wanna get spoilered, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, don't say anything. Don't talk to me, or I'm gonna blurt out everything. You don't wanna get spoilered, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だからしばらく俺に近づくなよ、やべぇぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stay away from me for a while, or things will get bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stay away from me for a while, or things will get bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やばいのはこっちだって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Things already are bad for me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Things already are bad for me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ものすごい感情移入度だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're totally into it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're totally into it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、いい。たっぷり楽しむんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Anyway, make sure you enjoy yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Anyway, make sure you enjoy yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱりこれはお遊びだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So it was one of Kyousuke's games after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: So it was one of Kyousuke's games after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 介はそれを知ってるし、だったら危険はないということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There should be no real danger if Kyousuke has his hand in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There should be no real danger if Kyousuke has his hand in it.

MESSAGE.JP: ら、もう少しだけ付き合ってあげてもいいかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: No harm playing along for a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: No harm playing along for a while...

MESSAGE.JP: も今の口ぶりだと、珍しく恭介主導ではないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But judging from the way he talked, he's not the one pulling the strings this time?
MESSAGE.Translation: But judging from the way he talked, he's not the one pulling the strings this time?

MESSAGE.JP: 介なら、しらを切っていたはずだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Were it Kyousuke's idea, he would keep feigning ignorance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Were it Kyousuke's idea, he would keep feigning ignorance.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと安心して、教室に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to the classroom, feeling relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to the classroom, feeling relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: は立ち止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped in tracks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped in tracks.

MESSAGE.JP: か胸騒ぎを覚えて。
MESSAGE.EN: A feeling of anxiety came over me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A feeling of anxiety came over me.

MESSAGE.JP: 自然に静かだ…。誰もいない…。
MESSAGE.EN: An eerie quiet... Not a soul around...
MESSAGE.Translation: An eerie quiet... Not a soul around...

MESSAGE.JP: だ休み時間なのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Recess shouldn't be over yet...
MESSAGE.Translation: Recess shouldn't be over yet...

MESSAGE.JP: 質な気配がした…。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt the presence of something otherworldly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt the presence of something otherworldly.

MESSAGE.JP: れは…影だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was... a shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was... a shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 下の端にできた陽からの死角。
MESSAGE.EN: At the far side of the hallway, protected from sunlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the far side of the hallway, protected from sunlight.

MESSAGE.JP: の影の中…人の形がうっすらと見える…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something human-shaped could be seen in the shadow...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something human-shaped could be seen in the shadow...

MESSAGE.JP: 持ち悪い。頭がくらくらする。
MESSAGE.EN: Sick. I felt my head spinning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sick. I felt my head spinning.

MESSAGE.JP: るで異世界に迷い込んだようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like I stepped into a parallel world...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like I stepped into a parallel world...

MESSAGE.JP: れはほんとに余興なの…？　恭介…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is this really a game? Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: Is this really a game? Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: んな不気味なのって、らしくないよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something this creepy is so unlike you...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something this creepy is so unlike you...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『２年Ｅ組出席番号２２番、直枝理樹』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Second year, class E, attendance number 22, Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Second year, class E, attendance number 22, Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そいつが喋った。
MESSAGE.EN: It spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: It spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『２年Ｅ組出席番号２２番、直枝理樹』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Second year, class E, attendance number 22, Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Second year, class E, attendance number 22, Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: り返した。僕がなんの反応も見せなかったためか。
MESSAGE.EN: It repeated itself. Was it because I showed no reaction?
MESSAGE.Translation: It repeated itself. Was it because I showed no reaction?

MESSAGE.JP: は小さな闇に目を凝らす。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked intently at the small shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked intently at the small shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『TK-010がおまえと接触した』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛TK-010 has come into contact with you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛TK-010 has come into contact with you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『心当たりがあるだろう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛I believe you know what I am talking about.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛I believe you know what I am talking about.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『それは誰だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛Of their identity.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛Of their identity.❜

MESSAGE.JP: んだ…何を訊かれているんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Is it asking me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it asking me...?

MESSAGE.JP: えようもなく、黙っているしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had nothing to say to it, so I said nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had nothing to say to it, so I said nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『そうか…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛I see...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛I see...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『なら今回の件を含むイレギュラーな事態、現象を誰にも話すな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛Then, don't tell anyone of anything irregular that happens to you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛Then, don't tell anyone of anything irregular that happens to you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『我ら闇の執行部の存在もだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛And about us, Darkness Executives.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛And about us, Darkness Executives.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『これは警告だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛Consider this a warning.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛Consider this a warning.❜

MESSAGE.JP: はすぐにも恭介に相談したかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to seek help from Kyousuke immediately.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to seek help from Kyousuke immediately.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「話したら…どうするつもりなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What will happen... if I tell anyone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What will happen... if I tell anyone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『棗は脅威だ。だが、その妹はそうでもない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛Natsume is a threat. His sister, though, not so much.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛Natsume is a threat. His sister, though, not so much.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『その捕獲に回ろう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛We shall capture her at once.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛We shall capture her at once.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「待って、誰にも言わないからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, I'm not gonna tell anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, I'm not gonna tell anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなふうに脅されては従うしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no choice but to acquiesce.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no choice but to acquiesce.

MESSAGE.JP: の声は伝わっただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: My words must have reached it.
MESSAGE.Translation: My words must have reached it.

MESSAGE.JP: つの間にか闇は薄らいでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: The shadow was growing thinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: The shadow was growing thinner.

MESSAGE.JP: 徒たちの雑多な話し声が耳に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: The noise of the crowd was back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The noise of the crowd was back.

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち去ったか。
MESSAGE.EN: It's gone...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's gone...

MESSAGE.JP: は確信する。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no room left for doubt.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no room left for doubt.

MESSAGE.JP: かるんだ、恭介の遊びなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was one of Kyousuke's games...
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was one of Kyousuke's games...

MESSAGE.JP: こには底抜けの楽しさと、活気があった。
MESSAGE.EN: It would be much more fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would be much more fun.

MESSAGE.JP: を使って脅したりするなんて…まったく逆じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: He wouldn't threaten to do harm to Rin...
MESSAGE.Translation: He wouldn't threaten to do harm to Rin...

MESSAGE.JP: 湿すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: This is simply shameful.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is simply shameful.

MESSAGE.JP: のも、朱鷺戸沙耶という女の子も、僕の敵だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That thing and Saya Tokido, they are my enemies.
MESSAGE.Translation: That thing and Saya Tokido, they are my enemies.

MESSAGE.JP: 方にいたっては、命を狙う危険な相手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone is after me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone is after me.

MESSAGE.JP: たして…
MESSAGE.EN: Will I really...
MESSAGE.Translation: Will I really...

MESSAGE.JP: 介の助けを借りず、僕ひとりで戦っていけるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...make it through without Kyousuke's help...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...make it through without Kyousuke's help...?

MESSAGE.JP: うやく教室に辿りつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally I got to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally I got to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうした、誰かにいびられたような顔して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up? You look like someone picked on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up? You look like someone picked on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かなか的確だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's pretty spot-on.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's pretty spot-on.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、真人を巻き込むのも可哀想だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I can't get Masato involved either.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I can't get Masato involved either.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その通り。上級生にいびられちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Exactly. I was picked on by a senior.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Exactly. I was picked on by a senior.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな時はいつだって、恭介が立ち上がってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: At times like this, Kyousuke would always stick up for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: At times like this, Kyousuke would always stick up for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@『よし、いくぞ、りき！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's go, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's go, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: のに、相手は妹の鈴ならいつでも襲えると、そう脅されている…。
MESSAGE.EN: But now that his sister, Rin, was practically being held hostage...
MESSAGE.Translation: But now that his sister, Rin, was practically being held hostage...

MESSAGE.JP: かに、それが唯一の弱点だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a doubt that was his only weakness...
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a doubt that was his only weakness...

MESSAGE.JP: も、卑怯すぎるじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was so underhanded...
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was so underhanded...

MESSAGE.JP: も今回は先手を打たれた。
MESSAGE.EN: They have the upper hand this time around.
MESSAGE.Translation: They have the upper hand this time around.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰に？　何に？
MESSAGE.EN: They...? But who are they?
MESSAGE.Translation: They...? But who are they?

MESSAGE.JP: 闇の執行部に。
MESSAGE.EN: Darkness Executives.
MESSAGE.Translation: Darkness Executives.

MESSAGE.JP: はそんな漫画みたいな連中が存在することを信じてるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Do I actually believe in something that sounds as though it came straight from a manga?
MESSAGE.Translation: Do I actually believe in something that sounds as though it came straight from a manga?

MESSAGE.JP: 在したじゃないか。滑稽なほどリアルに。
MESSAGE.EN: But that thing was there, I saw it with my very own eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that thing was there, I saw it with my very own eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ごと、漫画の世界に迷い込んじゃったんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Did I wander into the world of manga?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I wander into the world of manga?

MESSAGE.JP: れぐらい突拍子もない。
MESSAGE.EN: It actually felt that irrational.
MESSAGE.Translation: It actually felt that irrational.

MESSAGE.JP: らは闇に存在しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They exist in the shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: They exist in the shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: なんてどこにでもある。
MESSAGE.EN: But shadows are everywhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: But shadows are everywhere.

MESSAGE.JP: ら、机の中の奧だって闇だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Like my desk has one right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like my desk has one right now.

MESSAGE.JP: はそこから突然手が伸びてきて、自分のお腹をつかまれる想像をして寒気が…
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking of how a hand could come of out it and grab me sent chills down my spine...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking of how a hand could come of out it and grab me sent chills down my spine...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「元気だせよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Cheer up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Cheer up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: イミングよく肩を捕まれ僕は飛び上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost jumped out my skin when someone grabbed me by the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost jumped out my skin when someone grabbed me by the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おおっ、飛び上がるほど励みになったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Woah, that cheered you up a bit too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Woah, that cheered you up a bit too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「超びびりましたから…しかも授業中ですから静かにしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You scared me... Class isn't over yet, keep quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You scared me... Class isn't over yet, keep quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「そこぉ、うるさいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝You over there, stop talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝You over there, stop talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、何があっても筋肉がついてりゃ大丈夫さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, nothing to be scared of as long as you have muscle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, nothing to be scared of as long as you have muscle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに突然机の中から手が伸びてきても、真人の腹筋なら跳ね返せそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: With Masato's muscle, it's not impossible to fight off a hand coming out of a desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: With Masato's muscle, it's not impossible to fight off a hand coming out of a desk.

MESSAGE.JP: は生まれて初めて、真人の筋肉をうらやましく思ったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: For the first time ever, I felt jealous of Masato's muscle...
MESSAGE.Translation: For the first time ever, I felt jealous of Masato's muscle...

MESSAGE.JP: てこの休み時間はどうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Now then, what should I do during my break?
MESSAGE.Translation: Now then, what should I do during my break?

MESSAGE.JP: んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll take a nap...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll take a nap...

MESSAGE.JP: 休みになると同時に、真人は謙吾を捕まえに席を立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Right after the beginning of lunch break, Masato moved in to capture Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right after the beginning of lunch break, Masato moved in to capture Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「昼ぐらい一緒に食ってもいいんじゃねぇか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't it okay to at least eat with us during lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't it okay to at least eat with us during lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と謙吾の席に手を置いて向かい合う。
MESSAGE.EN: He leaned on Kengo's desk and confronted him.
MESSAGE.Translation: He leaned on Kengo's desk and confronted him.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうせその後、くだらないことに付き合わされるんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You'll force me into doing something unreasonable right afterward, anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You'll force me into doing something unreasonable right afterward, anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「野球のことか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you talking about baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you talking about baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、そうなるだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, you aren't wrong about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, you aren't wrong about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりは何も知らない。いつも通りの調子だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of them know anything, they're acting as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of them know anything, they're acting as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんときは右手で竹刀持って、左手にバット持てばいいじゃねぇか。同時に振ってたら、一本取りながら、ホームラン打てるかもしれねぇだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You can hold a shinai in your right hand and a bat in your left. Just swing them simultaneously, and you'll score both a point and a home run at the same time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You can hold a shinai in your right hand and a bat in your left. Just swing them simultaneously, and you'll score both a point and a home run at the same time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmph...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑に付される。
MESSAGE.EN: He smirked once.
MESSAGE.Translation: He smirked once.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだてめぇ、今の笑いは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that smirk just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that smirk just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@$S024「そんな奇跡起こりません、それよりも目の前の筋肉が邪魔で黒板が見えません、まだノート写してる途中なのでその無駄な筋肉どけてもらえますか？とでも言いたげだな!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@$S020❝Such a miracle won't happen, and more importantly, this Muscle is blocking your view to the blackboard; you didn't finish copying it to your notes yet, but this stupid Muscle is getting in your way... is that what you meant!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@$S020❝Such a miracle won't happen, and more importantly, this Muscle is blocking your view to the blackboard; you didn't finish copying it to your notes yet, but this stupid Muscle is getting in your way... is that what you meant!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はつっこむことも忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was too out of sorts to retort.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was too out of sorts to retort.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、そんなことないと思うから（でたぁ！　ものすごい言いがかりだ！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way, no way, I don't think he meant that at all (here comes another one of Masato's over-the-top interpretations!).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way, no way, I don't think he meant that at all (here comes another one of Masato's over-the-top interpretations!).❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「その通りだ、邪魔だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Exactly, you're in the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Exactly, you're in the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れをあっさり謙吾は肯定してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo immediately affirmed his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo immediately affirmed his words.

MESSAGE.JP: れは謙吾の中で何かが切れた、という合図だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a signal of something snapping inside Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a signal of something snapping inside Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ、なんだ、おまえ、もっぺん言ってみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, what's that, you... just try and say it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, what's that, you... just try and say it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「邪魔だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're in the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're in the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 室内の空気が凍てつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything went still in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything went still in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: たりのでかい男が一触即発の様相で睨み合っているのだ。当然とも言えよう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was natural, since the two huge boys had reached an explosive situation and were now glaring at one another.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was natural, since the two huge boys had reached an explosive situation and were now glaring at one another.

MESSAGE.JP: はなんとなく思い出す。そうだこれからの喧嘩には、恭介の考えたルールが適応されるはずだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason I remembered that Kyousuke's rules should apply to their fight.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason I remembered that Kyousuke's rules should apply to their fight.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふたりとも、ダメだって、ほら恭介の考えたルールに則らないと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You two, cut it out, follow the rules Kyousuke came up with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You two, cut it out, follow the rules Kyousuke came up with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ルール？　なんだそれは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Rules? What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Rules? What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹…こいつと、やるときだけは、んなもん関係ねぇんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki... This has absolutely nothing to do with that right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki... This has absolutely nothing to do with that right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人も完全に頭に血が上ってしまっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was completely enraged.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was completely enraged.

MESSAGE.JP: にできることは…
MESSAGE.EN: What I could do was...
MESSAGE.Translation: What I could do was...

MESSAGE.JP: 介を探しにいくことだけど…
MESSAGE.EN: I should be looking for Kyousuke, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should be looking for Kyousuke, but...

MESSAGE.JP: 気味な影に脅されている中、会いに行ってもいいものだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Can I afford the luxury, being threatened by an ominous shadow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can I afford the luxury, being threatened by an ominous shadow?

MESSAGE.JP: は躊躇った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was uncertain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was uncertain.

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Its words popped into my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Its words popped into my head.

MESSAGE.JP: なら今回の件を含むイレギュラーな事態、現象を誰にも話すな』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Then, don't tell anyone of anything irregular that happens to you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Then, don't tell anyone of anything irregular that happens to you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 段通りならば、接しても問題はないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If things unfold like they always did, they should be okay.
MESSAGE.Translation: If things unfold like they always did, they should be okay.

MESSAGE.JP: の前のふたりは互いの服の襟をつかみ合っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: They were holding each other by the collar before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were holding each other by the collar before me.

MESSAGE.JP: っと大丈夫だ…行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: They should be fine... I shall go.
MESSAGE.Translation: They should be fine... I shall go.

MESSAGE.JP: は走り出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran off.

MESSAGE.JP: けないことに恭介を探しにいくことだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...miserably succumb to my only option - try and find Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...miserably succumb to my only option - try and find Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうわけで、恭介を探して校舎中を走り回る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's why I began running around the school trying to find him.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's why I began running around the school trying to find him.

MESSAGE.JP: 下の掲示板に、恭介の名を見つけ、立ち止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I screeched to a halt when I noticed Kyousuke's name written on the bulletin board in the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I screeched to a halt when I noticed Kyousuke's name written on the bulletin board in the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: んの張り紙だ？
MESSAGE.EN: What's that poster?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's that poster?

MESSAGE.JP: こには…
MESSAGE.EN: It read...
MESSAGE.Translation: It read...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の一問一答』
MESSAGE.EN: [Kyousuke's One Question - One Answer]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Kyousuke's One Question - One Answer]

MESSAGE.JP: わあ、わけがわからない！
MESSAGE.EN: Whoa, now what's that supposed to mean!
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoa, now what's that supposed to mean!

MESSAGE.JP: やってんだ、あの人は…。
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world is he thinking of...
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world is he thinking of...

MESSAGE.JP: Ｒコードがついてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's a QR code attached...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's a QR code attached...

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず読み込んでおいて、後でなんなのか確認しよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should read it into my cellphone for starters, and see what it's about later.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should read it into my cellphone for starters, and see what it's about later.

MESSAGE.JP: Ｒコードを携帯に収めておく。
MESSAGE.EN: I loaded the QR code into my phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I loaded the QR code into my phone.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ、急がなきゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, I have to hurry.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, I have to hurry.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこにいるんだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where is he...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where is he...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の姿を見つけることは出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't find him anywhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't find him anywhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒Ａ@「今度は体育館だってよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student A@❝This time in the gym!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student A@❝This time in the gym!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒Ｂ@「いそがねえと見逃しちまうなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student B@❝You're gonna miss it if you don't hurry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student B@❝You're gonna miss it if you don't hurry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 足でそんな会話をする生徒たちとすれ違う。
MESSAGE.EN: This is what the students were saying as they hurriedly passed each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is what the students were saying as they hurriedly passed each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「体育館かっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The gym, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The gym, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかしたら、恭介もすでにそっちにいるのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps, Kyousuke would already be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps, Kyousuke would already be there.

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず行ってみることにしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should check it out for myself for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should check it out for myself for now.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭を抜ける事にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I took off toward the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took off toward the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: の学校では、渡り廊下を挟んで校門側を『中庭』、体育館側を『裏庭』と呼んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: The students refer to the area between the gates and the connecting corridor as the ❛courtyard❜ and the area between the gym and the corridor as the ❛backyard.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The students refer to the area between the gates and the connecting corridor as the ❛courtyard❜ and the area between the gym and the corridor as the ❛backyard.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 体を指して『中庭』ということが多いけど、限定的に使うときに『裏庭』という単語を使うようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though some students like to relax in the backyard under the shady comfort of the trees, all in all not so many come here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though some students like to relax in the backyard under the shady comfort of the trees, all in all not so many come here.

MESSAGE.JP: 部の生徒は木の多い、落ち着いた雰囲気の裏庭を利用する事もあるが、基本的に人はまばらだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The word courtyard is applied to the whole area if there's no need to make a distinction between the halves.
MESSAGE.Translation: The word courtyard is applied to the whole area if there's no need to make a distinction between the halves.

MESSAGE.JP: 早足で通り抜けようとしていると。
MESSAGE.EN: I was moving quickly, when suddenly...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was moving quickly, when suddenly...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「こっちだ、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝This way, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝This way, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くうっ!!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Jump*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Jump*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@

MESSAGE.JP: うおわああぁああぁーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Woaaah?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Woaaah?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: て、この声には聞き覚えがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, I know whose voice that is.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, I know whose voice that is.

MESSAGE.JP: 然のことだったので、過剰に反応してしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It all happened so suddenly I overreacted a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: It all happened so suddenly I overreacted a bit.

MESSAGE.JP: ろからの声に、僕は振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around, hearing a voice from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around, hearing a voice from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But no one was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But no one was there.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「どこを見ている、こっちだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Where are you looking? Over here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Where are you looking? Over here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: からの声。…姿は見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice was coming from the side... I couldn't see anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice was coming from the side... I couldn't see anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…声で正体はわかるんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I think I know who the voice belongs to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I think I know who the voice belongs to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「出てきてよ、来ヶ谷（くるがや）さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come on out, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come on out, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: き覚えのある声に、そう返答をした。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered to the familiar voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered to the familiar voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「もう出てるけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I already have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I already have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つのまにか、最初向いていた方向に来ヶ谷さんが現れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I knew it, Kurugaya-san had appeared from the direction I was originally heading.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I knew it, Kurugaya-san had appeared from the direction I was originally heading.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「これは『横や後ろばかりじゃなくて、前向きに生きろ』という、わずかな示唆を表してみたわけだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It was merely a little reminder of how you should live ❛always facing forward, without looking back or getting sidetracked.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It was merely a little reminder of how you should live ❛always facing forward, without looking back or getting sidetracked.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いや、だってさっきは後ろと横から声が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But, your voice was coming from behind me, and then from the side...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But, your voice was coming from behind me, and then from the side...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんだ、幻聴か？　あまりよろしくない徴候だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝An auditory hallucination? That's not a good sign.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝An auditory hallucination? That's not a good sign.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…確かに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, no doubt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, no doubt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや耳も精神も至って正常だけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing wrong with either my hearing or my mental health.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing wrong with either my hearing or my mental health.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあただの反響による誤聴だろう。中庭はそういう構造になっているしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you probably misheard due to the echo. That's just how the courtyard is built.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you probably misheard due to the echo. That's just how the courtyard is built.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、さすがに真正面の声が真後ろから聞こえるのは明らかにおかしいと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, hearing a voice coming from right in front of you as though it was coming from behind is clearly abnormal...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, hearing a voice coming from right in front of you as though it was coming from behind is clearly abnormal...

MESSAGE.JP: なみに来ヶ谷さんはいつもこうで、ちょくちょく僕は悪戯に付き合わされている。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, Kurugaya-san is always playing pranks on me like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, Kurugaya-san is always playing pranks on me like this.

MESSAGE.JP: こか掴み所がなくて、常に自分のペースに他人まで巻き込む、クラスでもどこか浮いた存在。
MESSAGE.EN: She never misses an opening, and always gets other people dragged into her own pace; even in class she seems to exist in a realm of her own...
MESSAGE.Translation: She never misses an opening, and always gets other people dragged into her own pace; even in class she seems to exist in a realm of her own...

MESSAGE.JP: んなのが来ヶ谷さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's just the way she is.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's just the way she is.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ところで、理樹君がこんなところで何を油売っている？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, Riki-kun, what are you fooling around here for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, Riki-kun, what are you fooling around here for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さっきいつもの馬鹿ふたりと棗兄妹が体育館のほうに向かっていったが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Just a while ago, those two idiots and the Natsume siblings went off toward the gym.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Just a while ago, those two idiots and the Natsume siblings went off toward the gym.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、やっぱり恭介もか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, so Kyousuke really did go there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, so Kyousuke really did go there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すがというかなんというか、恭介はすでに先回りをしていたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if I should say it was to be expected of Kyousuke, but it seems he's already gone on ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if I should say it was to be expected of Kyousuke, but it seems he's already gone on ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…フフフ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Fufufu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Fufufu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは僕を見て、突然笑い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san suddenly started laughing, looking at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san suddenly started laughing, looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いや、理樹君は何故そんなに懸命なのか、と思ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Nothing, I was just wondering what you were looking so worried about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Nothing, I was just wondering what you were looking so worried about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それは滑稽なものだ。キミにはあの馬鹿ふたりを止めることなど出来ないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's amusing. You can't stop those two fools by yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's amusing. You can't stop those two fools by yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「とはいっても、それは嘲笑するものではない。ただ、キミが微笑ましくてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But, I'm not making fun of you. It's just that you're so charming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But, I'm not making fun of you. It's just that you're so charming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何だかよく解らない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't really understand what she was trying to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't really understand what she was trying to say.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、ここでこうして出会ったのも何かの縁だ。お茶でも飲んでいくがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, us meeting here like this must be fate. Let's have some tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, us meeting here like this must be fate. Let's have some tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、みんなのとこに行かないと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, if I don't go where everyone else is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, if I don't go where everyone else is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そんなことはどうでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It doesn't matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It doesn't matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よくないからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It does.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It does.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ええいうるさい黙れこの与太郎が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Quit your blabbering already, you fool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Quit your blabbering already, you fool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、怖いから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're scaring me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're scaring me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「逃げたら殺す。声を上げても殺す。助けを呼んでも殺す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Try to escape, you're dead. Raise your voice, you're dead. Cry for help, you're dead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Try to escape, you're dead. Raise your voice, you're dead. Cry for help, you're dead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…しょうがないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You leave me no choice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You leave me no choice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、まあ一人でいるのにもそろそろ飽きてきたところでな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Excellent, I was just getting tired of being alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Excellent, I was just getting tired of being alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、キミならちょうどいい話し相手になりそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, you look like just the right person to talk with right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, you look like just the right person to talk with right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔の来ヶ谷さんに腕を引っ張られ、中庭の片隅へ連れ込まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was smiling as she dragged me to the corner of the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was smiling as she dragged me to the corner of the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: こには、ぼろぼろの木箱と、美術室で使っていたと思われる、背もたれのない丸椅子がいくつか。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a worn-out wooden crate there, along with a few round stools like those used in the art classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a worn-out wooden crate there, along with a few round stools like those used in the art classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、ちょっとしたカフェテラスだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, this is a small sidewalk cafe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, this is a small sidewalk cafe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慢気に言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She proudly proclaimed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She proudly proclaimed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、ロケーションは悪くないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's a good location...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's a good location...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 舎側からも、中庭の歩道からも死角になっているポジション。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hidden in a blind spot, whether looking from the school building or the pathway in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hidden in a blind spot, whether looking from the school building or the pathway in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 々が揺れると、わずかに差し込む木漏れ日の光の点が、木箱のテーブルを動き回る。
MESSAGE.EN: Sunlight was sifting through the leaves of the slowly swaying trees, pouring over the wooden crate serving as a table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sunlight was sifting through the leaves of the slowly swaying trees, pouring over the wooden crate serving as a table.

MESSAGE.JP: もまあ、やっぱりぼろぼろで埃だらけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But regardless of how I looked at it, it was still worn-out and covered in a layer of dust.
MESSAGE.Translation: But regardless of how I looked at it, it was still worn-out and covered in a layer of dust.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ロケーションが悪くないならいいじゃないか。他になにがいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't it enough that it's a good location? What else do you need?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't it enough that it's a good location? What else do you need?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ちゃんとしたインテリア、かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...A proper interior would be nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...A proper interior would be nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ちゃんとしていないわけではないぞ。十分使える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There's no way it's not proper. It's plenty usable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There's no way it's not proper. It's plenty usable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「これはわびさびがあるというんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's beautiful because of its simplicity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's beautiful because of its simplicity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、わびとさびしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, there isn't anything to it besides its simplicity.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, there isn't anything to it besides its simplicity.

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは丸椅子にちょこんと腰掛けると、こちらを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat down on one of the chairs and gazed at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat down on one of the chairs and gazed at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「見ろ、私がこうしていると、まるで中世の良家の令嬢を描いた絵画のようだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Look, when I sit here like this, it's like a painting of a medieval girl from a rich family.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Look, when I sit here like this, it's like a painting of a medieval girl from a rich family.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「黙ってれば、割とね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝More or less, if you don't speak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝More or less, if you don't speak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こうしてみると、見た目も割とそれっぽいかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess she did look the part.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess she did look the part.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…テーブルと椅子がぼろぼろじゃなければ、結構絵になるかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...If the table and chairs weren't so worn-out, it could become a decent enough painting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...If the table and chairs weren't so worn-out, it could become a decent enough painting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と率直な感想。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a relatively honest impression.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a relatively honest impression.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、まあこれじゃどこの没落貴族のお嬢様だって感じだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hahaha, well, it gives the impression of a daughter of some impoverished aristocrat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hahaha, well, it gives the impression of a daughter of some impoverished aristocrat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 快に笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed heartily.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed heartily.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱりどう考えてもマイセンのティーセットよりは、ラム酒を一瓶抱えているほうが似合うと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how you look it, holding a bottle of rum would suit her better than a Meissen tea set.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how you look it, holding a bottle of rum would suit her better than a Meissen tea set.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、理樹君も一つ腰掛けたまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, have a seat, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, have a seat, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: からもうひとつ椅子を引っ張り出してくると、それを自分の対面に据えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took another chair and placed it on the other side, opposite herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took another chair and placed it on the other side, opposite herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そこまでゆっくりしてる時間は…喧嘩も気になるし、数学の準備もしないといけないし、他にも妙なことがあって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't be lounging around here... I'm worried about a fight breaking out, and I have to get ready for math class. Besides, there's something else on my mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't be lounging around here... I'm worried about a fight breaking out, and I have to get ready for math class. Besides, there's something else on my mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そこまでゆっくりしてる時間は…喧嘩も気になるし、数学の準備もしないといけないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't be lounging around here... I'm worried about a fight breaking out, and I have to get ready for math class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't be lounging around here... I'm worried about a fight breaking out, and I have to get ready for math class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、そんなことはどうでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, something like that doesn't matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, something like that doesn't matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よくないってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm telling you it does.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm telling you it does.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「無視しろ、バックれろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ignore and disregard it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ignore and disregard it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まずいでしょ、それ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's dangerous...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's dangerous...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、来ヶ谷さんはよく授業中にいないことがある、ということを思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I suddenly recalled that she was often absent from class.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I suddenly recalled that she was often absent from class.

MESSAGE.JP: んというか、浮世離れした人、という言葉がしっくり来る…。
MESSAGE.EN: How should I put it... she seems completely detached from the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: How should I put it... she seems completely detached from the world.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「喧嘩は、どうせキミが行っても何も出来ない。数学は…まあ、気にせずともよい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝As for the fight, you won't be able to do anything about it anyway. As for math... Well, you don't need to worry about that either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝As for the fight, you won't be able to do anything about it anyway. As for math... Well, you don't need to worry about that either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よくはないでしょ。何も出来ないのは、そうかもしれないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's no good. My not being able to do anything is probably true, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's no good. My not being able to do anything is probably true, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…キミにはお茶を飲む行為に対する愛が欠如しているだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I don't think you have enough passion for enjoying tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I don't think you have enough passion for enjoying tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃそんなところに愛はないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「というか断る理由がわからん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I still can't understand the reason why you'd even refuse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I still can't understand the reason why you'd even refuse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「私は可愛らしい女学生であろう？　この年頃の男子ならば喜んで誘いを受けそうなものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm an attractive girl. A boy of your age should be overjoyed to accept such an offer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm an attractive girl. A boy of your age should be overjoyed to accept such an offer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「少年はあれか？　ホモの類か？　そっち系の人か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, could you be that? A homo? Are you one of those?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, could you be that? A homo? Are you one of those?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んなわけないでしょ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course I'm not!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course I'm not!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…ふむ、少年の心はまこと度し難い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Fumu, you have a complicated heart, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Fumu, you have a complicated heart, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ちょうどいい、そこのところをゆるりと語り合おう、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This is just as well. Let's take our time and thoroughly discuss everything, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This is just as well. Let's take our time and thoroughly discuss everything, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、あの…だからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, um... like I've been trying to say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, um... like I've been trying to say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まずはホモと友情って紙一重だよね、という議題からだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝First of all, the line between gay relationship and friendship is drawn in water, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝First of all, the line between gay relationship and friendship is drawn in water, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、すっごいしたくないからその議論っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't really want to talk about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't really want to talk about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、言うこと聞かないとエンドレスで理屈をこねられそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There would be no end to this pointless argument since she wasn't paying any heed to what I was saying.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There would be no end to this pointless argument since she wasn't paying any heed to what I was saying.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああもう、ちょっとだけだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Geez, just for a little while, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Geez, just for a little while, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむうむ、いい子だ。初めから素直にそう言えばいいのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, good boy. You should've just been honest and said so to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, good boy. You should've just been honest and said so to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「素直に断ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was being honest when I refused.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was being honest when I refused.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、とため息をつきながら、丸椅子に腰を下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a sigh and sat down on the stool.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a sigh and sat down on the stool.

MESSAGE.JP: たっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Crack*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crack*.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うあああっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woaah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woaah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 子の足が外れてそのまま地面に投げ出される。
MESSAGE.EN: The chair legs came off, and I simply flopped onto the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chair legs came off, and I simply flopped onto the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは。いや、物の見事に引っかかったな少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha. You fell for it so easily, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha. You fell for it so easily, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地悪な笑みを浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled wickedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled wickedly.

MESSAGE.JP: 対、これがやりたかっただけだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: She totally just wanted to pull this off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She totally just wanted to pull this off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…帰る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm going back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm going back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「待て、今のはほんの冗談だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hold on, that was only a joke just now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hold on, that was only a joke just now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふう…なんでわざわざこんなことするのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Humph... Why exactly did you do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Humph... Why exactly did you do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんで、とな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why, you ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why, you ask?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「……楽しいからでは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Because it's fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Because it's fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、楽しいかもしれないけど、わざわざここまで仕込んでやることなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, maybe it's fun, but why did you go to such lengths to prepare all of this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, maybe it's fun, but why did you go to such lengths to prepare all of this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「私にはその質問のほうが疑問だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝For me, that question is an even greater mystery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝For me, that question is an even greater mystery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ただの『楽』という感情から沸き起こる衝動だろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's an impulse that is generated by the emotion of ❛fun.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's an impulse that is generated by the emotion of ❛fun.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「衝動にそれ以上の理屈などない。理由を求めたところで、状況とそれに関わる不文律がそこにあるだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There can be no reason beyond that, in an impulse. If you seek more, you can find only unwritten rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There can be no reason beyond that, in an impulse. If you seek more, you can find only unwritten rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はぁ…うん、解ったから壊れてない椅子はあるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha... Yes, I understand, so is there a chair that isn't broken?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha... Yes, I understand, so is there a chair that isn't broken?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れる。ホント疲れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was tired. Really tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was tired. Really tired.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふむ、まあ別にキミが憎くてやったわけではない、とだけ伝えておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu, it's not like I did this to you out of hatred, that's what I wanted to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu, it's not like I did this to you out of hatred, that's what I wanted to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは僕に椅子を差し出しながら、そう呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She muttered, pushing another chair to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She muttered, pushing another chair to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「少年はいじられキャラだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's just the type of person you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's just the type of person you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんなのさ、それ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's that supposed to mean...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's that supposed to mean...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ついつい構ってしまいたくなる。母性本能をくすぐるタイプというか、な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're the kind of person one unconsciously starts caring about. The kind that invokes maternal instinct.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're the kind of person one unconsciously starts caring about. The kind that invokes maternal instinct.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、自分ではそんな難儀なキャラになりたくないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't really want to be made into that kind of a complex character.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't really want to be made into that kind of a complex character.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうか？　割と褒め言葉なんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Really? I've been more or less praising you though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Really? I've been more or less praising you though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「可愛いものは好きだよ、私は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I love cute things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I love cute things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、およそ来ヶ谷さんの普段の雰囲気に似つかわしくない、無邪気な笑みを浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: She flashed an innocent smile that didn't match her usual aura at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She flashed an innocent smile that didn't match her usual aura at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなもんなの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that how it is...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that how it is...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ああ、そうなのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yes, that's how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yes, that's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きながら、僕は差し出された椅子に腰を下ろす。今度はちゃんとした椅子みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Listening to her, I sat down on the chair she set out for me. This time it seemed to be a normal chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Listening to her, I sat down on the chair she set out for me. This time it seemed to be a normal chair.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「先ほどの非礼を詫びよう。まあ、缶コーヒーでも飲んで落ち着きたまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry for my rudeness earlier. Well, drink some canned coffee and relax.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry for my rudeness earlier. Well, drink some canned coffee and relax.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは冷たい缶コーヒーを僕に差し出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a cup of cold canned coffee.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a cup of cold canned coffee.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、うん…ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、キムチも食え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, have some kimchi too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, have some kimchi too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、とキムチのビンとスプーンをテーブルに載せる。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted a bottle of kimchi onto the table and set a spoon beside it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted a bottle of kimchi onto the table and set a spoon beside it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっちはいらないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't need any...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't need any...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「残念だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's a pity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's a pity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、どこから出したんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, where did she take this from...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, where did she take this from...

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、来ヶ谷さんと差し向かいの奇妙なお茶会を続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The strange dialogue continued as we enjoyed our tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: The strange dialogue continued as we enjoyed our tea.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「自販機というのはいいものだな。３分間でもティータイムに出来る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝A vending machine is a great thing. Even if you only have three minutes, you can have yourself a tea time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝A vending machine is a great thing. Even if you only have three minutes, you can have yourself a tea time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう３分はとっくに過ぎてるけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Three minutes went by quite a while ago, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Three minutes went by quite a while ago, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いいじゃないか。そもそも時間などルーズなものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't that fine? Time is a ❛loose❜ concept to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't that fine? Time is a ❛loose❜ concept to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「多分テレビの時計が少しずつずれていったとしても、誰も気づかないくらい、な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Even if the TV clock were gradually lagging behind, nobody would probably notice at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Even if the TV clock were gradually lagging behind, nobody would probably notice at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「場所によって時間が変わったり、もしかすると万物全てに同じ時間が流れているわけでもないかもしれないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Time changes depending on the place, so it could be that the flow of time isn't the same for everyone at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Time changes depending on the place, so it could be that the flow of time isn't the same for everyone at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それに束縛されて数字にして、解ったような気になるのはどうかと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I just don't see why people think they have fully understood what time is by indicating it with a number and by being constrained by it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I just don't see why people think they have fully understood what time is by indicating it with a number and by being constrained by it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そんなパラドックスな理論振りかざしても、時間はどんどん過ぎてってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, no matter this paradoxal theory, time will not stop flowing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, no matter this paradoxal theory, time will not stop flowing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「時間がきたらチャイムは鳴るんだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When the time comes, the chime will ring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When the time comes, the chime will ring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「チャイム・ウィル・リング。中々詩的な言葉だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝❛Chime will ring.❜ That's rather poetic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝❛Chime will ring.❜ That's rather poetic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いやいや。やはり理樹君をここに招待して正解だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well well, I knew inviting you was the right thing to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well well, I knew inviting you was the right thing to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとりで満足されてもこっちは全然なんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm glad at least you're so happy about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm glad at least you're so happy about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 局来ヶ谷さんに付き合わされて時間は過ぎていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up spending quite a bit of time together with Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up spending quite a bit of time together with Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: んなこんなで、昼休みの半分近くを使ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus about half of my lunch break was already over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus about half of my lunch break was already over.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の喧嘩は来ヶ谷さんの言葉通り、あっという間に収束してしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as she had said, the fight seemed to have been settled in no time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as she had said, the fight seemed to have been settled in no time.

MESSAGE.JP: 室には、恭介たちの姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't find anyone in the club room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't find anyone in the club room.

MESSAGE.JP: でにメンバー集めを始めているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: They had probably already started to hunt for members.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had probably already started to hunt for members.

MESSAGE.JP: 気味な影との接触が今だに鮮明に思い出され、食欲は正直ない。でもとりあえず何か入れておこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't shake off the vision of the eerie shadow I encountered today and had no appetite... But I still had to have something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't shake off the vision of the eerie shadow I encountered today and had no appetite... But I still had to have something.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとり昼食を食べ損ねてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was the only one to miss lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was the only one to miss lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: とりで遅い昼食をとることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to get myself something to eat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to get myself something to eat.

MESSAGE.JP: 買でパンを買って教室に戻ると、僕の席はクラスメイトの女子が座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: After I bought myself some bread and returned to the classroom, I found a girl from our class occupying my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I bought myself some bread and returned to the classroom, I found a girl from our class occupying my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: の斜め前に座っている女子のグループが食卓を囲んでいるらしく、５人ばかりが楽しげに会話をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a group of five girls sitting around my desk and blithely chatting about something in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a group of five girls sitting around my desk and blithely chatting about something in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: いてもらうのも悪い気がして、僕は声を掛けられない。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt inappropriate to ask them all to leave, so I kept silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt inappropriate to ask them all to leave, so I kept silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 方なく別の場所で食べることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was go and find somewhere else to eat.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was go and find somewhere else to eat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…学食にすればよかったなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I should've just gone to the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I should've just gone to the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食に行けば、大抵恭介に会うことができる。
MESSAGE.EN: If I went to the cafeteria, I'd probably find Kyousuke there.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I went to the cafeteria, I'd probably find Kyousuke there.

MESSAGE.JP: 食でパンを食べると言うのも、ありと言えばありだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't such a bad idea, eating bread in the cafeteria, of course...
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't such a bad idea, eating bread in the cafeteria, of course...

MESSAGE.JP: ごみはあんまり好きじゃないからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wasn't really that fond of crowds...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wasn't really that fond of crowds...

MESSAGE.JP: 下を進み、階段に差し掛かる。
MESSAGE.EN: While making my way along the corridor, I found myself drawing closer to the staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: While making my way along the corridor, I found myself drawing closer to the staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come to think of it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come to think of it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 上には、今日も神北さんがいるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Kamikita-san might be out on the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kamikita-san might be out on the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: 『好きなところだから、ここに来る』。
MESSAGE.EN: ...❛I love this place, that's why I come here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ...❛I love this place, that's why I come here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: と…僕も、屋上と言う場所が好きになってしまっているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems I've come to like it too, to a certain extent.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems I've come to like it too, to a certain extent.

MESSAGE.JP: は上り階段に足をかけ、あの異質な空間の向こうにある、風の気持ちいい場所を目指すことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to ascend the stairs and head for the place beyond that distorted space where I could feel that refreshing breeze again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to ascend the stairs and head for the place beyond that distorted space where I could feel that refreshing breeze again.

MESSAGE.JP: の場所でも、神北さんと話をしたら、ちょっと気が紛れるかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in that place, talking to Kamikita-san could help to keep my mind off things...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in that place, talking to Kamikita-san could help to keep my mind off things...

MESSAGE.JP: は上り階段に足をかけ、あの異質な空間の向こうにある場所を目指すことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to ascend the stairs and head for the place beyond that distorted space.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to ascend the stairs and head for the place beyond that distorted space.

MESSAGE.JP: 汚れた階段を上る。
MESSAGE.EN: I climbed up the squalid staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: I climbed up the squalid staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: 種廃墟のような机と椅子の山を横目に、僕は屋上へと続く窓を前にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Casting a sideways glance at the pile of desks and chairs that resembled some kind of ruins, I proceeded on my way to the rooftop, finally appearing in front of the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: Casting a sideways glance at the pile of desks and chairs that resembled some kind of ruins, I proceeded on my way to the rooftop, finally appearing in front of the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was closed.

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば昨日は置いてあった足場用の椅子がない。桟を見れば、ネジが止まったままになっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The chair previously made into a foothold wasn't in place either. And looking at the sash bar, I found that the screw was in its right place as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chair previously made into a foothold wasn't in place either. And looking at the sash bar, I found that the screw was in its right place as well.

MESSAGE.JP: に仕掛けられていたトラップは影も形も無い。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no sign of the trap that used to be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no sign of the trap that used to be there.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「神北さん、いないのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's not here...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's not here...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はちょっとネジを抜いてみようとしてみたが、やっぱりドライバーがなければどうすることも出来なさそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to draw the screw out a bit, but as expected, I couldn't do anything without a screwdriver.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to draw the screw out a bit, but as expected, I couldn't do anything without a screwdriver.

MESSAGE.JP: 困った、これじゃあホントに居場所がない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This is a problem. At this rate, I'll really have no place to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This is a problem. At this rate, I'll really have no place to go.

MESSAGE.JP: 介たちを探そうかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Should I just go look for everyone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I just go look for everyone...

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを思いながら振り向くと。
MESSAGE.EN: While pondering on this, I turned around, and...
MESSAGE.Translation: While pondering on this, I turned around, and...

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あれ…直枝君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ah... Naoe-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ah... Naoe-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんが階段を上ってきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kamikita-san was climbing up the staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kamikita-san was climbing up the staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと驚いてしまった。あの影と出くわしてから、僕の神経は異様に敏感になっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: It gave me a start. After encountering the shadow, my senses were on high alert.
MESSAGE.Translation: It gave me a start. After encountering the shadow, my senses were on high alert.

MESSAGE.JP: には購買のものと思われる、ビニール袋。何かを買いに行っていたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a plastic bag in her hands. She'd probably gone off to buy something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a plastic bag in her hands. She'd probably gone off to buy something.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんにちは…っていうのはおかしいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good afternoon... it's probably strange to say this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good afternoon... it's probably strange to say this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「別におかしくないと思うよ。こんにちは、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I don't think it's strange at all. Good afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I don't think it's strange at all. Good afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こりと頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a quick bow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a quick bow.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ああ、じゃあ先に開けちゃうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ahh, let me open the window.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ahh, let me open the window.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんは近くの椅子を窓に寄せ、ポケットのドライバーでネジをはずす。
MESSAGE.EN: She put the nearest chair next to the window, and after conjuring a screwdriver out of her pocket, she removed the screw.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put the nearest chair next to the window, and after conjuring a screwdriver out of her pocket, she removed the screw.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「はい、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝All right, go ahead please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝All right, go ahead please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「神北さん、先にいっていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you can go first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you can go first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ふえ？　えーと、あのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Fue? Um... That is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Fue? Um... That is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…見えちゃうから」
