MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...You'll see it, so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...You'll see it, so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか気恥ずかしそうにもじもじしながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She spoke hesitantly as if being embarrassed about something.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She spoke hesitantly as if being embarrassed about something.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「えーとね、ほら…今日はくまさん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Um..., and, you see, today it's Mr. Bear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Um..., and, you see, today it's Mr. Bear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ってああああっ、別に言う必要ないのに～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Wa, aaaah, I didn't really have to say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Wa, aaaah, I didn't really have to say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかよくわからないうちに自爆しているらしい、神北さんは。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She looked as though she had just performed a self-destruction, while I was still trying to understand what she had meant.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She looked as though she had just performed a self-destruction, while I was still trying to understand what she had meant.

MESSAGE.JP: もまあ、何となく想像はついた。
MESSAGE.EN: But, ah well... I think I got the gist of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, ah well... I think I got the gist of it.

MESSAGE.JP: まさんのぱんつか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Did she mean Mr. Bear panties...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did she mean Mr. Bear panties...?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「神北さん、子供っぽい下着が好きなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you like childish underwear, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you like childish underwear, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うあああんっ、そ、そういうわけじゃあっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Uwaaaah, th, that's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Uwaaaah, th, that's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直な感想を言うと、ことさらに顔を真っ赤にしてうろたえる。
MESSAGE.EN: As I expressed my honest opinion, her cheeks became suffused with an even deeper tint of red.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I expressed my honest opinion, her cheeks became suffused with an even deeper tint of red.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あああ…まあそうなんだけど～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Aaah... well, I do, bu～ut.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Aaah... well, I do, bu～ut.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「でも今日はたまたまなんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝But it was only by chance today...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝But it was only by chance today...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず、僕が先に出るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'll go first then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'll go first then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は椅子に足をかけ、開け放たれた窓をくぐり、屋上に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped up on the chair, and made it through the wide-open window out onto the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped up on the chair, and made it through the wide-open window out onto the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ僕は破れたフェンスを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I immediately went to see the broken fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I immediately went to see the broken fence.

MESSAGE.JP: が、それがどこだったかわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...but I couldn't remember exactly where it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...but I couldn't remember exactly where it was.

MESSAGE.JP: でに直した後なのか、ぐるりと一周、どこにも損傷はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it'd been fixed already, since there was no sign of damage.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it'd been fixed already, since there was no sign of damage.

MESSAGE.JP: 女はいないし、フェンスにさえ近づかなければ、危険はないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should be safe if I don't come too close to the fence, because that girl isn't around.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should be safe if I don't come too close to the fence, because that girl isn't around.

MESSAGE.JP: 頬をくすぐる風。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wind was tickling my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wind was tickling my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: して、雲ひとつない明るい空に、目を細める。
MESSAGE.EN: I squinted my eyes, looking at the bright, cloudless sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I squinted my eyes, looking at the bright, cloudless sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「確かにいい場所だよ、ここは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It sure is a great place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It sure is a great place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろを見れば、神北さんも屋上に出てきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kamikita-san appeared on the rooftop behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kamikita-san appeared on the rooftop behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「やっぱり今日も、いい天気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It's good weather today, as I thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It's good weather today, as I thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんは手で目を影にしながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, shading her eyes by blocking the sun with one hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, shading her eyes by blocking the sun with one hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あっ、直枝君、ひょっとして今度は何かご用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ah, Naoe-kun, can it be that you had some business with me this time around?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ah, Naoe-kun, can it be that you had some business with me this time around?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意に気づいたように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, as though suddenly realizing something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, as though suddenly realizing something.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、別にそういうわけじゃないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, not really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, not really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何となく、ちょっと居場所がないかなぁ、って思ったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just somehow, I was wondering if there was a good place to go to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just somehow, I was wondering if there was a good place to go to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…居場所なんて、どこにでもあるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...A place you can go to can be anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...A place you can go to can be anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外そうな声。
MESSAGE.EN: She sounded surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sounded surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「直枝君はきっと、そういうのを見つけるの、苦手なんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I'm sure you're just not good at finding them, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I'm sure you're just not good at finding them, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「神北さんは上手そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you look like you're good at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you look like you're good at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「そんなことないよ。私は、普通」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝That's not true. I'm... normal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝That's not true. I'm... normal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: コニコ顔で歩み寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She came closer, still smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came closer, still smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「でも、直枝君にはここが居場所になったってことかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝But, Naoe-kun, did this place become somewhere you can go to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝But, Naoe-kun, did this place become somewhere you can go to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いい場所だしね、ここ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's a good place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's a good place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん…いい場所だとは思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah... It's a good place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah... It's a good place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段だったら全肯定なんだろうけど、ちょっと言葉を濁してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Normally I'd simply say yes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Normally I'd simply say yes...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、いい場所には違いないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, it sure is a good place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, it sure is a good place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は素直には言えないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't say that with full confidence now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't say that with full confidence now.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「えへへ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ehehe～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ehehe～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: し照れたような笑い。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled as if complimented.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled as if complimented.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「やっぱり嬉しいよね、そういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Hearing that really does make me glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Hearing that really does make me glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんは貯水タンクの載る段差に腰掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat down on the jut near the water tank.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat down on the jut near the water tank.

MESSAGE.JP: して、ビニール袋から次々とお菓子を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she started taking out snacks from the plastic bag, one by one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she started taking out snacks from the plastic bag, one by one.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「今日はちょっと多めに持ってきたんだ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I brought a bit too much today～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I brought a bit too much today～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「はい、ベルギーワッフルでもどうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Here, help yourself to some Belgian waffles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Here, help yourself to some Belgian waffles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんはベルギーワッフルを僕に差し出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out a Belgian waffle.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out a Belgian waffle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ご飯もまだなんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I still haven't had my lunch, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I still haven't had my lunch, though.

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんはさらにタッパーを取り出すと、その蓋を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, she took out a plastic box and opened it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, she took out a plastic box and opened it.

MESSAGE.JP: ん中で仕切られた中には、緑のサラダとホットケーキが二切れ。
MESSAGE.EN: The contents, divided into separate halves down the middle, were pancakes and green salad.
MESSAGE.Translation: The contents, divided into separate halves down the middle, were pancakes and green salad.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか妙な組み合わせのお弁当だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is a rather strange combination for a boxed lunch...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is a rather strange combination for a boxed lunch...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「そう？　おいしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝You think so? It's delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝You think so? It's delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり、ちょっと変だ、神北さんは。
MESSAGE.EN: She's a bit weird after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's a bit weird after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、今日は多めにって、何で？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, why did you bring too much today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, why did you bring too much today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…別に、だって直枝君がここに来たら、お菓子足りなくなっちゃうよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...No special reason, it's just that if you came here, there wouldn't be enough snacks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...No special reason, it's just that if you came here, there wouldn't be enough snacks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: や、そんなに食べないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well no, I don't really eat that much...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well no, I don't really eat that much...

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「お菓子を食べると、ちょっと幸せになります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝When you eat snacks, you become a little happier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝When you eat snacks, you become a little happier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「直枝君が幸せになったら、私も嬉しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝If Naoe-kun becomes happy, I'll feel happy as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝If Naoe-kun becomes happy, I'll feel happy as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「誰かを幸せにするって、自分もちょっぴり幸せになるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝If you make someone happy, you become a little happier in return too, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝If you make someone happy, you become a little happier in return too, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「だからほら、君が幸せになると、私も幸せ。私が幸せになると、君も幸せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝That's why, you see, if you become happy, I'll be happy too. If I become happy, you'll be happy too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝That's why, you see, if you become happy, I'll be happy too. If I become happy, you'll be happy too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ずーっとずーっと繰り返して、ほら、幸せスパイラル」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝And repeating it over and over again, look, it's a spiral of happiness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝And repeating it over and over again, look, it's a spiral of happiness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、実際そうなるかはよくわかんないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm not so sure if it actually works quite like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm not so sure if it actually works quite like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: も確かに、そんな風に心から思えれば、ちょっと幸せになる理論かもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: But, indeed, if one believed in that theory from the bottom of their heart, it might make them just a little bit happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, indeed, if one believed in that theory from the bottom of their heart, it might make them just a little bit happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「だからはい、ちょこぼーるでもどうぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝That's why, here, have some chocolate balls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝That's why, here, have some chocolate balls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらにお菓子を手渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She handed me even more snacks.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She handed me even more snacks.

MESSAGE.JP: 焼けになりそうな理論だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like a theory likely to induce heartburn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like a theory likely to induce heartburn.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あああああーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ahhhhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ahhhhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわあああぁぁああぁぁああぁーーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wooooah?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wooooah?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだっ!?　なにが起きたんだっ!?
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world happened?
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world happened?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あぁ…あ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah... Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah... Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんはもちろん、周りも何も起きてない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing happened to Kamikita-san or otherwise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing happened to Kamikita-san or otherwise.

MESSAGE.JP: ちゃくちゃびっくりしてしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: That started me...
MESSAGE.Translation: That started me...

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと気にしすぎか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm overthinking it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm overthinking it...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「と、突然どうしたの神北さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong, shouting all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong, shouting all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うえーん、フォーク忘れた～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I forgot to bring a fork～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I forgot to bring a fork～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「どうしよう、食べられない～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝What do I do now, I can't eat it like this～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝What do I do now, I can't eat it like this～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ットケーキのタッパ―を抱えて言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She wailed while embracing the plastic container with the pancakes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wailed while embracing the plastic container with the pancakes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「フォークって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A fork...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A fork...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッグがあれば何か持ち合わせがあるかもしれないんだけど、残念ながら購買の袋しか今は持っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I might have had something in my bag, but sadly I only had this shopping bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: I might have had something in my bag, but sadly I only had this shopping bag.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜか、ポケットにビニールに包まれたスプーンがひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...For some reason, there was a single spoon wrapped in plastic in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...For some reason, there was a single spoon wrapped in plastic in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: っき来ヶ谷さんが使っていたのと同じものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Identical to the one Kurugaya-san was using earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: Identical to the one Kurugaya-san was using earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（来ヶ谷さんがいつの間にか入れてたんだろうか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(When did she put it in there...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(When did she put it in there...)

MESSAGE.JP: さかあの人はこんなことまでお見通しなのか、とちょっと戦慄を覚える。
MESSAGE.EN: I shuddered at the thought that she might be able to foresee things like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shuddered at the thought that she might be able to foresee things like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「スプーンでよかったらあるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will a spoon do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will a spoon do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「え、え？　なんでそんなの持ってるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ah, eh? Why do you have one with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ah, eh? Why do you have one with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょとん、としている神北さんの手にスプーンを渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed the spoon to the dumbfounded Kamikita-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed the spoon to the dumbfounded Kamikita-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、ありがとー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こやかにお礼。
MESSAGE.EN: She thanked me with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thanked me with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 幸せスパイラル理論、結構当てはまる物なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The spiral of happiness might be a much more applicable theory than it first appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The spiral of happiness might be a much more applicable theory than it first appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんは少し食べ辛そうにスプーンでホットケーキを口に運び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She was applying great effort into bringing the pancakes to her mouth with the spoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was applying great effort into bringing the pancakes to her mouth with the spoon.

MESSAGE.JP: もその隣に座り、購買の$K78おにぎり$K0と菓子パンを食べることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down next to her and started eating the $K78onigiri$K0 and sweet bread that I❜d bought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down next to her and started eating the $K78onigiri$K0 and sweet bread that I❜d bought.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「やっぱりホットケーキにはアプリコットジャムだよね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Pancakes really aren't pancakes without apricot jam topping～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Pancakes really aren't pancakes without apricot jam topping～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ブルーベリーもとっても美味しいけど～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Blueberry is very tasty too, though～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Blueberry is very tasty too, though～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: むちゃくちゃ嬉しそうに語る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She explained, irrationally delighted.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She explained, irrationally delighted.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「神北さん、甘いもの好きだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you sure love sweet things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you sure love sweet things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、それが私のハピネス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep, this is my happiness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep, this is my happiness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「すっごいちっちゃい事だけど、それで幸せになれるってのはすごいことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It's a small thing, but with just that one can become happy. It's amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It's a small thing, but with just that one can become happy. It's amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「だから甘いものはすごいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝That's why sweet things are amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝That's why sweet things are amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…直枝君はあんまり好きじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...Naoe-kun, you really don't like them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...Naoe-kun, you really don't like them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃ嫌いじゃないけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't hate them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't hate them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもあんまり食べすぎると胸焼けするし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But if you eat them too much, you'll get heartburn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But if you eat them too much, you'll get heartburn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あー、うん、それは悲しいよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ah～, yep, that's sad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ah～, yep, that's sad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「私も生クリーム大好きなんだけど、ショートケーキ一個で気持ち悪くなっちゃうんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I love whipped cream so much, but after eating just one shortcake I feel sick.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I love whipped cream so much, but after eating just one shortcake I feel sick.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「一回、お腹いっぱいショートケーキを食べてみたいんだけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I want to try and stuff myself full of shortcakes once...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I want to try and stuff myself full of shortcakes once...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ、とため息をひとつ吐きながら、アプリコットジャムをたっぷりつけたホットケーキを頬張る。
MESSAGE.EN: She sighed once, and then stuffed her mouth with apricot-topped pancake.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sighed once, and then stuffed her mouth with apricot-topped pancake.

MESSAGE.JP: んか、その晴れ晴れとしたと言うか、実に幸せそうな顔を見ていると、こっちも甘いものが食べたくなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, looking at her beaming face, I ended up wanting to eat something sweet myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, looking at her beaming face, I ended up wanting to eat something sweet myself.

MESSAGE.JP: にぎりと菓子パンをお茶でのどに流し込むと、さっきもらったベルギーワッフルを手にとる。
MESSAGE.EN: After finishing my onigiri and sweetened bread, I drank some tea and picked up the Belgian waffle she'd given me before.
MESSAGE.Translation: After finishing my onigiri and sweetened bread, I drank some tea and picked up the Belgian waffle she'd given me before.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニール袋を漁っていた神北さんが声を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: While rummaging in the plastic bag, she raised her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: While rummaging in the plastic bag, she raised her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: た、びく、と反応してしまう。心臓によくない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was startled again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was startled again...

MESSAGE.JP: さすがに、この状況なら何も無いんだ。いつもどおりにしないと…。
MESSAGE.EN: I doubt something would happen now. I should just act normal...
MESSAGE.Translation: I doubt something would happen now. I should just act normal...

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…う、うう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...Uh, uuh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...Uh, uuh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「なんでもない～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It's all gone～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It's all gone～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 明らかに何でもある態度だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was evident from her reaction that something was supposed to be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was evident from her reaction that something was supposed to be there.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんの視線は僕の手のベルギーワッフルに注がれている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her gaze shifted to my hand that was holding the Belgian waffle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her gaze shifted to my hand that was holding the Belgian waffle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ワッフル？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Waffle?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Waffle?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「わっふる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Waffle～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Waffle～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「二個買ったと思ったのに一個しかなかった～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I thought I bought two of them, but there was only one～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I thought I bought two of them, but there was only one～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、それだったら別にこれ食べていいと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if that's the case, I don't mind if you eat this one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if that's the case, I don't mind if you eat this one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんにベルギーワッフルを手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed the Belgian waffle to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed the Belgian waffle to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ごめんね直枝君…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I'm sorry, Naoe-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I'm sorry, Naoe-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「じゃあ、はい、半分こ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Then, here, let's split it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Then, here, let's split it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんはワッフルを半分にすると、僕に差し出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She divided it in two and gave one of the halves to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She divided it in two and gave one of the halves to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直に受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I obediently accepted it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I obediently accepted it.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「今日はいい天気。でも明日は、天気予報だとちょっと崩れるみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Today is great weather. But, according to the forecast, tomorrow it'll get worse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Today is great weather. But, according to the forecast, tomorrow it'll get worse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ちょっと憂鬱だね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It's a bit depressing～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It's a bit depressing～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、雨なんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, like rain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, like rain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「雨はちょっと嫌いなんだ。濡れちゃうし、外に出られないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I don't really like rain. You get wet and can't go outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I don't really like rain. You get wet and can't go outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「雨の日だけ天気予報が外れてくれるといいんだけどね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝If only the weather forecasts were off on rainy days alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝If only the weather forecasts were off on rainy days alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな感じでお菓子をふたりで食べながら、昼休みの時間は過ぎていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We spent the rest of our lunch break like that, eating various snacks together.
MESSAGE.Translation: We spent the rest of our lunch break like that, eating various snacks together.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「あ…そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ah... right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ah... right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「はい、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Here, take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Here, take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんはポケットから何かを取り出すと、僕にそれを手渡してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced something from her pocket and handed it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced something from her pocket and handed it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…キシリトールガム？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A sugar-free gum?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A sugar-free gum?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「わああっ、間違えたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Waaa, that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Waaa, that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…でも、とりあえずそれは食べていいよ。虫歯予防になるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...But you might as well eat it now. To prevent cavities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...But you might as well eat it now. To prevent cavities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それじゃあもらっておくけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll take it then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll take it then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みを開けて、口の中に放りこむ。
MESSAGE.EN: I unwrapped the gum and popped it into my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I unwrapped the gum and popped it into my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ほんとは、こっち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It was supposed to be... this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It was supposed to be... this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っきと同じように何かを手渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: She brought out something again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brought out something again.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、ここに来るときに窓の桟のネジをはずしたドライバーだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the screwdriver for removing the screw on the window sash, a necessary tool for getting out to the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the screwdriver for removing the screw on the window sash, a necessary tool for getting out to the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「これをあなたにプレゼント」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝This is my present to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝This is my present to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「共犯者同盟、かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝A bond between accomplices, or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝A bond between accomplices, or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん、もらっておくけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay, I'll take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay, I'll take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず制服の胸ポケットに入れておくことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I put it in my uniform pocket for the time being.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put it in my uniform pocket for the time being.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「そういえば、最近井ノ原君と宮沢君と、あんまり一緒にいないね、直枝君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Now that I think of it, you haven't been together with Inohara-kun and Miyazawa-kun a lot lately, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Now that I think of it, you haven't been together with Inohara-kun and Miyazawa-kun a lot lately, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あー…今ちょっと妙なことになっててさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... Things have become a little strange lately...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... Things have become a little strange lately...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介に言われて、今草野球チームのメンバー探してるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was asked by Kyousuke to find members for a grass baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was asked by Kyousuke to find members for a grass baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「やきゅー？　くさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Base～ball? Grass?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Base～ball? Grass?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんはあごに人差し指を当てると、視線をどこかに泳がせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kamikita-san placed an index finger to her chin, her eyes wandering off in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kamikita-san placed an index finger to her chin, her eyes wandering off in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「…四番サードはタンポポですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝...The home plate would be a dandelion?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝...The home plate would be a dandelion?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、草が野球するわけじゃ、ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well no, it's not like the grass will be playing baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well no, it's not like the grass will be playing baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「草で野球する？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Playing with a grass baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Playing with a grass baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「出来ないと思うなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's possible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's possible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「想像がつかないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It's hard to imagine that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It's hard to imagine that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: や、その発想のほうが余程及びがつかない。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, to even conjure up such ideas is much more unimaginable in itself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, to even conjure up such ideas is much more unimaginable in itself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「草な野球だよ。みんなで知り合い集めて、自由に野球するんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It just means amateur baseball. Getting together with people you know, and playing baseball just for fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It just means amateur baseball. Getting together with people you know, and playing baseball just for fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「へぇ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Hee～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Hee～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 底感心したように息を吐きながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She exclaimed as though she was impressed from the bottom of her heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: She exclaimed as though she was impressed from the bottom of her heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「なんか楽しそうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝That sounds like fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝That sounds like fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、でもいまさらやることじゃないよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we still haven't done anything though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we still haven't done anything though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぜんぜんメンバー集まらないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We haven't gathered enough members either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We haven't gathered enough members either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「え、直枝君もメンバー集めしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Eh, Naoe-kun, you're looking for members?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Eh, Naoe-kun, you're looking for members?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一応だけどね。まあ、集まるとは思ってないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For now at least. Well, I doubt I'll find anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For now at least. Well, I doubt I'll find anyone.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「私、やるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I'll join.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I'll join.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北さんの言葉が一瞬理解できない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I couldn't understand her words right off the bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I couldn't understand her words right off the bat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うやく聞き返した。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally managed to ask her in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally managed to ask her in return.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、私、やる。がんばるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yup, I'll do it. I'll try my best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yup, I'll do it. I'll try my best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと待った神北さん、えーと、あの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, wait up, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, wait up, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う見ても運動は出来そうになかった。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how you look at it, it doesn't appear like she's capable of playing sports.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how you look at it, it doesn't appear like she's capable of playing sports.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「野球ってやったことないけど、だいじょうぶ、少しは知ってるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I've never played baseball before, but don't worry～, I know a bit about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I've never played baseball before, but don't worry～, I know a bit about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かも未経験。
MESSAGE.EN: To top it all off, she had zero experience.
MESSAGE.Translation: To top it all off, she had zero experience.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、神北さんの空回りなやる気というか、的外れな迫力というか、雰囲気に流されて放課後の練習への参加を承諾してしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the end, because of her fruitless enthusiasm, or perhaps her misplaced energy, I simply went with the flow, and we agreed on her joining our practice after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the end, because of her fruitless enthusiasm, or perhaps her misplaced energy, I simply went with the flow, and we agreed on her joining our practice after school.

MESSAGE.JP: 人も謙吾も、大人しく席に座っているが…。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Kengo were both sitting at their seats obediently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Kengo were both sitting at their seats obediently.

MESSAGE.JP: うやって恭介は、ふたりを落ち着かせたんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: How did Kyousuke manage to calm them down?
MESSAGE.Translation: How did Kyousuke manage to calm them down?

MESSAGE.JP: に座ると、真人が僕に向けて不敵な笑みを送ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: As I took my seat, Masato faced me with a daring smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I took my seat, Masato faced me with a daring smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんでもねーよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「せいぜいこの授業を満喫しておくんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Enjoy this class to the fullest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Enjoy this class to the fullest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えぇっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体これから僕に何が…。
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world is going to happen to me after class...
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world is going to happen to me after class...

MESSAGE.JP: み時間が終わるなり、教室がざわめく。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as break time started again, the classroom became filled with noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as break time started again, the classroom became filled with noise.

MESSAGE.JP: かが始まろうとしている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something was definitely afoot...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something was definitely afoot...

MESSAGE.JP: の中、鈴がすっくと席を立ち、こちらに近づいてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin left her seat and came barreling toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin left her seat and came barreling toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: して、彼女は僕に向けて言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke up as she confronted me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke up as she confronted me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、バトルだ。勝負しろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, it's a battle. Let's fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, it's a battle. Let's fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の拳を僕の胸に差し向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed her fist at my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed her fist at my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こういうことか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So that's what it was about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So that's what it was about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「わりぃな、理樹。そうするしか、真人を抑えつけられなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Riki. It was the only way to restrain Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Riki. It was the only way to restrain Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介が開け放たれた窓に座っていた。４階から降りてきたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was sitting on the open window frame. He probably climbed down from the fourth floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was sitting on the open window frame. He probably climbed down from the fourth floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹、勝負を挑まれた場合は…わかってんな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, you do understand what's expected of you when you're challenged, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, you do understand what's expected of you when you're challenged, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「拒否権はなし、だろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no turning it down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no turning it down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: るしかないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like I've got to do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like I've got to do it.

MESSAGE.JP: も席を立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I rose from my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rose from my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「みんな準備はいいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is everyone ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is everyone ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「バトル…スタートだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Battle... Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Battle... Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなどれだけ楽しみなんだ、と訊きたくなるほど無数の武器が投げ込まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Just how much was everyone looking forward to this... a myriad of weapons started flying my way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just how much was everyone looking forward to this... a myriad of weapons started flying my way.

MESSAGE.JP: てこの休み時間はどうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Now then, what should I do during my break?
MESSAGE.Translation: Now then, what should I do during my break?

MESSAGE.JP: んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll take a nap...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll take a nap...

MESSAGE.JP: 課後、謙吾が僕に封筒を出して頼んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: After school, Kengo entrusted me with an envelope.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school, Kengo entrusted me with an envelope.

MESSAGE.JP: う乾いたのか（生乾きでも着そうだ）、いつもの袴姿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Since he was wearing his usual hakama, I guessed it had dried already (although, he'd probably wear it even if it were damp).
MESSAGE.Translation: Since he was wearing his usual hakama, I guessed it had dried already (although, he'd probably wear it even if it were damp).

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「悪いが寮長に提出してくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but could you please give that to the dorm head for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but could you please give that to the dorm head for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「部活で夜間鍛錬をするからな、外出許可申請書だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I have training tonight, so this is a written application requesting permission to go out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I have training tonight, so this is a written application requesting permission to go out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: An idea crossed my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: An idea crossed my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 介が駄目なら、謙吾がいたじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't talk to Kyousuke, but there's still Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't talk to Kyousuke, but there's still Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 強の親友だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The strongest of my friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: The strongest of my friends.

MESSAGE.JP: 対力になってくれるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He will definitely be of help.
MESSAGE.Translation: He will definitely be of help.

MESSAGE.JP: も、相談するにも、そのことを口にした途端、鈴に危害が加わる恐れがあるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But the moment I seek his help, they might retaliate by hurting Rin...
MESSAGE.Translation: But the moment I seek his help, they might retaliate by hurting Rin...

MESSAGE.JP: うしたらいい…？
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do...?

MESSAGE.JP: あっ、もどかしいっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Geez, this is driving me crazy!
MESSAGE.Translation: Geez, this is driving me crazy!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「くそっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Damn!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Damn!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんなに嫌なら自分でいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is it that much a problem? I will go myself then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is it that much a problem? I will go myself then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「遠回りなのだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's a bit of a detour though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's a bit of a detour though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あーーーっ！　謙吾おぉぉーーーーっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Nooo! Kengo!
MESSAGE.Translation: Nooo! Kengo!

MESSAGE.JP: 強の親友は去っていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: The strongest of my friends left me...
MESSAGE.Translation: The strongest of my friends left me...

MESSAGE.JP: 局誰にも相談できないんじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is there anyone I can talk to about my problem...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is there anyone I can talk to about my problem...?

MESSAGE.JP: ぼとぼと、ひとりグラウンドに向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was slowly making my way to the sports grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was slowly making my way to the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。わかった。これから部活？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I understand. Are you going to your club after that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I understand. Are you going to your club after that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ。今日は夜間の準備があるから早めにいかなくてはならない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah. I need to prepare something for tonight, so I have to hurry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah. I need to prepare something for tonight, so I have to hurry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事を頼んで悪いな、と言う謙吾に僕は首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: I brushed off his apology with a shake of my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brushed off his apology with a shake of my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいよ、それぐらい。部活頑張って。新人戦近いんでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's nothing, no worries. Good luck with your club. The newcomers' competition is coming up soon, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's nothing, no worries. Good luck with your club. The newcomers' competition is coming up soon, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ。よろしく頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yes. I'm counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yes. I'm counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は教室を出て行く謙吾を見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw Kengo off as he left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw Kengo off as he left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: は鞄にルーズリーフや教科書を詰めると、寮長室へ向かうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stuffed my notes into my bag, and headed off for the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stuffed my notes into my bag, and headed off for the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: 長は男子寮女子寮にひとりずつ居る。
MESSAGE.EN: Girls and boys lived in separate dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Girls and boys lived in separate dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮制のうちの学校は、学生自治が原則なので、寮長に話を通しておくと何事もスムーズだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Our school was a boarding school founded on the principle of student autonomy, so if you just talked to the dorm head, most things would go smoothly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our school was a boarding school founded on the principle of student autonomy, so if you just talked to the dorm head, most things would go smoothly.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮にも寮母さんがいるけど、寮母さんは基本的に生活についての雑務をしてくれる存在になっている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a dorm mother in each dorm, but they were basically just in charge of the mundane tasks concerning everyday life.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a dorm mother in each dorm, but they were basically just in charge of the mundane tasks concerning everyday life.

MESSAGE.JP: うした許可願いなんかは、寮長に掛け合うのがうちのルールだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus, the rule was to run it through the dorm head if we needed permission for something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus, the rule was to run it through the dorm head if we needed permission for something.

MESSAGE.JP: 長室は生徒会室の隣にある。その隣は各委員会が使える空き教室がひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm heads' room was next to the student council's. There was a vacant classroom nearby, which was used by the various school committees.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm heads' room was next to the student council's. There was a vacant classroom nearby, which was used by the various school committees.

MESSAGE.JP: 課後は大抵何かの委員会が開かれていることが多い。
MESSAGE.EN: They would generally hold meetings there after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: They would generally hold meetings there after school.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員３@「また逃したらしい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝She's getting away again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝She's getting away again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員４@「また!?　委員長の機嫌が悪くなるぞ。知られる前に捕まえろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝Again!? The head prefect's not going to like this. We'd better catch her before she finds out about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝Again!? The head prefect's not going to like this. We'd better catch her before she finds out about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 騒がしい、と思ったら腕章を着けた風紀委員がバタバタと委員会室に出入りしている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was noisy. Members of the school disciplinary committee with armbands on their sleeves were storming from the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was noisy. Members of the school disciplinary committee with armbands on their sleeves were storming from the room.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、完全にトラブルが発生している様子だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, it seems like some serious trouble has broken out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, it seems like some serious trouble has broken out.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰かトラブル起こしたのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did someone cause trouble?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did someone cause trouble?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「いや、特に騒ぎを起こしたつもりはないのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, I didn't really mean to cause an uproar.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, I didn't really mean to cause an uproar.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「駄菓子屋さんで$K56ビー玉$K0貰ったの。それでお昼休みにばらまいて綺麗だなー、とかしてただけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I was given some $K56marbles$K0 by the candy store clerk. And then, during the lunch break I scattered them around, they sure looked beautiful. And that's about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I was given some $K56marbles$K0 by the candy store clerk. And then, during the lunch break I scattered them around, they sure looked beautiful. And that's about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、どこで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, where?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, where?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ここ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…委員会室で？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...In the committee meeting room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...In the committee meeting room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: む、と頷く女の子…って、三枝さんじゃないか！
MESSAGE.EN: The girl nodded... wait, isn't that Saigusa-san!?
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl nodded... wait, isn't that Saigusa-san!?

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やは、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ya-ha, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ya-ha, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やは、じゃないよ！　ていうか、いつのまにいるのさ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not ❛ya-ha❜! And when did you show up!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not ❛ya-ha❜! And when did you show up!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「今来たばっかだよ？　風紀委員が私を捜してるからなんでかなーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I just got here? The disciplinary committee members were looking for me, so I was wondering why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I just got here? The disciplinary committee members were looking for me, so I was wondering why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんでもなにもビー玉のせいじゃ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it completely due to those marbles...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it completely due to those marbles...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「綺麗だよねー、ビー玉。理樹くんにもあげるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝They sure are pretty. I'll give you some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝They sure are pretty. I'll give you some.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あれ、ポケットに入れといたのにな。どこいったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Huh, I put them in my pocket. Where are they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Huh, I put them in my pocket. Where are they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは上着のポケットに手を突っ込んで探している。
MESSAGE.EN: She stuck her hand into her pocket and began rummaging around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stuck her hand into her pocket and began rummaging around.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んー、こっちだったっけか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mm... Weren't they here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mm... Weren't they here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員４@「本当にどこ行ったんだ、三枝め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝Just where could she have gone, that Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝Just where could she have gone, that Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 組みをした風紀委員の男子が委員会室から出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: A member of the disciplinary committee walked out of the room with his arms folded.
MESSAGE.Translation: A member of the disciplinary committee walked out of the room with his arms folded.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員４@「あぁぁーー！　三枝葉留佳！　おい、三枝がいるぞ、三枝ぁぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝Aaaah～! Haruka Saigusa! Hey, Saigusa's here, Saigusaa～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝Aaaah～! Haruka Saigusa! Hey, Saigusa's here, Saigusaa～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: い終わると、ぴー、とホイッスルを鳴らす。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as he finished yelling, he blew on his whistle.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as he finished yelling, he blew on his whistle.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うわー、連呼しないでよ恥ずかしいじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Uwa～, don't call my name repeatedly, it's embarrassing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Uwa～, don't call my name repeatedly, it's embarrassing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういう問題じゃないよ、三枝さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not the problem here, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not the problem here, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「とりあえず」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝First of all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝First of all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First of all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First of all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「逃げるっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Run for it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Run for it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、え、えぇぇぇーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, eh, eeeh～!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, eh, eeeh～!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは僕の手を引いて走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She started running, tugging on my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started running, tugging on my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと待ってよ三枝さんっ！　どうして逃げるのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wa-wait up, Saigusa-san! Why are we running away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wa-wait up, Saigusa-san! Why are we running away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「捕まったら大変だよ、理樹くんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It'll be troublesome if we're caught, Riki-kun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It'll be troublesome if we're caught, Riki-kun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「もうなんというかお説教されるわお説教されるわお説教されるわでっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Geez, I can't bear to think of how they're gonna lecture us, lecture us, lecture us!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Geez, I can't bear to think of how they're gonna lecture us, lecture us, lecture us!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「怒られるのは当たり前だよー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it natural that they're mad!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it natural that they're mad!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんと僕は廊下を、ダンダンダンっ、という凄い音を立てて走る。
MESSAGE.EN: We've been running through the corridors, making a lot of noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: We've been running through the corridors, making a lot of noise.

MESSAGE.JP: だ校舎にいる他の生徒たちが何事かと教室から顔を出しているのを尻目に僕たちは逃げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As we kept running, I caught glimpses of other students, who were curiously sticking their heads out of their classrooms wondering what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we kept running, I caught glimpses of other students, who were curiously sticking their heads out of their classrooms wondering what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ていうかなんで僕まで逃げてるんだよーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, am I running away too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, am I running away too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「一蓮托生五里霧中っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝We share the same fate, of being completely lost!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝We share the same fate, of being completely lost!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒じゃないし迷っちゃうよーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't group me together with you, and we're really going to get lost like this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't group me together with you, and we're really going to get lost like this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員３@「待てぇっ！　三枝葉留佳ぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝Stop right there! Haruka Saigusaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝Stop right there! Haruka Saigusaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うわぁ！　何か増えてるしっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Uwa! There's more of them now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Uwa! There's more of them now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろを振返ると追っ手の数が増えていた！
MESSAGE.EN: Looking behind us, the number of pursuers had increased.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking behind us, the number of pursuers had increased.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「しょうがない、ここは忍びないがっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It can't be helped... I couldn't bring myself to do this, but...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It can't be helped... I couldn't bring myself to do this, but...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ちょ、ちょっとまさか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, wait, don't tell me...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, wait, don't tell me...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「秘技！　ビー玉転がし！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Secret technique! Marble Rolling!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Secret technique! Marble Rolling!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぁぁぁ！　じゃらじゃらカンカンカン！　廊下に色とりどりのビー玉があふれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Marbles of various colors flooded the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Marbles of various colors flooded the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員３@「うわぁ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝Uwa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝Uwa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員１@「きゃぁーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Kya～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Kya～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員２@「な、なにー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝Wh-what's that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝Wh-what's that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 紀委員のひとたちはビー玉に足を取られて転倒している。
MESSAGE.EN: They were slipping on the marbles.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were slipping on the marbles.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員４@「さ、三枝ぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝Sa-Saigusa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝Sa-Saigusa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員３@「お、おのれぇー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝Damn you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝Damn you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「さ、今のうちに戦闘離脱っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Come on, we're withdrawing from the battle now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Come on, we're withdrawing from the battle now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「戦闘だったんだ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was that a battle!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was that a battle!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…はぁ、はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haa, haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haa, haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ここまで来れば大丈夫だね。うんうん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝We're safe now that we've come this far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝We're safe now that we've come this far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんと僕は裏庭でようやく立ち止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: We finally came to a halt as we reached the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: We finally came to a halt as we reached the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…確かに…はぁ…逃げ切ったけど…はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Indeed... Haa... We got away, but... Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Indeed... Haa... We got away, but... Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下のビー玉とかどうするんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: What's she planning to do about the marbles scattered around in the corridor...
MESSAGE.Translation: What's she planning to do about the marbles scattered around in the corridor...

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「風紀委員のヒトもまだまだですなっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The committee members still have a long way to go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The committee members still have a long way to go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そういう問題じゃないです、三枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not the problem here, Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not the problem here, Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そう？　やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Really? Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Really? Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはのんきに笑っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed cheerfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed cheerfully.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「おろ。まだビー玉一つ残ってた。あげるね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh. I still had one marble left. I'll give it to you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh. I still had one marble left. I'll give it to you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん、ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah, thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah, thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 紫のマーブル模様のそれを受け取る僕。
MESSAGE.EN: I received the purplish-red marble from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I received the purplish-red marble from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「さてさて、回収しにいくかな、ビー玉」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Now then, I have to collect the marbles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Now then, I have to collect the marbles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、やっぱり回収するんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, so you are going to collect them...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, so you are going to collect them...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「いざという時のためにまた必要だからねっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝They still might come in handy during the next emergency!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝They still might come in handy during the next emergency!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな時が来ないようにしようよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just don't get into another emergency!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just don't get into another emergency!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつきだけで行動する女の子ということを思い知らされた僕なのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was reminded once again that she was the kind of girl who did whatever came into her mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was reminded once again that she was the kind of girl who did whatever came into her mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、寮長室にいくのは、騒ぎが収まった後になってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up postponing going to see the dorm head until things had settled down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up postponing going to see the dorm head until things had settled down.

MESSAGE.JP: んか厄介なことになりそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like it was going to get bothersome...
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like it was going to get bothersome...

MESSAGE.JP: 吾からの頼まれごともあるし、関わらない事にしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo asked me for a favor, so it'd be better to not get involved.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo asked me for a favor, so it'd be better to not get involved.

MESSAGE.JP: がしく動いている風紀委員たちから逃げるように、謙吾の頼み事を済ませるため寮長室へと向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: As though running away from the assiduous disciplinary committee, I headed off to the dorm heads' room to do what Kengo had asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: As though running away from the assiduous disciplinary committee, I headed off to the dorm heads' room to do what Kengo had asked.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういうの提出するのは、本人じゃないとダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've got to do this kind of thing yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've got to do this kind of thing yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なるほど、確かにな。それがルールだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see, you're right. Those are the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see, you're right. Those are the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「わかった。遠回りだが自分で行ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I got it. I'll have to make a detour, but I'll turn it in myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I got it. I'll have to make a detour, but I'll turn it in myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の謙吾を見送って、僕も教室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing him off, I also left the classroom behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing him off, I also left the classroom behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 課後のグラウンド。
MESSAGE.EN: The sports grounds after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sports grounds after school.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「よぉーしっ、がんばるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Al～right, I'll give it my be～est.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Al～right, I'll give it my be～est.❞

MESSAGE.JP: をぶるんぶるんと回して言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She proclaimed, swinging her hands around energetically.
MESSAGE.Translation: She proclaimed, swinging her hands around energetically.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーっと…知ってるよね、ウチのクラスの神北さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... You all know her - Kamikita-san from our class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... You all know her - Kamikita-san from our class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…すまんがちょっと待っててもらえるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I'm sorry, but could you please hang on a moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I'm sorry, but could you please hang on a moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ふえ？　あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Fue? Ah, sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Fue? Ah, sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は引きつった笑顔で神北さんに言うと、僕の首を引っつかんでネット裏に引きずり込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato shot her a cramped smile, and dragged me along behind the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato shot her a cramped smile, and dragged me along behind the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「メンバー集めに対するおまえの必死さはよくわかったが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm well aware how desperate you are to get new members, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm well aware how desperate you are to get new members, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「大丈夫なのか、あいつは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Will she be okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Will she be okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さ、さあ…本人はやる気まんまんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝B-beats me... At least, she's brimming with enthusiasm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝B-beats me... At least, she's brimming with enthusiasm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレには不安要素以外見えないんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can't help but worry, looking at her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can't help but worry, looking at her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どう見ても筋肉がねぇぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No matter how you look at it, she has no muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No matter how you look at it, she has no muscles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人は何でも筋肉基準なんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, muscles are like your criteria for everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, muscles are like your criteria for everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「視点がなんかエロいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's kind of a perverted point of view.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's kind of a perverted point of view.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「エロくねぇよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's not perverted!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's not perverted!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、エロはさておき…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, putting perversion aside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, putting perversion aside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴なら神北さんが運動できるかとか知ってるんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, shouldn't you know whether she can do any sports or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, shouldn't you know whether she can do any sports or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「聞いたことない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I've never heard about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I've never heard about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、やっぱり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, as I expected...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, as I expected...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ただ、体育の授業でいうと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But, if we're talking about gym class...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But, if we're talking about gym class...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どんなだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...How was she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...How was she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…記憶にない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I have no recollection.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I have no recollection.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なら言うなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't bring it up then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't bring it up then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえにつっこまれる筋合いないわ、ぼけーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You have no right to butt in, moron!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You have no right to butt in, moron!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: つものように真人が蹴られる。
MESSAGE.EN: She kicked him just like always.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kicked him just like always.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「正直、僕も心配なんだけど、断りきれなかったんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To be honest, I'm worried myself, but I couldn't just say no to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To be honest, I'm worried myself, but I couldn't just say no to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「実はものすごい潜在能力の持ち主とかでもないよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But she could really have some latent abilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But she could really have some latent abilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: られながらも冷静に語る。さすが真人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He said this nonchalantly while being kicked. As expected of Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: He said this nonchalantly while being kicked. As expected of Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、あるならありがたいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it'd be great if that were so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it'd be great if that were so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ういうのがあるなら、貯水タンクの下にハマって出られなくなったりしない。
MESSAGE.EN: But if that were true, she wouldn't be crawling under the water tank and getting stuck there...
MESSAGE.Translation: But if that were true, she wouldn't be crawling under the water tank and getting stuck there...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、争いはよせ、おまえたち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now, stop fighting, you guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now, stop fighting, you guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレが一方的に蹴られてるだけだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm being one-sidedly kicked here, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm being one-sidedly kicked here, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…俺にいい考えがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I have a great idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I have a great idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「とりあえずテストということで、あの子の実力を試してみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all we'll have her take a test, to see her real abilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all we'll have her take a test, to see her real abilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「残念ながら戦力外、ということなら憎まれるのは俺だけですむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If worst comes to worst and we have to ask her to quit, that way I'll be the only one hated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If worst comes to worst and we have to ask her to quit, that way I'll be the only one hated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そんなんで憎んだりするような人じゃないと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't think she's the kind of person to hold a grudge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't think she's the kind of person to hold a grudge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、がっかりする顔はあんまり見たくない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, I didn't really want to see her disappointed face.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, I didn't really want to see her disappointed face.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、そういうことならオレは恭介に任せるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, in that case I'll leave it to Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, in that case I'll leave it to Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、ちりん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, too, nodded, with the bell on her hair resounding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, too, nodded, with the bell on her hair resounding.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、決まりだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, it's decided.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, it's decided.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がまとまると、恭介は神北さんのほうへ向かって歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: After wrapping things up, Kyousuke headed off in Kamikita-san's direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: After wrapping things up, Kyousuke headed off in Kamikita-san's direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ええと、神北、だっけか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Um... Kamikita, was it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Um... Kamikita, was it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「え、うん…棗さんのお兄さんですよね？　えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Eh, yes... You're Natsume-san's brother, right? Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Eh, yes... You're Natsume-san's brother, right? Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「恭介でいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just call me Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just call me Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「恭介さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Kyousuke-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Kyousuke-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、恭介さんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right, Kyousuke-san it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right, Kyousuke-san it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、さっそくだが、入団テストを始めよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, this may be a bit sudden, but you'll need to take a team tryout test.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, this may be a bit sudden, but you'll need to take a team tryout test.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すが恭介、有無を言わさぬ論理展開だ。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected of Kyousuke, the strategy he'd chosen left no room for objections.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected of Kyousuke, the strategy he'd chosen left no room for objections.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ええっ、テスト？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Eeh, a test?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Eeh, a test?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだな…まずは、野球経験はあるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right... First of all, do you have any experience playing baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right... First of all, do you have any experience playing baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ううん、ないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Nope, I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Nope, I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「不合格」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rejected.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rejected.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「が、が～ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ga, ga～n...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ga, ga～n...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょちょちょっと待った恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-w-w-wait up, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-w-w-wait up, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の肩を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught him by the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught him by the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いきなりそれはないでしょっ!!　神北さん、呆然としてるじゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, come on now, that's too sudden! Kamikita-san is completely dumbfounded.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, come on now, that's too sudden! Kamikita-san is completely dumbfounded.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、悪かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, my bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, my bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんの方へ向き直る。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「というのは冗談で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That was a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That was a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「じょ、冗談かぁ～…ものすごいびっくりしたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝J-joke... I was really surprised...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝J-joke... I was really surprised...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…野球に必要なものはなんだと思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...What are the requisites for playing baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...What are the requisites for playing baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか微妙な質問だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That was a complicated question.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That was a complicated question.

MESSAGE.JP: きなりそんな本質を訊かれて、すぐ答えられる人間もそうはいないと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think there's anyone who would have an answer to such a fundamental question down pat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think there's anyone who would have an answer to such a fundamental question down pat.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「え～と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ガッツと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Guts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Guts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「勇気と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝And courage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝And courage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「そして友情」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝And friendship.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝And friendship.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…合格ッ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Passed!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Passed!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はがっし、と神北さんの肩を掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He grasped her shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: He grasped her shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、がんばりますっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'll try my best!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'll try my best!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、ちょっとまったぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wa-wait up!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wa-wait up!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: び肩を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again I had him by the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again I had him by the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや…あまりに的確な言葉に、俺としたことが思わず感動してしまったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well... She gave such a precise answer, I was touched and reacted instinctively.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well... She gave such a precise answer, I was touched and reacted instinctively.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そもそもテストってこんなんじゃないでしょ、もっと運動能力とかさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what the test was meant to be about in the first place, it should test her reflexes and such...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what the test was meant to be about in the first place, it should test her reflexes and such...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「よぉーし、がしがしかっとばすぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝All right, I'll go all out～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝All right, I'll go all out～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでにバッターボックスでバットを振りはじめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was already standing in the batter's box and swinging a bat around.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was already standing in the batter's box and swinging a bat around.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どうすんのさ、もう完全に断れなくなっちゃったじゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What should we do, there's definitely no turning her down now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What should we do, there's definitely no turning her down now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、根性はありそうだし大丈夫だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, she seems to have some spirit, so she'll be fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, she seems to have some spirit, so she'll be fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「見ろ、中々いいスウィングじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look, that's quite an impressive swing she's got there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look, that's quite an impressive swing she's got there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅ、びゅ、といい音がここまで聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the swooshing sound of the bat despite the distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the swooshing sound of the bat despite the distance.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あれプラバットだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's because it's a plastic bat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's because it's a plastic bat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の後、金属バットに持ち替えてもらうと。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, she switched to a metal bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, she switched to a metal bat.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Mu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Mu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「むむむっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Mumumu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Mumumu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 色々構えを試しているようだが、すでに持っている手がぷるぷると震え始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She tried taking different postures, but her hands were still trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She tried taking different postures, but her hands were still trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: ても重いらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked very heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked very heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ、見ちゃいらんねえな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Aah, I can't stand looking at this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Aah, I can't stand looking at this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ほれ、貸してみ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on, give it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on, give it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ほわぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Howa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Howa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Gon*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gon*.

MESSAGE.JP: 間、神北さんの振り下ろしたバットが真人の脛をもろに打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: She instantly dropped the bat on Masato's foot.
MESSAGE.Translation: She instantly dropped the bat on Masato's foot.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ぎゃあああああっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gyaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gyaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「う、うわあああっ、ごご、ごめんなさぁいいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Uwaaa, I-I'm sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Uwaaa, I-I'm sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…今のは真人が悪いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It's your own fault, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It's your own fault, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「容赦ないね、鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're merciless, Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're merciless, Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うえーん、やっぱり重たいー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ueeh, it's heavy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ueeh, it's heavy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: べそでこちらへ戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She came this way, tears welling up in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came this way, tears welling up in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…って言っても、それより軽いバットなんてあったかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I wonder if there are any lighter bats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I wonder if there are any lighter bats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Hm...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Hm...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んか、鈴がじっと神北さんのほうを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was staring at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was staring at her.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 線に気付いた神北さんが声を上げると。
MESSAGE.EN: Kamikita-san let out a sound when she noticed Rin's glance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kamikita-san let out a sound when she noticed Rin's glance.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の後ろに隠れる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She hid behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She hid behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ふえ？　どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Fue? What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Fue? What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う接していいかわからないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she didn't know how to deal with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she didn't know how to deal with her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…そうだ、鈴に友達を作るいい機会じゃないか）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Right, this is a great opportunity for Rin to make a friend.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Right, this is a great opportunity for Rin to make a friend.)

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんならきっと鈴のいい友達になってくれるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure Kamikita-san would be great company for Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure Kamikita-san would be great company for Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らり、と顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She stuck her head out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stuck her head out.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「じゃあ、改めましてごあいさつです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Then, let us formally introduce ourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Then, let us formally introduce ourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「よろしくね、りんちゃん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Nice to meet you, Rin-chan～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Nice to meet you, Rin-chan～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たたた、と走り去る。
MESSAGE.EN: She ran away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ran away.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「が、がーん…無視されてしまった…しょんぼり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Ga, ga～n... I was ignored... So heartbreaking...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Ga, ga～n... I was ignored... So heartbreaking...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かってはいたつもりだけど、ここまで人見知りが激しいといきなりは難しいか…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was aware of Rin's extreme shyness. This was probably just all too sudden for her...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was aware of Rin's extreme shyness. This was probably just all too sudden for her...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…神北さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kamikita-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kamikita-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今はああだけどさ、多分まだ慣れてないだけなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's acting like this because she's not used to you yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's acting like this because she's not used to you yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…だからさ、ちょっとずつでもいいから、鈴の友達になってあげてくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, could you please try to become friends with her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, could you please try to become friends with her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「だいじょうぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝It's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝It's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「今はもう、同じ草野球チームのお友達ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝We're already friends, as members of the baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝We're already friends, as members of the baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、明日はきっとお話してくれるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'm sure we'll be able to talk tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'm sure we'll be able to talk tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹の手柄だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You did well, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You did well, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「たぶん、神北を誘ったのは正解だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It was probably a good decision to invite her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It was probably a good decision to invite her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よ、よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ni-nice to meet you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ni-nice to meet you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…あたしが使ってるバットの方が軽い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...The bat I'm using is lighter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...The bat I'm using is lighter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「後で持ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll bring it later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll bring it later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「わー、ありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Thank you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Thank you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: った以上に鈴がフレンドリーだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was being friendlier than I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was being friendlier than I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が心配していたより、鈴は人見知りをしないのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was probably unnecessarily worried about her shyness.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was probably unnecessarily worried about her shyness.

MESSAGE.JP: んでか、ずっと不安だったんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd always been uncertain, though...
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd always been uncertain, though...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、とりあえずテストの続きだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's go on with the test for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's go on with the test for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「次はベースランでもやってみてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Next, try running the bases.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Next, try running the bases.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気揚々とグローブを手にする。
MESSAGE.EN: She started putting on a glove triumphantly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started putting on a glove triumphantly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやベースランってダイヤモンドを走るだけだからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, running the bases means running across the field.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, running the bases means running across the field.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『ちょっとは知ってる』って言ってたけど、一ミリくらいの『ちょっと』なんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...❛I know a bit❜ she had said, but it seems that ❛bit❜ was just about one millimeter's worth.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...❛I know a bit❜ she had said, but it seems that ❛bit❜ was just about one millimeter's worth.

MESSAGE.JP: そして。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And.

MESSAGE.JP: 球道具を部室に仕舞い込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned the baseball equipment back to the club room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned the baseball equipment back to the club room.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 突な大きな音に驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: An abrupt loud noise startled me.
MESSAGE.Translation: An abrupt loud noise startled me.

MESSAGE.JP: り向くと、ドアが閉ざされた音だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned back and saw the door was closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned back and saw the door was closed.

MESSAGE.JP: の状況は…
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be that...

MESSAGE.JP: じこめられた!?
MESSAGE.EN: I'm locked in?!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm locked in?!

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ不気味なあの連中の存在を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I immediately thought of that ominous bunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I immediately thought of that ominous bunch.

MESSAGE.JP: るいは僕を殺すという女生徒の仕業か…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was either them or that girl who's out to get me...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was either them or that girl who's out to get me...

MESSAGE.JP: こからすぐにも逃げ出さないと！
MESSAGE.EN: I better get out of here soon!
MESSAGE.Translation: I better get out of here soon!

MESSAGE.JP: はパニックに陥る。
MESSAGE.EN: I panicked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I panicked.

MESSAGE.JP: たトラップに違いない！
MESSAGE.EN: It was another trap!
MESSAGE.Translation: It was another trap!

MESSAGE.JP: た影が現れるのか!?
MESSAGE.EN: Will another shadow appear?!
MESSAGE.Translation: Will another shadow appear?!

MESSAGE.JP: れとも、ガスでも充満させる気かっ!?
