MESSAGE.EN: Or will the room be filled with gas?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or will the room be filled with gas?

MESSAGE.JP: にかく外に出ないと！
MESSAGE.EN: Either way, I need to get out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Either way, I need to get out.

MESSAGE.JP: はドアに向けて走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran for the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran for the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 口はそこしかないんだ！
MESSAGE.EN: This is the only way out!
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the only way out!

MESSAGE.JP: 当たりをする。
MESSAGE.EN: I slammed the door with my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slammed the door with my body.

MESSAGE.JP: ると、簡単に開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: And it effortlessly opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: And it effortlessly opened.

MESSAGE.JP: はそのままの勢いで外に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: The momentum carried me outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: The momentum carried me outside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぐっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が苦しい！
MESSAGE.EN: I can't breathe!
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't breathe!

MESSAGE.JP: かに引っかかった！
MESSAGE.EN: Something had wrapped around me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something had wrapped around me.

MESSAGE.JP: れが僕の喉を締めつける！
MESSAGE.EN: It was strangling me!
MESSAGE.Translation: It was strangling me!

MESSAGE.JP: 識が…遠のく…
MESSAGE.EN: Slowly, my consciousness faded...
MESSAGE.Translation: Slowly, my consciousness faded...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「はぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Haa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Haa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 合いと共に一閃！
MESSAGE.EN: A yell, then a swish.
MESSAGE.Translation: A yell, then a swish.

MESSAGE.JP: すん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*!

MESSAGE.JP: の体が床に叩きつけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was knocked down to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was knocked down to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: のままその場にへたり込む。
MESSAGE.EN: And stayed lying there.
MESSAGE.Translation: And stayed lying there.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…悪戯にしてはたちが悪いようだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That was a bit much for a prank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That was a bit much for a prank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の恩人、謙吾が言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Said Kengo, who just saved my life.
MESSAGE.Translation: Said Kengo, who just saved my life.

MESSAGE.JP: の首にはロープが絡まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: A rope was hanging from my neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: A rope was hanging from my neck.

MESSAGE.JP: 上げると、部室の上に覆い被さるように木が傾いていて、切れた残りのロープがくくりつけてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Above me was a tree and a piece of cut rope tied to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Above me was a tree and a piece of cut rope tied to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それとも、生きるのがつらくなったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Or did you tire of being alive?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Or did you tire of being alive?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…大丈夫。心は健康だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... My mental health is fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... My mental health is fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が退散を決め込もうとした時。
MESSAGE.EN: Just when Kengo was about to walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just when Kengo was about to walk off...

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmm...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmm...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目をつり上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: He raised his eyebrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: He raised his eyebrow.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「今誰かが部室の裏を走っていったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Someone darted behind the club room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Someone darted behind the club room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、それはどんな奴だった？　影？　それとも女生徒？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really, what did they look like? A shadow? Or a girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really, what did they look like? A shadow? Or a girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「妙な質問だな。どちらでもある。人影だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝A weird thing to ask. It was both. The figure of a girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝A weird thing to ask. It was both. The figure of a girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「まあ…俺の目が確かなら、恐らく女生徒だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Indeed... But if my eyes don't fail me, it was a female student.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Indeed... But if my eyes don't fail me, it was a female student.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾に目の狂いなんてあるわけない。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo's eyes can be trusted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo's eyes can be trusted.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸沙耶。
MESSAGE.EN: Saya Tokido...
MESSAGE.Translation: Saya Tokido...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もういいな。いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Can I go now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Can I go now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、助けてくれてありがとう。今度何かおごるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for saving me, I'll treat you to something next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for saving me, I'll treat you to something next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんな恩に着せるつもりはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You really don't have to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You really don't have to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: また僕は殺されかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was almost killed yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was almost killed yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: してまた、友達によって救われた。
MESSAGE.EN: And this time, too, I was saved by a friend.
MESSAGE.Translation: And this time, too, I was saved by a friend.

MESSAGE.JP: 強の親友だったからこそよかったものの、謙吾でなければ、僕は死んでいただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Were it not for the strongest of my friends, Kengo, I'd be dead by now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Were it not for the strongest of my friends, Kengo, I'd be dead by now.

MESSAGE.JP: っとする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I recoiled at the horror of the thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: I recoiled at the horror of the thought...

MESSAGE.JP: はまたはられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She set up a trap.
MESSAGE.Translation: She set up a trap.

MESSAGE.JP: れからもはられ続けるのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: And will set up more in the future...
MESSAGE.Translation: And will set up more in the future...

MESSAGE.JP: われる、という偶然は二回続けて起きたけど、三回目は期待できない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was by some miracle saved twice, but should not expect to be a third time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was by some miracle saved twice, but should not expect to be a third time.

MESSAGE.JP: こから一歩でも動けば、次の罠が発動するかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I move even one step from here, I might fall into another trap.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I move even one step from here, I might fall into another trap.

MESSAGE.JP: かないでも、そうなるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe even if I don't.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe even if I don't.

MESSAGE.JP: は…いつ死んでもおかしくないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I might be killed at any time...
MESSAGE.Translation: I might be killed at any time...

MESSAGE.JP: つのまに僕の日常はこんな過酷な戦場に取って代わってしまったのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: When did my life turn into a nightmare like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: When did my life turn into a nightmare like this...

MESSAGE.JP: れは彼女と夜、校舎で会ってしまったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It all changed the night I ran into her in school.
MESSAGE.Translation: It all changed the night I ran into her in school.

MESSAGE.JP: そう…彼女を。
MESSAGE.EN: I must find her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must find her.

MESSAGE.JP: をはられる前に、こちらが有利な状況を作り、説得を試みよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should try to find some leverage and negotiate with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should try to find some leverage and negotiate with her.

MESSAGE.JP: も相手は本物の銃も持っているんだぞ？
MESSAGE.EN: But didn't she have an actual gun?
MESSAGE.Translation: But didn't she have an actual gun?

MESSAGE.JP: や、簡単には発砲しないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think she will fire it though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think she will fire it though.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は二度とも、自殺に見せかけようと動いている。
MESSAGE.EN: On both occasions she staged the whole thing to look like a suicide.
MESSAGE.Translation: On both occasions she staged the whole thing to look like a suicide.

MESSAGE.JP: 殺すだけなら、簡単なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not as easy as simply killing me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not as easy as simply killing me.

MESSAGE.JP: は武器にバットを選んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I chose the bat as my weapon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I chose the bat as my weapon.

MESSAGE.JP: このところ僕らが草野球に興じているのは校内でも有名だから、そこまで奇怪な姿にも見えないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: It shouldn't stand out much, as everyone in the school knows we've been into baseball recently.
MESSAGE.Translation: It shouldn't stand out much, as everyone in the school knows we've been into baseball recently.

MESSAGE.JP: も実際これで僕は何をするんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: On the other hand, what could I accomplish with this?
MESSAGE.Translation: On the other hand, what could I accomplish with this?

MESSAGE.JP: 女を叩くのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was I going to hit her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I going to hit her?

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことできるわけない。
MESSAGE.EN: Not a chance I could do anything like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not a chance I could do anything like that.

MESSAGE.JP: も、金属のバットだ。脅しには使えるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was still a metal bat. I could at least threaten her with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was still a metal bat. I could at least threaten her with it.

MESSAGE.JP: もこの姿が、脅威に映ってくれていることを願うだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I could only pray it made me look formidable enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could only pray it made me look formidable enough.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「はぁ～、なんか全然うまくいかなかった～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Haa, it didn't go well at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Haa, it didn't go well at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ず出会ったのは神北さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kamikita-san was the first person I bumped into.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kamikita-san was the first person I bumped into.

MESSAGE.JP: の流れ上、僕がバットを持っていることは不自然ではなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Considering the circumstances, there was nothing unnatural about me holding a bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Considering the circumstances, there was nothing unnatural about me holding a bat.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「はぁ～、なんか全然うまくいかなかった～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Haa, it didn't go well at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Haa, it didn't go well at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 習後の帰り道、神北さんが大きくため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way back from practice, Kamikita-san let out a heavy sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way back from practice, Kamikita-san let out a heavy sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「神北さん、別に無理して参加しなくてもだいじょうぶだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you don't have to force yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kamikita-san, you don't have to force yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まだ試合までは日にちがあるし、別にそんな苦労抱え込まなくてもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's still a few days left before the match, so you don't have to push yourself so hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's still a few days left before the match, so you don't have to push yourself so hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「ダメだよ。それじゃまたメンバー探しが大変になっちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝I can't do that. It'll be difficult to find enough members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝I can't do that. It'll be difficult to find enough members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「私ひとりが大変な分には別にだいじょうぶだから～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Don't worry, I can handle this much just fine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Don't worry, I can handle this much just fine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いやまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ういう性分なんだな、と理解した。
MESSAGE.EN: I understood well enough that she was that kind of person.
MESSAGE.Translation: I understood well enough that she was that kind of person.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱりそれこそ無理に断るほうが、神北さんはがっかりするだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She will be disappointed even more if she's forced to quit.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She will be disappointed even more if she's forced to quit.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、運動とか苦手だけど、がんばってなんかでカバーするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'm not too good with sports, but I'll try my best to make up for that somehow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'm not too good with sports, but I'll try my best to make up for that somehow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みつかるといいね、その『なんか』…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I hope you'll find that ❛somehow.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I hope you'll find that ❛somehow.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: と本心からの言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what I truly believed.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what I truly believed.

MESSAGE.JP: 頑張ってくれてるだけに、結果が伴わないのがなんだか不憫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I felt sorry for her, as I wondered if trying hard would be enough to pay off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I felt sorry for her, as I wondered if trying hard would be enough to pay off.

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「うん、明日からもがんばるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'll be doing my best from tomorrow on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Yep, I'll be doing my best from tomorrow on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 神北@「じゃ、ばいばい理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kamikita@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kamikita@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんは女子寮へ向かっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She took off to the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took off to the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最後、名前で呼ばれたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She called me by my first name at the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She called me by my first name at the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度のときは、こっちも名前で呼んでみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll try doing the same next time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll try doing the same next time.

MESSAGE.JP: 『神北小毬（かみきた　こまり）』。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari Kamikita.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari Kamikita.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんというか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How should I put it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How should I put it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「らしい名前だよなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That name suits her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That name suits her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: つでも自爆して困りまくりの少女を思い、ちょっとおかしくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed so funny, when I thought about that ever-so-troubled, self-destructing girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed so funny, when I thought about that ever-so-troubled, self-destructing girl.

MESSAGE.JP: と、こんなところで油を売ってる場合じゃなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, I can't afford to lose more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, I can't afford to lose more time.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、あの子を。
MESSAGE.EN: I should keep looking for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should keep looking for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 北さんを見送って僕は男子寮の方へ歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: After seeing her off, I started walking back to the boys' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: After seeing her off, I started walking back to the boys' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 生の住む寮は『工』の字型に配置された校舎やグラウンドとは正反対の方向にある。
MESSAGE.EN: A path connected the dorms standing across from each other at one end, and the school building and sports ground at the other, in what probably looked like a letter ❛H❜ from above.
MESSAGE.Translation: A path connected the dorms standing across from each other at one end, and the school building and sports ground at the other, in what probably looked like a letter ❛H❜ from above.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュメントと花壇のある広場を挟んで男子寮だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was built across a square hosting a monument and a flowerbed.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was built across a square hosting a monument and a flowerbed.

MESSAGE.JP: 校の敷地内にある寮から通う寮生たちは、遅刻しようがない。
MESSAGE.EN: For those students who were attending school from the dorms, there was no way they'd be late for school.
MESSAGE.Translation: For those students who were attending school from the dorms, there was no way they'd be late for school.

MESSAGE.JP: のだが、何事も例外はあるもので、僕たちは時々遅刻していた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, there were exceptions, and some people were occasionally late for school... such as us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, there were exceptions, and some people were occasionally late for school... such as us.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと腕が重たいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My hand feels a little heavy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My hand feels a little heavy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すがに筋肉痛が起こる程じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course it wasn't so bad as to cause muscular pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course it wasn't so bad as to cause muscular pain.

MESSAGE.JP: るぐる、と腕を回していると、駐車場から宅配便の軽トラックが走り去るのが見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was busily rotating my arm, when I noticed a delivery company truck driving out of the parking lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was busily rotating my arm, when I noticed a delivery company truck driving out of the parking lot.

MESSAGE.JP: 車場から宅配便の軽トラックが走り去るのが見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught a glimpse of a delivery truck driving away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught a glimpse of a delivery truck driving away.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、おかしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, that's strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, that's strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 物の受け取りは、寮の玄関の宅配ボックスを使用するはずなんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: They were supposed to carry baggage all the way to the dorm entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were supposed to carry baggage all the way to the dorm entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 場の端っこから、頼りなくふらふらと向かってくる物体を認識する。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed an unsteady looking object at the edge of the square.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed an unsteady looking object at the edge of the square.

MESSAGE.JP: の物体は白地にカエルのマークをつけたダンボール箱を三つも積み重ねている。
MESSAGE.EN: The object turned out to be three white boxes with a frog image printed on them, stacked atop one another.
MESSAGE.Translation: The object turned out to be three white boxes with a frog image printed on them, stacked atop one another.

MESSAGE.JP: れから一番下から白い棒っきれを２本突き出してよたよたと前進していた。
MESSAGE.EN: From beneath the bottom-most of them, two white sticks could be seen, unsteadily forging ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: From beneath the bottom-most of them, two white sticks could be seen, unsteadily forging ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: はなんとはなしに足を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: For no particular reason I halted.
MESSAGE.Translation: For no particular reason I halted.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「ふぅ、ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Fuu, fuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Fuu, fuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まであと２メートルといったところでそれは歩みを止めて、荒い息をついていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Stopping scarcely two meters in front of me, the apparition panted breathlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Stopping scarcely two meters in front of me, the apparition panted breathlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: うやら生き物らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like a living being.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like a living being.

MESSAGE.JP: ンボール・タワーの脇からは、夕方吹く風のせいか、亜麻色のなにかがふわふわと揺れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of the evening wind, something flax-colored was slowly swaying on one side of the box tower.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of the evening wind, something flax-colored was slowly swaying on one side of the box tower.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「ふぅ…ふぅ…よし、が、がんばるぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Fuu... Fu... All right, I, I'll try my best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Fuu... Fu... All right, I, I'll try my best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を整えたあとでそんな台詞が聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: It muttered after catching its breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: It muttered after catching its breath.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「がんばるのはいいけど、そのままだとぶつかるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Trying your best is fine and all, but you'll bump into me if you keep going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Trying your best is fine and all, but you'll bump into me if you keep going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然掛けられた声にびっくりしたのかよろめいた。
MESSAGE.EN: It faltered, surprised at my sudden words.
MESSAGE.Translation: It faltered, surprised at my sudden words.

MESSAGE.JP: はとっさによけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nimbly dodged the falling boxes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nimbly dodged the falling boxes.

MESSAGE.JP: ンボールが地面に転がる。
MESSAGE.EN: And they crashed to the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: And they crashed to the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: も起きなかったが、これだって何かの罠だった可能性もあるのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all that happened, but it could have been another trap.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all that happened, but it could have been another trap.

MESSAGE.JP: うやら大丈夫らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like everything is alright.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like everything is alright.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よけちゃって、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry I didn't catch them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry I didn't catch them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は慌ててダンボール箱を押さえにかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurried to stabilize the boxes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurried to stabilize the boxes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だ、大丈夫？　ごめん、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A-are you okay? I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A-are you okay? I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「い、いえ、こちらこそ。前方不注意です、ごめんなさいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝N-no, it's my fault. I wasn't watching in front of me, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝N-no, it's my fault. I wasn't watching in front of me, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って待って、待って今頭下げると」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on, don't bow now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on, don't bow now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が止める間もなくダンボール箱はずるりと滑ってトスントスン、と地面に落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even have time to react before the cardboard came tumbling down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even have time to react before the cardboard came tumbling down.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwa, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwa, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は慌てて屈み、地面に落ちた箱をふたつ持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hastily bent over to pick up two boxes from the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hastily bent over to pick up two boxes from the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: し小さめの箱（宅配便で言う１２０サイズの箱だ）は想像していたより軽かった。
MESSAGE.EN: The small box (size 120, according to the delivery company sticker) happened to be lighter than I imagined.
MESSAGE.Translation: The small box (size 120, according to the delivery company sticker) happened to be lighter than I imagined.

MESSAGE.JP: の中身は、小物類なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was probably filled with small stuff.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was probably filled with small stuff.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「どうもありがとうございます…あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Thank you very much... Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Thank you very much... Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う一度頭を下げて、それから顔を上げて僕を見た相手は声を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She lowered her head again, and raised her voice after looking back up and seeing me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lowered her head again, and raised her voice after looking back up and seeing me.

MESSAGE.JP: 手は小柄な女の子だった。僕の肩ぐらいまでしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was a petite girl. Not even up to my shoulders.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was a petite girl. Not even up to my shoulders.

MESSAGE.JP: さなからだを、すっぽりと白いマントが覆っている。
MESSAGE.EN: A white mantle was wrapped around her small body, covering it completely.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white mantle was wrapped around her small body, covering it completely.

MESSAGE.JP: 中の真ん中ぐらいまで伸ばした髪の毛は緩やかに波打っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her long hair, reaching halfway down her back, was gently fluttering behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her long hair, reaching halfway down her back, was gently fluttering behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: 成りの亜麻色を薄くしたような色合い。
MESSAGE.EN: She had light flax-colored hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had light flax-colored hair.

MESSAGE.JP: の毛先がマントの生地の上をふわふわと夕方の風に吹かれて揺れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The feathery strands of her hair were gently swaying above her mantle in the evening breeze.
MESSAGE.Translation: The feathery strands of her hair were gently swaying above her mantle in the evening breeze.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「ぐっもーにんえぶりわんはぶあないすでーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Gummo-nin eburiwan habu naisu dei.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Gummo-nin eburiwan habu naisu dei.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の子は両の瞳で僕を見上げてきてそんなことを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, looking at me with both eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, looking at me with both eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: バットを持つ僕は脅威に見えないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently I didn't look menacing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently I didn't look menacing.

MESSAGE.JP: は朝じゃないしおまけに僕はひとりだしさらにはいきなりいってらっしゃいですか!?
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't morning and I was alone, so what was she saying!?
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't morning and I was alone, so what was she saying!?

MESSAGE.JP: の子は僕の反応を待っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was eagerly awaiting my reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was eagerly awaiting my reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: は少し困った顔のまま答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered with a slightly troubled expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered with a slightly troubled expression.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はぶあないすほりでー、しーゆーあげいーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Habu a nice horiday, shee you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Habu a nice horiday, shee you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のままスタスタと歩き去る。
MESSAGE.EN: And I simply started to walk away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I simply started to walk away.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「さよならされました!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Are you leaving already!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Are you leaving already!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく行ったあとこっそり振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept walking for a while and then secretly stole a glance behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept walking for a while and then secretly stole a glance behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: の子は地面に落ちた段ボール箱に手をついて凹んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding one of the fallen cardboard boxes with a dejected look on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding one of the fallen cardboard boxes with a dejected look on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…しょうがないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は苦笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: し道を戻って声を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I came back a little way and called out to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I came back a little way and called out to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「冗談だよ、冗談」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「…ぶつぶつ、どうせ私なんか私なんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...*Mutter*, obviously I'm just... I'm just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...*Mutter*, obviously I'm just... I'm just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「…英語のミニテストで『$K112次はもっとがんばりましょう$K0グッバイガール！』と書かれたひとですそうなんですなんですですすす…すー」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...someone who received a ❛$K112Try better next time$K0 goodbye girl❜ mark on the English mini-test... that's how it is... it is... it is... is-is-is-is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...someone who received a ❛$K112Try better next time$K0 goodbye girl❜ mark on the English mini-test... that's how it is... it is... it is... is-is-is-is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人ドップラー効果!?
MESSAGE.EN: A one-person Doppler effect!?
MESSAGE.Translation: A one-person Doppler effect!?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こらこら、聞いてる？　おーいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey now, are you listening to me? Hey!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey now, are you listening to me? Hey!❞

MESSAGE.JP: をぽむぽむ、と叩くと、女の子は我に返った。
MESSAGE.EN: I bopped her on the head, and she came back to her senses with her head bouncing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bopped her on the head, and she came back to her senses with her head bouncing.

MESSAGE.JP: れからいきなりきらきら光ってそうな瞳で僕を見上げて言った。
MESSAGE.EN: After that she faced me with sparkling eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that she faced me with sparkling eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「ええと、ええっと、きゃん・あい・すぴーく・じゃぱにーず？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Um... um... Kyan ai speak Japanese?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Um... um... Kyan ai speak Japanese?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、日本語喋ることできるの知ってるし。僕に言われても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I know you can speak Japanese. No need to ask me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I know you can speak Japanese. No need to ask me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が笑いながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: ？？@「…それはそうなんですけど、でもほら、通じましたよね通じましたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...Well that's how it is, but... You did understand me just now, didn't you, you did right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...Well that's how it is, but... You did understand me just now, didn't you, you did right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はいはい、通じてる通じてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah yeah, I did, I did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah yeah, I did, I did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しそうな女の子。
MESSAGE.EN: She was delighted.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was delighted.

MESSAGE.JP: っきまで凹んでいたのに感情の浮き沈みが激しい子だなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Though she'd looked so depressed before, she was the kind to bounce from one end of the emotional spectrum to the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though she'd looked so depressed before, she was the kind to bounce from one end of the emotional spectrum to the other.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶっている帽子がずり落ちているのを両手で直す彼女を見ながら思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I was watching her as she tried to adjust the hat on her head with both hands to stop it from slipping.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was watching her as she tried to adjust the hat on her head with both hands to stop it from slipping.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、荷物部屋に運ぶの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, are you carrying them to your room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, are you carrying them to your room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は尋ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の名前は能美（のうみ）・クドリャフカ。
MESSAGE.EN: This girl's name is Kudryavka Noumi.
MESSAGE.Translation: This girl's name is Kudryavka Noumi.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスメイトだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A classmate.
MESSAGE.Translation: A classmate.

MESSAGE.JP: 前が示すとおりクオーター。
MESSAGE.EN: As her name implied, she was a quarter Japanese.
MESSAGE.Translation: As her name implied, she was a quarter Japanese.

MESSAGE.JP: クド』は当然クドリャフカの名前を短縮した愛称。
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously, ❛Kud❜ was a short form of her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously, ❛Kud❜ was a short form of her name.

MESSAGE.JP: きるだけ『ふらんくりぃ～に（当人談）』呼んで欲しいらしく。
MESSAGE.EN: She herself wanted to be addressed as ❛frankly❜ as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: She herself wanted to be addressed as ❛frankly❜ as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: はとりあえず彼女のことをクド、と呼んでいるのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, I usually called her Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, I usually called her Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、はい、じゃなくって、い、いえす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ye-yes, I mean, i-iesu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ye-yes, I mean, i-iesu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは少し舌ったらずな口調でＹＥＳと言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered ❛yes❜ in English in a stiffly childish way.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered ❛yes❜ in English in a stiffly childish way.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…えーと、えーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは考え込んでる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was racking her brains.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was racking her brains.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「思いつかなかったら普段どおりに話せばいいとおもうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can speak normally, if you can't remember some words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can speak normally, if you can't remember some words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そ、そうですね、
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Yo-you're right,
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Yo-you're right,

MESSAGE.EN: oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは顔を赤らめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She blushed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She blushed.

MESSAGE.JP: してぱたぱた、とマントの裾を揺らす。
MESSAGE.EN: And started jiggling the cuff of her mantle.
MESSAGE.Translation: And started jiggling the cuff of her mantle.

MESSAGE.JP: ントの下でもじもじと手を動かしているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept fiddling with her mantle.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept fiddling with her mantle.

MESSAGE.JP: 恥ずかしいらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She looked embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She looked embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: うにか英語で言葉を返そうとしても、日本語が出てしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She had meant to reply in English, but Japanese words came out instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had meant to reply in English, but Japanese words came out instead.

MESSAGE.JP: れがクドリャフカという女の子だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the girl called Kudryavka.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the girl called Kudryavka.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぁ～……っ」
れから長い長いため息をつく。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a heavy sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a heavy sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そうですね、そうします…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...You're right, I'll do so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...You're right, I'll do so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは凹んでいるようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked depressed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked depressed.

MESSAGE.JP: よどよとした黒い雲を背負ってそうな感じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt as if a small, dark cloud was floating above her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt as if a small, dark cloud was floating above her.

MESSAGE.JP: こからどうみても外国少女、なクドは、その外見とは裏腹に外国語が苦手らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how you look at it, she was a foreign girl, but her appearance belied her inability to speak foreign languages.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how you look at it, she was a foreign girl, but her appearance belied her inability to speak foreign languages.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「日本人の九割が英語を話せないらしいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I hear nine of ten Japanese can't speak English.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I hear nine of ten Japanese can't speak English.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突な僕の言葉にクドは小首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: She tilted her head at my sudden words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tilted her head at my sudden words.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして身につかないんだろうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder why it's so hard to get a grasp on it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder why it's so hard to get a grasp on it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それは、私がずっとずっと、考えていることだったりします…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is something I've been thinking about for very, very long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is something I've been thinking about for very, very long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「この間もラジオの英会話講座初級編１のテープを買ったんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The other day, I bought a tape with an elementary course of conversational English.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The other day, I bought a tape with an elementary course of conversational English.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「役に立たなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was it of any use?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was it of any use?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リスニングが全くわかりません。英語は本当に英語なんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I absolutely didn't understand the listening part. Was it really English at all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I absolutely didn't understand the listening part. Was it really English at all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…言ってる意味はわかんないけど、クドが買ってきたのが英会話講座なら、そうだと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Even if you didn't understand it, I think it should be in English, since you bought an English course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Even if you didn't understand it, I think it should be in English, since you bought an English course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今日の英語の宿題が憂鬱です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Today's homework for English class is frustrating...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Today's homework for English class is frustrating...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょんぼりしたクドをなんと慰めようかと考えていると、初めて会った時の自己紹介を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I started searching for something to brighten her mood, and remembered her self-introduction the day we met.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started searching for something to brighten her mood, and remembered her self-introduction the day we met.

MESSAGE.JP: 外を転々とした生活をしていて、この春、受験のために日本に帰ってきたという。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been traveling around the world, and this spring returned to Japan to study for exams.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been traveling around the world, and this spring returned to Japan to study for exams.

MESSAGE.JP: 祖母さんが日本人で、親日家のお祖父さんがクドに日本の専門教育を受けることを勧めたと言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Her Japanese grandmother and Japanophile grandfather suggested that she pursue higher education in Japan.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her Japanese grandmother and Japanophile grandfather suggested that she pursue higher education in Japan.

MESSAGE.JP: 初からそういう方針だったのか、ずっと日本語で家庭教師や通信制の教育を（日本式のテキストで）受けたせいで、ナリとは全然違う風に育ってしまったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Because that was the plan all along, she'd been taught Japanese from her childhood (through Japanese textbooks).
MESSAGE.Translation: Because that was the plan all along, she'd been taught Japanese from her childhood (through Japanese textbooks).

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まぁ宿題はおいといて。というか宿題なんだっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, the homework. Actually, what was it even about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, the homework. Actually, what was it even about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「校歌を英訳する宿題でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Translate the school hymn into English.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Translate the school hymn into English.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか。あとで恭介にでも教えてもらおう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? I'll have Kyousuke help me later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? I'll have Kyousuke help me later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は問題を先送りすることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to put the homework off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to put the homework off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでこの荷物はどこから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where did you receive this baggage from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where did you receive this baggage from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おじい様がわたしの服を送ってくれたので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandfather sent me my clothes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandfather sent me my clothes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、おじい様は今フィンランドに居るそうですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, my grandfather is in Finland now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, my grandfather is in Finland now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ国際便なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He must have used international mail then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He must have used international mail then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: く見たら『Fodex』という海外輸送業者のシールがはっつけてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon closer examination, there was the sticker of a foreign logistics company on it: ❛Fodex❜, it read.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon closer examination, there was the sticker of a foreign logistics company on it: ❛Fodex❜, it read.

MESSAGE.JP: うか、国際便だから別のトラックだったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I see, since it's international mail, maybe it wasn't the same delivery truck as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see, since it's international mail, maybe it wasn't the same delivery truck as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは多分到着を駐車場で待っていたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She had probably been waiting for its arrival in the parking lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had probably been waiting for its arrival in the parking lot.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも箱は何故ケロケロ便？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But why is the box from Froggy mail?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But why is the box from Froggy mail?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おじい様が好きらしいです。箱をわざわざ取り寄せてるらしいですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It seems like my grandfather likes it. He deliberately arranged it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It seems like my grandfather likes it. He deliberately arranged it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 伝ってあげたいと思ったが、僕は今、それどころではない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I could help her, but there was business to take care of first.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I could help her, but there was business to take care of first.

MESSAGE.JP: いの場に身を置いてるのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm in the middle of a battle.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm in the middle of a battle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、その…気をつけてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, um... Take care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, um... Take care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はその場を離れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked off.

MESSAGE.JP: こだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Where?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where?

MESSAGE.JP: どこだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Where could she be?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where could she be?

MESSAGE.JP: は慎重に校内を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I was carefully moving around the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was carefully moving around the school.

MESSAGE.JP: を曲がる時は、まず先を覗き見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Before turning the corner, I'd check what was beyond.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before turning the corner, I'd check what was beyond.

MESSAGE.JP: に精神を研ぎ澄ます…
MESSAGE.EN: I stayed focused all the time...
MESSAGE.Translation: I stayed focused all the time...

MESSAGE.JP: れは驚くほど疲れる行為だった。
MESSAGE.EN: This wore me out more than I expected.
MESSAGE.Translation: This wore me out more than I expected.

MESSAGE.JP: が痛くなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a headache.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a headache.

MESSAGE.JP: も気を抜けば、一発アウト。即死だってあり得る。
MESSAGE.EN: But I could very well die the moment I let my guard down.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I could very well die the moment I let my guard down.

MESSAGE.JP: んな世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the kind of world I'm in.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the kind of world I'm in.

MESSAGE.JP: が沈もうとしている…。
MESSAGE.EN: The sun was setting...
MESSAGE.Translation: The sun was setting...

MESSAGE.JP: はこれまで以上の恐怖を覚えつつある。
MESSAGE.EN: A sense of dread came over me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sense of dread came over me.

MESSAGE.JP: って、これから長い夜が始まるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A long, long night is about to start.
MESSAGE.Translation: A long, long night is about to start.

MESSAGE.JP: り一面に闇が訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything turned dark at once.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything turned dark at once.

MESSAGE.JP: こは奴らのはびこる世界へと変わることを意味していた。
MESSAGE.EN: In this world of darkness, they could be creeping anywhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this world of darkness, they could be creeping anywhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 闇の執行部。
MESSAGE.EN: Darkness Executives...
MESSAGE.Translation: Darkness Executives...

MESSAGE.JP: 女は言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She told me before.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told me before.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@『あなたは後日、今夜にでもそうね、拉致されることでしょう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❛Soon, maybe even tonight for all I know, you're going to get kidnapped.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❛Soon, maybe even tonight for all I know, you're going to get kidnapped.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@『闇の執行部に』
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❛By Darkness Executives.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❛By Darkness Executives.❜

MESSAGE.JP: あんな不気味な奴らに、闇の中に引きずり込まれるというのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she saying I will be dragged away into the darkness by those eerie creatures...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she saying I will be dragged away into the darkness by those eerie creatures...?

MESSAGE.JP: あ…どうしよう？
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do...?

MESSAGE.JP: かりを…
MESSAGE.EN: Light...
MESSAGE.Translation: Light...

MESSAGE.JP: り一面が明るい場所に逃げないと…
MESSAGE.EN: I have to run to somewhere well-lit.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to run to somewhere well-lit.

MESSAGE.JP: しかない！
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm is my only option!
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm is my only option!

MESSAGE.JP: ど、走るな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Stop, don't run...
MESSAGE.Translation: Stop, don't run...

MESSAGE.JP: がパニックに陥ることすら、彼女は計算している。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not unthinkable she predicted I'd fall into panic.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not unthinkable she predicted I'd fall into panic.

MESSAGE.JP: こで冷静でいれなければ、三度目の偶然は起こらず、僕は死にいたる。
MESSAGE.EN: I need to keep a cool head. I'm not going to be saved by a miracle for the third time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I need to keep a cool head. I'm not going to be saved by a miracle for the third time.

MESSAGE.JP: 上げると屋上に人影がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked above and there was a dark silhouette on the roof.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked above and there was a dark silhouette on the roof.

MESSAGE.JP: 張感と恐怖で跳ね上がっている心音を押し殺して、体育館から裏庭へと逃げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Ignoring my heart which was beating with nervousness and fear, I ran from the gym to the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ignoring my heart which was beating with nervousness and fear, I ran from the gym to the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: とは離れるけど、今はしかたない…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is taking me further from the dorm, but I have no choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is taking me further from the dorm, but I have no choice.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭には誰もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no one in the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no one in the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: さしの下に隠れる。頭上から何かが襲ってきても何とかなるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Hiding under the eaves will allow me to stay relatively safe should someone attack me from above.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hiding under the eaves will allow me to stay relatively safe should someone attack me from above.

MESSAGE.JP: 陰に近づきつつ背後に意識を向けながら移動する。
MESSAGE.EN: I was making my way anticipating a threat coming from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was making my way anticipating a threat coming from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 静に考ると、相手が銃を使うことはない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not likely she will use a gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not likely she will use a gun.

MESSAGE.JP: を自殺に見せかけて殺すのなら、証拠が残ってしまう銃はもっとも可能性が低い。
MESSAGE.EN: Supposing her goal is to make my murder look like a suicide, she's not going to leave behind any evidence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Supposing her goal is to make my murder look like a suicide, she's not going to leave behind any evidence.

MESSAGE.JP: げている僕を見て裏庭に来るなら、距離を取って逃げながら対応すればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: And if she comes to the backyard after seeing me run away, I can still escape if I stay away from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And if she comes to the backyard after seeing me run away, I can still escape if I stay away from her.

MESSAGE.JP: れに、このまま夜まで何もないこともありえない。
MESSAGE.EN: One way or another, something will happen before the night falls.
MESSAGE.Translation: One way or another, something will happen before the night falls.

MESSAGE.JP: に今夜闇に引きずり込まれてしまい僕が喋ってしまえば、彼女は窮地に追い込まれるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In the event that I get dragged away into the darkness now, she's the one in danger when I spill the beans.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the event that I get dragged away into the darkness now, she's the one in danger when I spill the beans.

MESSAGE.JP: 拗な攻撃がそれを暗に教えてくれている。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't be relentlessly attacking me otherwise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't be relentlessly attacking me otherwise.

MESSAGE.JP: から、今は我慢比べをしていればいい…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just a matter of who gives in first...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just a matter of who gives in first...

MESSAGE.JP: りじりとした時間だけが過ぎていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Time was slowly passing by.
MESSAGE.Translation: Time was slowly passing by.

MESSAGE.JP: の読みが外れて諦めたのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was I wrong? Did she give up?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I wrong? Did she give up?

MESSAGE.JP: 吸は戻ったが、緊張を強いられているためか脈は速いままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My breathing went back to normal, but my pulse was still racing with fear.
MESSAGE.Translation: My breathing went back to normal, but my pulse was still racing with fear.

MESSAGE.JP: のど渇いたな。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel thirsty...
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel thirsty...

MESSAGE.JP: 門からは外れているから、この時間は誰かがやってくることも少なく、辺りは閑散としている。
MESSAGE.EN: By this time, school is already closed, so it's not often that someone comes out here this late at night.
MESSAGE.Translation: By this time, school is already closed, so it's not often that someone comes out here this late at night.

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ寮に戻ってもいいんじゃないかな…？
MESSAGE.EN: Is it okay to go back to the dorm...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it okay to go back to the dorm...?

MESSAGE.JP: さく鈍い音が背後から響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a quiet thump coming from somewhere behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a quiet thump coming from somewhere behind.

MESSAGE.JP: は転がるように見通しのよい場所へと逃げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I scurried off to an open location.
MESSAGE.Translation: I scurried off to an open location.

MESSAGE.JP: 上げると、向こう側にある電柱が軋んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Power poles on the other side were making a screeching sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Power poles on the other side were making a screeching sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…えぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: っくりと電柱が倒れていく。
MESSAGE.EN: One by one, they started tumbling down.
MESSAGE.Translation: One by one, they started tumbling down.

MESSAGE.JP: が、方向が違うので僕はただ呆然と見ているだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They did so in the opposite direction from me, so I could only watch the incident in disbelief.
MESSAGE.Translation: They did so in the opposite direction from me, so I could only watch the incident in disbelief.

MESSAGE.JP: 鳴りのような倒壊音が響き渡ると…
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a sound like the one produced by ground vibrations.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a sound like the one produced by ground vibrations.

MESSAGE.JP: な予感に、慌てて体を伏せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a bad premonition and ducked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a bad premonition and ducked.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎ払うように黒い鞭状の線が僕に襲い掛かった！
MESSAGE.EN: Before I knew it, a high-voltage cable came sweeping down on me like a whip.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I knew it, a high-voltage cable came sweeping down on me like a whip.

MESSAGE.JP: 線がショートしながら、僕を包み込む。
MESSAGE.EN: It fell all the way around me, causing a short circuit.
MESSAGE.Translation: It fell all the way around me, causing a short circuit.

MESSAGE.JP: いはこれかっ！
MESSAGE.EN: So that was her plan!
MESSAGE.Translation: So that was her plan!

MESSAGE.JP: ういう操作をしてるのか分からないが、電線が束になって僕を襲ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no idea how she controlled the cables, but they actually assaulted me at once.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no idea how she controlled the cables, but they actually assaulted me at once.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: うじて避けるも、バウンドした電線は更に絡まり、全く予測できない動きへと変化した。
MESSAGE.EN: I barely managed to avoid the attack, but they coiled closer around me after rebounding.
MESSAGE.Translation: I barely managed to avoid the attack, but they coiled closer around me after rebounding.

MESSAGE.JP: れて剥き出しの電線が目の前から迫る。
MESSAGE.EN: An exposed cable was drawing in on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: An exposed cable was drawing in on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here goes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here goes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: けなしの気合で、金属バットで打ち込むと、支点となって方向が変わった。
MESSAGE.EN: I mustered whatever energy I had left and struck on the cable with my metal bat changing its course.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mustered whatever energy I had left and struck on the cable with my metal bat changing its course.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っさに転がって避ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I immediately dropped down to the ground...
MESSAGE.Translation: I immediately dropped down to the ground...

MESSAGE.JP: うく切れた電線に触れるところだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...avoiding the bare part of the cable in the nick of the time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...avoiding the bare part of the cable in the nick of the time.

MESSAGE.JP: 制を立て直そうとしたら次の電線が横殴りに迫ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was about to regain my balance, another cable came from the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was about to regain my balance, another cable came from the side.

MESSAGE.JP: んっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Clang!
MESSAGE.Translation: Clang!

MESSAGE.JP: ットでまたなんとかしのぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: I used my bat to fight it back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I used my bat to fight it back.

MESSAGE.JP: のままじゃまずいっ…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is bad...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is bad...

MESSAGE.JP: けるために物陰へ隠れたが…
MESSAGE.EN: I took cover behind an object.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took cover behind an object.

MESSAGE.JP: しっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Scrape*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scrape*.

MESSAGE.JP: く触れた腕に火箸を押し付けたような痛みと痺れが走った。
MESSAGE.EN: A light touch on my arm caused a burning sensation.
MESSAGE.Translation: A light touch on my arm caused a burning sensation.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ugh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ugh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: てて離れると切れた電線が物置に接し、通電しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly stepped aside after seeing that pieces of cable were conducting electricity through the storeroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly stepped aside after seeing that pieces of cable were conducting electricity through the storeroom.

MESSAGE.JP: りを見ると、そこかしこに切れた電線が蛇のようにとぐろを巻いている。
MESSAGE.EN: All around me were cable pieces swarming like a bunch of snakes.
MESSAGE.Translation: All around me were cable pieces swarming like a bunch of snakes.

MESSAGE.JP: も、もう動くものはなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: But all of them were still.
MESSAGE.Translation: But all of them were still.

MESSAGE.JP: く逃げなきゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Better run away...
MESSAGE.Translation: Better run away...

MESSAGE.JP: 視界の端に何かが飛んできた！
MESSAGE.EN: From the corner of my eye, I saw something flying my way from the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the corner of my eye, I saw something flying my way from the side.

MESSAGE.JP: いよくバットを振り回したが、当たらず…
MESSAGE.EN: I swung my bat with all my might but missed the projectile...
MESSAGE.Translation: I swung my bat with all my might but missed the projectile...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: のまま破裂して、体中が冷たい感覚に襲われた。
MESSAGE.EN: The thing exploded and a cold sensation washed over my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thing exploded and a cold sensation washed over my body.

MESSAGE.JP: んだこれはっ！
MESSAGE.EN: What the heck is going on!
MESSAGE.Translation: What the heck is going on!

MESSAGE.JP: 陰から、いくつもの丸いものが僕目掛けて投げ込まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Something round was flung at me from the shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something round was flung at me from the shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 水風船か！
MESSAGE.EN: A water balloon!
MESSAGE.Translation: A water balloon!

MESSAGE.JP: かも、顔に掛かった水からは若干の塩辛さまで感じていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Moreover, I could taste salt in the water that had gotten into my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Moreover, I could taste salt in the water that had gotten into my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: に濡れれば通電しやすくなる上に、塩水なら効果倍増…。
MESSAGE.EN: Water improves electrical conductivity, and salt water especially so.
MESSAGE.Translation: Water improves electrical conductivity, and salt water especially so.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の念の入れようには、感心すらしてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost felt respect for her thoroughness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost felt respect for her thoroughness.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃ、ぱしゃ、と破裂音を残し、周囲が水たまりを作る。
MESSAGE.EN: A bunch of water balloons exploded, leaving behind puddles of water all over.
MESSAGE.Translation: A bunch of water balloons exploded, leaving behind puddles of water all over.

MESSAGE.JP: のままでは逃げ場がなくなってしまう…。
MESSAGE.EN: At this rate, I wouldn't have anywhere to run...
MESSAGE.Translation: At this rate, I wouldn't have anywhere to run...

MESSAGE.JP: えろ…冷静になるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Calm down and think...
MESSAGE.Translation: Calm down and think...

MESSAGE.JP: 気を止めるには…。
MESSAGE.EN: How to stop the electricity...
MESSAGE.Translation: How to stop the electricity...

MESSAGE.JP: と、視界に倒れた電柱が目に入り、ある方法を思いつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly my eyes caught a glimpse of the fallen pole and this sparked an idea in my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly my eyes caught a glimpse of the fallen pole and this sparked an idea in my head.

MESSAGE.JP: はこれくらいしか思いつかない…。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the best I could think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the best I could think of...

MESSAGE.JP: きるかどうかわからないけど、もうやるしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know if it'd work out, but what else could I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know if it'd work out, but what else could I do?

MESSAGE.JP: は手に持った金属バットを大きく振りかぶった。
MESSAGE.EN: I lifted my bat high.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lifted my bat high.

MESSAGE.JP: うのは、倒れた電柱の先にある変圧器から伸びるケーブル。
MESSAGE.EN: My aim was the cable coming from the transformer.
MESSAGE.Translation: My aim was the cable coming from the transformer.

MESSAGE.JP: れさえ壊れれば…。
MESSAGE.EN: If only I could smash that thing...
MESSAGE.Translation: If only I could smash that thing...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いけぇーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Take thaat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Take thaat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と唸りを上げて回りながら向かっていく金属バット。
MESSAGE.EN: With a cry, I swung my bat down.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a cry, I swung my bat down.

MESSAGE.JP: 撃ともの凄い音を立てて、静かになった。
MESSAGE.EN: A huge noise of collision followed by complete silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: A huge noise of collision followed by complete silence.

MESSAGE.JP: れで大丈夫なはず。
MESSAGE.EN: This should do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: This should do it.

MESSAGE.JP: は覚悟を決めて走りだした。
MESSAGE.EN: After making up my mind, I started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: After making up my mind, I started running.

MESSAGE.JP: 気は流れていない！
MESSAGE.EN: The electricity had stopped!
MESSAGE.Translation: The electricity had stopped!

MESSAGE.JP: のまま転がるように、僕は寮に向かって逃げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept running as fast as I could all the way to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept running as fast as I could all the way to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「理樹くん。あなた、面白いわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Riki-kun. You're an interesting one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Riki-kun. You're an interesting one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う彼女は僕に向け言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said to me.

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: In my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋を間違えたかと一瞬思ったが、筋トレグッズが山のように積まれた部屋などここ以外にない。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost thought I got the wrong room, but there could be no other room filled with all sorts of training equipment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost thought I got the wrong room, but there could be no other room filled with all sorts of training equipment.

MESSAGE.JP: はドアを閉めて、また逃げ出すか迷った。
MESSAGE.EN: I shut the door and contemplated whether to run away again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shut the door and contemplated whether to run away again.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「安心して。もうあたしはあなたを殺さないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't worry. I won't try to kill you anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't worry. I won't try to kill you anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それすら本当かどうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I really believe that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I really believe that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は怪しく思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't feel I could trust her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't feel I could trust her.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたは三度、あたしの罠をかいくぐり、生き抜いてみせた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Three times you fell into my traps but prevailed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Three times you fell into my traps but prevailed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「二回は偶然友達に助けられてだけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Twice I was lucky enough to be saved by my friends...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Twice I was lucky enough to be saved by my friends...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「偶然であっても、それもあなたの力だと思うわ。そういう星のもとに生まれてきたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It could have been luck, but I believe that is part of your strength, too. You were born under a lucky star.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It could have been luck, but I believe that is part of your strength, too. You were born under a lucky star.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたはきっと、なかなか死なないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You won't be dying any time soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You won't be dying any time soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもこんなことが毎日続けば数日のうちに死ぬよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If this keeps up, one of these days I will...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If this keeps up, one of these days I will...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「ちなみにあたしは一度しくじっても、二度目をしくじることはなかったわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Just for the record, I have failed in the past, but never twice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Just for the record, I have failed in the past, but never twice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はぞっとする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I shuddered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shuddered.

MESSAGE.JP: の人は…これまでも人を殺してきたというのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Does she mean she has killed someone before...
MESSAGE.Translation: Does she mean she has killed someone before...

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「けど、奴らから逃げ切るのは難しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But getting away from THEM is difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But getting away from THEM is difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「彼らはあなたたちには見えない。闇に紛れているから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They dwell in the shadows, hidden from the eyes of ordinary people like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They dwell in the shadows, hidden from the eyes of ordinary people like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「でもね、あたしにだけは見える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But I... I can see them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But I... I can see them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「彼らを出し抜くことができるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I have the upper hand over them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I have the upper hand over them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何が言いたいんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you getting at?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you getting at?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「手を組まない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Will you join hands with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Will you join hands with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女はにやりと笑ってみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: She said with a grin on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said with a grin on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きみに殺されかけた僕に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With you who tried to kill me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With you who tried to kill me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「死ななかったじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But you didn't die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But you didn't die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「結果的にはね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was lucky to survive...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was lucky to survive...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「パートナーが欲しかったのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I have been looking for a partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I have been looking for a partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んて都合のいい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Does she only think of herself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Does she only think of herself...

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「交渉決裂なら、あなたは今夜、奴らに捕らわれる。それでもいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you turn my offer down, they will abduct you tonight. Are you okay with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you turn my offer down, they will abduct you tonight. Are you okay with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「逃げてみせるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I will run away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I will run away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「電気も消さずに眠るつもり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Are you going to sleep with the lights on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Are you going to sleep with the lights on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気を消すと、すぐさま捕まりそうな言い方だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she saying I will get kidnapped when I turn the lights off?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she saying I will get kidnapped when I turn the lights off?

MESSAGE.JP: さはかだったかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Was I too naive?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I too naive?

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「…どうするの？　あなたひとりでは逃げ切れないと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well, what will you do? I doubt you can get away from them by yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well, what will you do? I doubt you can get away from them by yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「逃げきってみせる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just you wait. I will get away from them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just you wait. I will get away from them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そう…案外固い頭してるのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I see... You're quite stubborn, aren't you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I see... You're quite stubborn, aren't you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「じゃあ、おいとまするわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Okay, I shall take my leave then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Okay, I shall take my leave then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 時にすっと、銃を抜いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time pulling out a gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time pulling out a gun.

MESSAGE.JP: ん！
MESSAGE.EN: Bang!
MESSAGE.Translation: Bang!

MESSAGE.JP: く僕にも構わず、彼女は机の下に向けて発砲していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite my bewilderment, she pointed the gun under my desk and shot once.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite my bewilderment, she pointed the gun under my desk and shot once.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: る恐る訊いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「なにって、闇の執行部」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What, you ask, Darkness Executives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What, you ask, Darkness Executives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええぇ、そこに今居たの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What, they were there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What, they were there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「ええ。理樹くんをマークしてたのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Indeed. They have been following you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Indeed. They have been following you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「これで、あたしの顔は割れちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Now they've seen my face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Now they've seen my face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「安心なさい。これであなたが狙われることはほぼなくなったわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't worry. They have almost no reason to target you now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't worry. They have almost no reason to target you now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほぼ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Almost...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Almost...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「夜の校舎に二度と来なければ、完全といっていいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you keep away from the school at night, you should be perfectly fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you keep away from the school at night, you should be perfectly fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそれでようやく安心することができた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could finally feel at ease.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could finally feel at ease.

MESSAGE.JP: も、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Something still bothered me though.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something still bothered me though.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きみは戦い続けるんだね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will you keep fighting them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will you keep fighting them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あたしにも二度と関わらないことね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't ever get involved with me again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't ever get involved with me again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言い残して、彼女は部屋を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and left my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and left my room.

MESSAGE.JP: はしばらくぼうっとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood dumbfounded for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood dumbfounded for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: を三度も狙われた一日を思い返していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking of how my life was in danger three times in one day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking of how my life was in danger three times in one day.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢のような日だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like a nightmare.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like a nightmare.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の言葉を信じるなら…これでようやく休める。
MESSAGE.EN: If what she said is true, I can finally rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: If what she said is true, I can finally rest...

MESSAGE.JP: はベッドまで辿りつくと、すぐさま眠りに落ちたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I retreated to the bed and soon fell to sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I retreated to the bed and soon fell to sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: は思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Thoughts were racing through my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thoughts were racing through my head.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ…奴らは僕の出方によっては鈴をも人質にとると言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, didn't they threaten to take Rin hostage if I did anything funny?
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, didn't they threaten to take Rin hostage if I did anything funny?

MESSAGE.JP: うだ…奴らは恭介が動けば鈴をも人質にとると脅している…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, didn't they threaten to take Rin hostage if Kyousuke took action?
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, didn't they threaten to take Rin hostage if Kyousuke took action?

MESSAGE.JP: 方目の前では、朱鷺戸という女生徒が僕に協力要請をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, there was this girl, Tokido, asking for my assistance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, there was this girl, Tokido, asking for my assistance.

MESSAGE.JP: れまでのことを考えなければ…手を組むべきだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking all of this into account... Wasn't it obvious I should join hands with her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking all of this into account... Wasn't it obvious I should join hands with her?

MESSAGE.JP: 体の知れない敵と渡り合うなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If I was to fight with the unidentified enemy?
MESSAGE.Translation: If I was to fight with the unidentified enemy?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は不服な声で頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I said grudgingly and nodded my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said grudgingly and nodded my head.

MESSAGE.JP: っと悪いのは、僕が夜の校舎に忍び込んだことなのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's my fault I sneaked into the school at night.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's my fault I sneaked into the school at night.

MESSAGE.JP: 分がまいた種と諦めるしかないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I brought this on myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brought this on myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「じゃ、よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I look forward to working with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I look forward to working with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは握手を交わした。
MESSAGE.EN: We shook hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: We shook hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それじゃあ、全部話してほしいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want you to tell me everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want you to tell me everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「なんのことを？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Tell what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Tell what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きみが何者か、闇の執行部は何者か、それぞれ目的はなんなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who you are, who Darkness Executives are, and what your respective goals are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who you are, who Darkness Executives are, and what your respective goals are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あたしは諜報員、いわばスパイよ。どこの機関所属かは訊かないでくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'm a secret agent, a spy if you will. I hope you're not going to ask me who I'm affiliated with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'm a secret agent, a spy if you will. I hope you're not going to ask me who I'm affiliated with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「目的だけ話してくれればいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm only interested in your goal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm only interested in your goal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「助かるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「目的はこの学園に隠された秘宝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'm after a hidden treasure that's somewhere in this school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'm after a hidden treasure that's somewhere in this school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「秘宝？　この学校に埋蔵金でも眠ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hidden treasure? Is there a chest of gold buried somewhere in this school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hidden treasure? Is there a chest of gold buried somewhere in this school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そんな単純な金銀ではない、革命的な何か、よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Not something boring like gold. Rather, it's something revolutionary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Not something boring like gold. Rather, it's something revolutionary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それを探して、夜の校舎を歩いていたんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, you were roaming the school at night looking for that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, you were roaming the school at night looking for that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そう。地下にあるはずなんだけど、その入り口すら見つけられなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Right. It should be somewhere underground, but I can't even find the entrance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Right. It should be somewhere underground, but I can't even find the entrance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだか漫画みたいな話だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Sounds like fiction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sounds like fiction.

MESSAGE.JP: 当に目の前の子はスパイで、この学校の地下には秘宝が眠ってるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she really a spy, and is there a treasure lying somewhere under the school...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she really a spy, and is there a treasure lying somewhere under the school...?

MESSAGE.JP: わかには信じがたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a hard time believing her story.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a hard time believing her story.

MESSAGE.JP: も、彼女は僕を殺そうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: But it is a fact that she attempted to kill me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it is a fact that she attempted to kill me.

MESSAGE.JP: 度も。本気で。
MESSAGE.EN: She was serious about it all three times.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was serious about it all three times.

MESSAGE.JP: ら、その言葉も本気なのだろう。少なくとも彼女の中では本当なのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meaning what she says should be true. At least to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meaning what she says should be true. At least to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「革命的な秘宝って具体的になんなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What exactly is this revolutionary treasure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What exactly is this revolutionary treasure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それはわかっていないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「ただ、革命的なものよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But it's something revolutionary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But it's something revolutionary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: She repeated.
MESSAGE.Translation: She repeated.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「でなければ、何人も世界からこんな学校に送り込まれてはこないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Otherwise they wouldn't be sending all these people to this school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Otherwise they wouldn't be sending all these people to this school.❞

MESSAGE.EN: What?
MESSAGE.Translation: What?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何人も？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There are others?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There are others?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そうよ。あたしが確認してるだけでも、四人はいるわ。全員、あたしと同じく生徒になりすましている。いろんな機関から、送り込まれたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝There are at least four others that I'm aware of. Posing themselves as students, like me. Dispatched by various agencies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝There are at least four others that I'm aware of. Posing themselves as students, like me. Dispatched by various agencies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すます話の信憑性が失われていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Things just got even more implausible.
MESSAGE.Translation: Things just got even more implausible.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、他の人たちのことはいいや。次は闇の執行部について」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Enough about others. Tell me more about the Darkness Executives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Enough about others. Tell me more about the Darkness Executives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「彼らはこの学園の秩序を守るものよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They are responsible for order in this school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They are responsible for order in this school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「何か問題が起きたら、人知れず、彼らが問題ごとなかったことにするの。手段は選ばずに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝When a problem arises, they quietly make it look as though it never happened. Using whatever means it takes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝When a problem arises, they quietly make it look as though it never happened. Using whatever means it takes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「彼らは隠された秘宝も人知れず守る、ということ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you implying they secretly protect the hidden treasure as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you implying they secretly protect the hidden treasure as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そういうこと。だから対立関係ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Exactly. That's why we're enemies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Exactly. That's why we're enemies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「彼らは…その、人間なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are they, er... human?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are they, er... human?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「影よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They're shadows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They're shadows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは人ではないって意味？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So they are not human?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So they are not human?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「本体が別に存在するのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Their actual bodies are elsewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Their actual bodies are elsewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「彼らは一応この学園の生徒、あるいはＯＢと言われてるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They're said to be either students or alumni of this school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They're said to be either students or alumni of this school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あ、ちなみにね、驚かないで欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Oh, I hope this doesn't surprise you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Oh, I hope this doesn't surprise you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そこ、机の下の影に居るわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝There's a shadow under your desk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝There's a shadow under your desk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？　とその方を振り返ると…
MESSAGE.EN: Huh? I thought and when I turned back...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh? I thought and when I turned back...

MESSAGE.JP: の頭のような影が床から這い出ていた！
MESSAGE.EN: A shadow shaped like a human head crept out of the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: A shadow shaped like a human head crept out of the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわあぁぁぁぁっ…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wooah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wooah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「どいてなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んっ！　と朱鷺戸さんが、銃を撃っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She fired her gun once.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fired her gun once.

MESSAGE.JP: はその銃弾を喰らい、霧が晴れるように消えてなくなった。すべてが一瞬の出来事だった。
MESSAGE.EN: A bullet hit the shadow and it dispersed like mist. Everything was over in a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: A bullet hit the shadow and it dispersed like mist. Everything was over in a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あんなところにどうやって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did it get in a place like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did it get in a place like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「全身でなくても、影は飛ばせるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝When they form shadows, it doesn't have to be an entire body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝When they form shadows, it doesn't have to be an entire body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「でも全身でなければ力を持たないから、監視ね。連れ去られるようなことはないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If it's only part of the body, it's powerless and can only be used for surveillance. It can't abduct a person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If it's only part of the body, it's powerless and can only be used for surveillance. It can't abduct a person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「人間業じゃないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is simply supernatural...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is simply supernatural...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなただって、三回もあたしの罠から逃れたじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But you managed to escape from my traps three times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But you managed to escape from my traps three times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それも人間業じゃない。似たようなもんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Isn't that plenty supernatural as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Isn't that plenty supernatural as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぜんぜん違うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's a different story...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's a different story...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「話は以上でいいかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Is that it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Is that it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鷺戸さんが銃を抜くアクシデントがあったものの、大体のことは把握できた。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite the incident with the gun, I more or less got the gist of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite the incident with the gun, I more or less got the gist of it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありえない小さな影から話しかけられたんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I had a conversation with an impossibly small shadow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I had a conversation with an impossibly small shadow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「なんだ、接触してたのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝So they already made contact with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝So they already made contact with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あんな狭い影にどうやって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did it get inside that tiny shadow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did it get inside that tiny shadow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「全身でなくても、影は飛ばせるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝When they form shadows, it doesn't have to be an entire body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝When they form shadows, it doesn't have to be an entire body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「でも全身でなければ力を持たないから、監視か牽制ね。連れ去られるようなことはないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If it's only part of the body, it's powerless and can only be used for surveillance. It can't abduct a person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If it's only part of the body, it's powerless and can only be used for surveillance. It can't abduct a person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「人間業じゃないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is simply supernatural...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is simply supernatural...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなただって、三回もあたしの罠から逃れたじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But you managed to escape from my traps three times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But you managed to escape from my traps three times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女が髪をなびかせたので、ふわりといい匂いがする。
MESSAGE.EN: She tossed her hair back, leaving a pleasant fragrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tossed her hair back, leaving a pleasant fragrance.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それも人間業じゃない。似たようなもんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Isn't that plenty supernatural as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Isn't that plenty supernatural as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぜんぜん違う気がするけどなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's remotely similar at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's remotely similar at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「で、その時はなんて言われたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What were you told?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What were you told?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きみのことを訊かれて…言わなかったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They asked me about you... I kept my lips sealed though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They asked me about you... I kept my lips sealed though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それと誰にもこのことは話すなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They told me to keep my mouth shut.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They told me to keep my mouth shut.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当は恭介に相談するのが一番だったんだけど、封じられた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wanted to ask Kyousuke for advice more than anything else, but I couldn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wanted to ask Kyousuke for advice more than anything else, but I couldn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「恭介？　誰それ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Kyousuke? Who's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Kyousuke? Who's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕の昔からの友達だよ。なんていうか、僕から見ると、スーパーマンみたいな、すごい人なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝An old friend of mine. How should I put it, to me he's like a superhuman, an incredible person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝An old friend of mine. How should I put it, to me he's like a superhuman, an incredible person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そりゃ頼もしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝No wonder you wanted his help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝No wonder you wanted his help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。だから、それを封じられたのは大きい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's why it was so bad that I couldn't get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's why it was so bad that I couldn't get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う、恭介さえ居てくれれば、敵なしなのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: There would be nothing to fear if only I could get Kyousuke on my side...
MESSAGE.Translation: There would be nothing to fear if only I could get Kyousuke on my side...

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「いいじゃない。言っちゃえば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Why don't you talk to him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Why don't you talk to him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それじゃ鈴がっ、恭介には妹がいてっ、その子が危険な目に遭うんだよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But then Rin, oh, she's Kyousuke's sister, she will be in danger!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But then Rin, oh, she's Kyousuke's sister, she will be in danger!❞

MESSAGE.JP: は思わず取り乱す。
MESSAGE.EN: I panicked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I panicked.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あー、なるほど、そういうこと。やな連中ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Oh, I see. What a despicable bunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Oh, I see. What a despicable bunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「じゃあ、あたしはその人と接触しない。これでいいわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Then I will avoid him. Is that good enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Then I will avoid him. Is that good enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 方になってしまえば、案外話がわかる人なんだ。少し安心した。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt happy that she turned out to be a reasonable person once we joined forces.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt happy that she turned out to be a reasonable person once we joined forces.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「以上でいいかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Is that it?❞
