MESSAGE.EN: I had a feeling that if I stayed for too long and was discovered by Rin, I'd get a taste of her kicks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a feeling that if I stayed for too long and was discovered by Rin, I'd get a taste of her kicks.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですか、じゃ、玄関までお見送りしますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really, then I'll walk you to the entrance hall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really, then I'll walk you to the entrance hall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さん、今日はどうもありがとうでした～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-san～, thank you very much for everything today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-san～, thank you very much for everything today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: り口前の階段を下りはじめた僕の背中に、クドの声が降ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice trailed after me as I descended the stairs in front of the entranceway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice trailed after me as I descended the stairs in front of the entranceway.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a little embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a little embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: 場の位置から女子寮の方を見ると、ぽつねん、とある階段の人影はまだ手を振っているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I reached the square and looked back at the girls' dorm, I could still see a human figure waving its hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I reached the square and looked back at the girls' dorm, I could still see a human figure waving its hand.

MESSAGE.JP: はやっぱり苦笑し、そういえば夕飯がまだだったな、とようやく思い出したのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I thought, I smiled wryly. I suddenly realized I still had some time before dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I thought, I smiled wryly. I suddenly realized I still had some time before dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: て、どうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do?

MESSAGE.JP: んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll take a nap...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll take a nap...

MESSAGE.JP: 食後、部屋に戻って真人と話をしていると…。
MESSAGE.EN: After dinner I was having a conversation with Masato in our room.
MESSAGE.Translation: After dinner I was having a conversation with Masato in our room.

MESSAGE.JP: 然、ばんっと音がしてドアが開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly the door flew open with a loud bang.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly the door flew open with a loud bang.

MESSAGE.JP: で蹴り開けたのだろう。両手にルーズリーフをテープで張り合わせた大きな紙を持った鈴が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Slamming the door open with her leg, Rin waltzed in, holding in both hands a great number of sheets taken from a loose-leaf binder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Slamming the door open with her leg, Rin waltzed in, holding in both hands a great number of sheets taken from a loose-leaf binder.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「できた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「掃除当番表」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Cleaning roster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Cleaning roster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へ？　どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえは馬鹿だから気づかないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're an idiot, so you haven't noticed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're an idiot, so you haven't noticed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だから、何がよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, noticed what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, noticed what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、教えてやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, tell him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, tell him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーと、流しやお風呂といった共用部分が汚いこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... that things like the bath and sinks which are in public use are getting dirty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... that things like the bath and sinks which are in public use are getting dirty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そりゃ、掃除当番を回してたんじゃなかったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Weren't we supposed to be taking turns cleaning them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Weren't we supposed to be taking turns cleaning them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえいつ掃除した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝When was the last time you cleaned it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝When was the last time you cleaned it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え…あー、あれはいつだったかなあ…去年の…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Err... when was it... Last year's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Err... when was it... Last year's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wa-ham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wa-ham*!

MESSAGE.JP: のハイキックが真人の後頭部に。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin high kicked him in the back of his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin high kicked him in the back of his head.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、つっこめ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, speak up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, speak up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは当番が完全に止まってるってことでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It means it's been completely abandoned then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It means it's been completely abandoned then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かが完成した！
MESSAGE.EN: That seemed to seal something!
MESSAGE.Translation: That seemed to seal something!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえらなんだよっ、コンビでも組んだのかよっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What kind of unholy union do you two have going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What kind of unholy union do you two have going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、だまれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, be quiet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, be quiet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「男子寮の？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The boys' dorm's?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The boys' dorm's?❞

MESSAGE.JP: く、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: しかして…それが新たにレノンから届けられた課題なんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be related to that task she received earlier?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be related to that task she received earlier?

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋はどうか知らないが、男子寮の共用部分は掃除当番が滞っていて、最近不衛生に感じ始めていたところだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know how it was in other rooms, but recently the bath area hadn't been cleaned properly, and it was starting to feel very unsanitary.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know how it was in other rooms, but recently the bath area hadn't been cleaned properly, and it was starting to feel very unsanitary.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「男子寮の？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The boys' dorm's?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The boys' dorm's?❞

MESSAGE.JP: く、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: んでまた…。
MESSAGE.EN: That again...
MESSAGE.Translation: That again...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、手のそれが掃除当番表？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, that's the cleaning roster in your hands?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, that's the cleaning roster in your hands?❞

MESSAGE.JP: りんと頷くと、それを床に広げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded and unfolded the roster on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded and unfolded the roster on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: そうじスケジュール』
MESSAGE.EN: [Cleaning schedule]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Cleaning schedule]

MESSAGE.JP: ５月１７日（木）：直枝理樹』
MESSAGE.EN: [May 17th, Thursday : Riki Naoe]
MESSAGE.Translation: [May 17th, Thursday : Riki Naoe]

MESSAGE.JP: ５月２４日（木）：井ノ原まさと』
MESSAGE.EN: [May 24th, Thursday : Masato Inohara]
MESSAGE.Translation: [May 24th, Thursday : Masato Inohara]

MESSAGE.JP: ５月さいご：けんご』
６月はじめ：きょーすけ』
MESSAGE.EN: [6/7 : K-suke]
MESSAGE.Translation: [6/7 : K-suke]

MESSAGE.JP: 次：りき』
MESSAGE.EN: [Next : Riki]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Next : Riki]

MESSAGE.JP: その次：まさと』
MESSAGE.EN: [After him : M-to]
MESSAGE.Translation: [After him : M-to]

MESSAGE.JP: 次：けんご』
MESSAGE.EN: [Next : K-go]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Next : K-go]

MESSAGE.JP: 次あいつ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Next : Him]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Next : Him]

MESSAGE.JP: 次もうかかんでもわかるだろ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Next : you probably get it by now]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Next : you probably get it by now]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「途中からあからさまにやる気をなくしてるんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She obviously lost interest halfway through...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She obviously lost interest halfway through...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーーーん…どこから突っ込んでいいものやら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm... I don't even know what to comment on first...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... I don't even know what to comment on first...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、不服なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's wrong, not satisfied?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's wrong, not satisfied?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あるいは、ふたりとも具合が悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Or, could it be you aren't feeling well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Or, could it be you aren't feeling well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、もちろん前者だけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, obviously it's the former...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, obviously it's the former...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、不服なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What, you're dissatisfied with something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What, you're dissatisfied with something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「当然だろ。なんでオレたちにだけ掃除させるんだよ。他にもいるだろーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Of course. Why are we the only ones to do the cleaning? There are other people too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Of course. Why are we the only ones to do the cleaning? There are other people too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「他の男子はあたし知らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't know other boys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't know other boys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんな理由で、オレたちだけなのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is that why we have to be the only ones...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is that why we have to be the only ones...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん。そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, exactly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, exactly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「これを知ったら、謙吾や恭介だって黙ってないぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kengo and Kyousuke won't just stay quiet when they learn about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kengo and Kyousuke won't just stay quiet when they learn about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is... that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is... that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーむ、と考え込む鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She sank into thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sank into thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やっぱり、これはないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So it's not going to work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So it's not going to work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, it's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, it's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が即答する。
MESSAGE.EN: He replied without hesitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: He replied without hesitation.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか、難しいものだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Really, that's difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Really, that's difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わかった。もういい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I got it. It's fine now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I got it. It's fine now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れをくるくると丸め棒状にして持って、何も言わずに部屋を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: She rolled the papers up into a scroll, and left the room without another word.
MESSAGE.Translation: She rolled the papers up into a scroll, and left the room without another word.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「無意味な突発性が恭介に似てきたな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That spontaneous action was just like what Kyousuke would normally do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That spontaneous action was just like what Kyousuke would normally do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、それは行動的になってるんだからいいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, at least she seems to be busy with something, isn't that good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, at least she seems to be busy with something, isn't that good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「振り回されることがなけりゃあな。よし、風呂いくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So long as we don't get involved in it. All right, let's go take a bath.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So long as we don't get involved in it. All right, let's go take a bath.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呂に入り終えると、がやがやとまた恭介たちが入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: After we returned from the bath, Kyousuke and Kengo came over.
MESSAGE.Translation: After we returned from the bath, Kyousuke and Kengo came over.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾も夜の部活後、すぐに恭介と合流してきたようだ（あるいはムリヤリ連れて来られたのかもしれない）。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently, Kengo had run into Kyousuke right after the night practice was over, and came along with him (or more likely, he was dragged here against his will).
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently, Kengo had run into Kyousuke right after the night practice was over, and came along with him (or more likely, he was dragged here against his will).

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、早速ミッションを再開するか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's restart the mission already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's restart the mission already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「少し待て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言い残して、部屋を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up with that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up with that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、これ見なよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, look at this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, look at this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は床に広げられた紙の端を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed the corner of the roster.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed the corner of the roster.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなにもわかりやすいようにと、大きい紙を作って、大きい文字で書いてきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She wrote everything on a large piece of paper in big letters, so that it would be easy for everyone to understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She wrote everything on a large piece of paper in big letters, so that it would be easy for everyone to understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ…途中からぐだぐだだけどな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah... She got bored halfway through though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah... She got bored halfway through though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ケットの携帯が震える。
MESSAGE.EN: The cellphone in my pocket vibrated.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cellphone in my pocket vibrated.

MESSAGE.JP: り出して、見てみると…
MESSAGE.EN: I took it out and checked the message.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took it out and checked the message.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしたらいい』
MESSAGE.EN: [What should I do?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [What should I do?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴から。
MESSAGE.EN: It was from Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was from Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: は返事を打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I typed an answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I typed an answer.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりで掃除するんじゃなく、その週のリーダーということにして、他の生徒にも手伝ってもらえば公平なんじゃない？』
MESSAGE.EN: [Instead of doing the cleaning alone, isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Instead of doing the cleaning alone, isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well?]

MESSAGE.JP: 信。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ？　え？　彼女から？　すげーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? What? Who's that from, a girlfriend? Awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? What? Who's that from, a girlfriend? Awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、なんも答えてないし…（すごい早とちりだっ）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not telling you... (he's so quick at jumping to conclusions!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not telling you... (he's so quick at jumping to conclusions!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちゃり。
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-swing*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-swing*.

MESSAGE.JP: びドアが開いて、鈴が入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again the door to our room flew open and Rin marched inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again the door to our room flew open and Rin marched inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なにやってたんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What were you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What were you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「話しかけるな…忘れる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't talk... I'll forget everything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't talk... I'll forget everything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　なにを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ひとりで掃除するんじゃなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Instead of doing the cleaning alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Instead of doing the cleaning alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そいつをリーダーにして他の生徒にも手伝ってもらえば公平なんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえ、なんか語尾ヘンだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The end of your sentence is kind of strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The end of your sentence is kind of strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ひとりで掃除するんじゃなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Instead of doing the cleaning alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Instead of doing the cleaning alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そいつをリーダーにして他の生徒にも手伝ってもらえば公平だろ、クズ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well, Waste!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well, Waste!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そいつをリーダーにして他の生徒にも手伝ってもらえば公平だろ、ボケ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well, moron!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Isn't it fairer to have everyone take the role of the leader for each week and organize other students to help as well, moron!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおぉぉぉーーっ、つっこまなければよかったあぁぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwooh, I shouldn't have spoken!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwooh, I shouldn't have spoken!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それよりさ、今の提案ならいいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Putting that aside, isn't this suggestion much more realistic?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Putting that aside, isn't this suggestion much more realistic?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三年は恭介に任せられるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll have a third year, Kyousuke, helping us too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll have a third year, Kyousuke, helping us too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もーどうだっていいよ、くそぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't care anymore, damn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't care anymore, damn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「貼ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll stick it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll stick it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　どこに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Where?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Where?❞

MESSAGE.JP: う鈴の姿はない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was already gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was already gone.

MESSAGE.JP: 人は僕と顔を見合わせて、さぁ？と手を開いてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Me and Masato exchanged glances, shrugging in puzzlement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Me and Masato exchanged glances, shrugging in puzzlement.

MESSAGE.JP: 風呂から戻ってくると…
MESSAGE.EN: Coming back from the bath...
MESSAGE.Translation: Coming back from the bath...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんで、こんなとこに貼ってあんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why did she stick it here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why did she stick it here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちの部屋のドアに例の当番表が貼られていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The roster was attached to our door.
MESSAGE.Translation: The roster was attached to our door.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶん、お風呂に入る前から貼られていたのだろう。気づかなかっただけで。
MESSAGE.EN: It probably was there already when we went to take the bath, but we didn't notice it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It probably was there already when we went to take the bath, but we didn't notice it.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まるでオレたちの部屋が、掃除する本部みたいになってるじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's like our room turned into a cleaning headquarters...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's like our room turned into a cleaning headquarters...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくすると、がやがやとまた恭介たちが入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Shortly after, Kyousuke and Kengo came over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shortly after, Kyousuke and Kengo came over.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾も夜の部活後、すぐに恭介と合流してきたようだ（あるいはムリヤリ連れて来られたのかもしれない）。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently, Kengo had run into Kyousuke right after the night practice was over, and came along with him (or more likely, he was dragged here against his will).
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently, Kengo had run into Kyousuke right after the night practice was over, and came along with him (or more likely, he was dragged here against his will).

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「この部屋、まるで掃除する本部みたいになってたぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's like this room's turned into a cleaning headquarters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's like this room's turned into a cleaning headquarters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「たぶん本部なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It probably has.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It probably has.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、早速ミッションを再開するか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's restart the mission already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's restart the mission already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こに自分の名前が書いてあることも気づいていないようだ（きっと後で文句を言うだろう）。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like he hadn't noticed his own name there (I'm sure there are going to be complaints later, though).
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like he hadn't noticed his own name there (I'm sure there are going to be complaints later, though).

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「再開ってまだ続けるの、あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you still going to continue with that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you still going to continue with that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴が可哀想だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you feel sorry for Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you feel sorry for Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、むしろ嬉々として無線機をつけているが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nay, she actually seemed quite happy putting on the earpiece.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nay, she actually seemed quite happy putting on the earpiece.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「スパイ大作戦みたいでなんか楽しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's kinda fun, it's like ❛Mission: Impossible.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's kinda fun, it's like ❛Mission: Impossible.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が楽しいならいいけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: But who am I to complain if she's enjoying it herself...
MESSAGE.Translation: But who am I to complain if she's enjoying it herself...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも知らない人と話すのはやだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I don't want to speak with people I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I don't want to speak with people I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そこは頑張ってもらわないと、これをやる意味がないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's no meaning in this, unless you give it your very best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's no meaning in this, unless you give it your very best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Mmh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Mmh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「頑張れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言って、送り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: He said and sent her forth.
MESSAGE.Translation: He said and sent her forth.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ミッション・スタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Mission Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Mission Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 造携帯を前に、鈴からの潜入報告を待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Standing around the modified cellphone, we were awaiting information on her infiltration progress.
MESSAGE.Translation: Standing around the modified cellphone, we were awaiting information on her infiltration progress.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『こちら鈴。女子寮に潜入成功、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[This is Rin. Girls' dorm infiltration successful, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[This is Rin. Girls' dorm infiltration successful, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、周りに誰か人はいるか？　オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good, is there anyone around you? Over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good, is there anyone around you? Over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『いない。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No. Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No. Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうでもいいけど、オーバーっていちいち言う必要もないんじゃなかったっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't mind, but wasn't it unnecessary to be saying ❛over❜ every time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't mind, but wasn't it unnecessary to be saying ❛over❜ every time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おっと、そうだったっけな。もう言うんじゃないぞ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, so it was. Rin, you can stop saying it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, so it was. Rin, you can stop saying it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『了解』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『で、どうすればいい。おー…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[So, what should I do. O-...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[So, what should I do. O-...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おーさだはる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Ou Sadaharu.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Ou Sadaharu.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、すごいごまかし方した！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, that's one hell of a way to trick us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, that's one hell of a way to trick us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『ふぅ…あぶなかった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Phew... that was close.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Phew... that was close.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『じつにあぶないところだった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[That was really close.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[That was really close.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「しかもごまかしきったつもりでいやがる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She even thinks she was successful at fooling us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She even thinks she was successful at fooling us...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「とりあえず誰か探すんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Shouldn't she go looking for someone first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Shouldn't she go looking for someone first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、とりあえず廊下を歩け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, start walking through the corridor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, start walking through the corridor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『任務了解。廊下を歩く』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mission accepted. Currently walking through the corridor.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mission accepted. Currently walking through the corridor.]

MESSAGE.JP: すごく静かだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was deathly quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was deathly quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ちなみに足音を隠しながら隠密行動をする必要はまったくないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Incidentally, there's absolutely no need to be taking covert action to conceal your footsteps.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Incidentally, there's absolutely no need to be taking covert action to conceal your footsteps.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なにぃ？　見えてるのか!?』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What? Can you see me!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What? Can you see me!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、まあ、それが楽しいんだからいいじゃねぇかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's fun, so why not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's fun, so why not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『いいんだな？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Is it fine?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Is it fine?]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『了解、おー…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger, o-...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger, o-...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おーさだはる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Ou Sadaharu.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Ou Sadaharu.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『またあぶないところだった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Another close call.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Another close call.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『ものすごいあぶなかった…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Like, really close.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Like, really close.]

MESSAGE.JP: う誰もツッコまない。
MESSAGE.EN: No one said anything about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one said anything about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『…前方からターゲット接近中』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...A target is drawing closer in front of me.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...A target is drawing closer in front of me.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーと、誰かわかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... Do you know who it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... Do you know who it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『知らない顔だな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I've never seen her before.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I've never seen her before.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「上級生か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A senior?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A senior?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『どうすればいい、接触まであと５秒』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What should I do, time until making contact with the target: five seconds!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What should I do, time until making contact with the target: five seconds!]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず『こんばんは』って挨拶しよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First of all, say ❛Good evening❜ to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First of all, say ❛Good evening❜ to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『こんばんは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Good evening.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Good evening.]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『はい、こんばんは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Yes, good evening.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Yes, good evening.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『目標をロスト』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Target lost.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Target lost.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『そのまま歩いていってしまった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[She simply passed by.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[She simply passed by.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、ダメダメじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's that, it's absolutely no good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's that, it's absolutely no good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なにぃ…言われた通りにしただろーがっ、そんなこと言われる筋合いないわっ、おー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What...? I've been doing as you were saying, you can't say this to me now, o-.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What...? I've been doing as you were saying, you can't say this to me now, o-.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おーさだはる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Ou Sadaharu.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Ou Sadaharu.]

MESSAGE.JP: 怒りが収まった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She calmed down.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She calmed down.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「とりあえず、次々に指示を出していくしかないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We can only guide her through each step she makes now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We can only guide her through each step she makes now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「追いかけていって『待ちたまえ美しいお嬢さん』と言うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Run after her and tell her ❛Please wait, beautiful maiden.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Run after her and tell her ❛Please wait, beautiful maiden.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『やじゃっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No way.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No way.]

MESSAGE.JP: 下された。
MESSAGE.EN: Rejected.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rejected.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なぜだ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『実はだな…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[To tell the truth...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[To tell the truth...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『クラスメイトだからだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[She's my classmate.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[She's my classmate.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それを早く言えよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Say this earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Say this earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『だから、そんなよくわからない言葉で追いたくない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[That's why I won't say something I'm not sure about to her.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[That's why I won't say something I'm not sure about to her.]

MESSAGE.JP: ぇ、と僕は感心する。今までならあまり深く考えずに行動していたところだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I gasped in amazement. She'd have done it without a second thought, before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gasped in amazement. She'd have done it without a second thought, before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちなみに誰だったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, who was it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, who was it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『西園…さん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Nishizono... san.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Nishizono... san.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃ、名前で呼び止めろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, call out her name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, call out her name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『今、角を折れて見えなくなった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[She's already turned the corner, I lost sight of her.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[She's already turned the corner, I lost sight of her.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まだ追いつく、走れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Run after her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Run after her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『ラジャ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger.]

MESSAGE.JP: ったったと、鈴が走る。
MESSAGE.EN: She dashed off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She dashed off.

MESSAGE.JP: 突にだんっ、と音がしてそれが途切れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The transmission was suddenly interrupted by a loud thump.
MESSAGE.Translation: The transmission was suddenly interrupted by a loud thump.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「誰かとぶつかったようだぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Seems like she bumped into someone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Seems like she bumped into someone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『しまった、大丈夫か、西園さん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Oops, are you okay, Nishizono-san?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Oops, are you okay, Nishizono-san?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『怪我はないか、西園さん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Are you hurt, Nishizono-san?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Are you hurt, Nishizono-san?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『あれ？　西園さんはどこだ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Huh? Where is she?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Huh? Where is she?]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『その人のことは心配できても…わたくしの心配はしないってどういうことかしら!?』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Worrying about her, yet ignoring me... what is it that you think you are doing!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Worrying about her, yet ignoring me... what is it that you think you are doing!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 手は笹瀬川さんだった！
MESSAGE.EN: It was Sasami Sasasegawa.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Sasami Sasasegawa.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『おまえたち、やっておしまいなさい！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『待ちたまえ美しいおじょーさん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Please wait, beautiful maiden.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Please wait, beautiful maiden.]

MESSAGE.JP: ってるし…。
MESSAGE.EN: She went and said it...
MESSAGE.Translation: She went and said it...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『…わたしですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[...You mean me?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[...You mean me?]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「次は『まあ、チャッピーが知らない人に懐くなんて…お名前を聞かせていただけませんか？』と続くのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How about going on with ❛My, it's unusual for Chappy to get attached to a stranger... Would you tell me your name?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How about going on with ❛My, it's unusual for Chappy to get attached to a stranger... Would you tell me your name?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それは古典の$K96少女漫画$K0だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's from an old $K96shoujo manga$K0...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's from an old $K96shoujo manga$K0...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『まあ、チャッピーが知らない人に懐くなんて…お名前を聞かせていただけませんか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[My, it's unusual for Chappy to get attached to a stranger... Would you tell me your name?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[My, it's unusual for Chappy to get attached to a stranger... Would you tell me your name?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、それただのこっちの会話だからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, we were just talking amongst ourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, we were just talking amongst ourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『…ちゃっぴー？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[...Chappy?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[...Chappy?]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『それは、昔の少女漫画でよく使われた展開ですね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[This is the kind of story development often used in old shoujo manga.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[This is the kind of story development often used in old shoujo manga.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『そうなのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Really?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Really?]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『ご存じじゃなかったんですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Didn't you know?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Didn't you know?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まずいよ、これじゃまた鈴がヘンな子に思われちゃうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is bad, she'll look like a weirdo again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is bad, she'll look like a weirdo again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだな、とりあえず演劇の練習でもしてたってことにしてしまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's see, pretend you were practicing for a play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's see, pretend you were practicing for a play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『え…演劇の練習らしいなっ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Eh... practicing for a play, it seems...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Eh... practicing for a play, it seems...]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『…わたしが、ですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[...You mean me?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[...You mean me?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『いや、あたし、がだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, me.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, me.]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『そうでしたか…棗さんは演劇部なんですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Is that so... Natsume-san, are you a member of the drama club?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Is that so... Natsume-san, are you a member of the drama club?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『違うが、そうらしい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'm not, but... seems I am.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'm not, but... seems I am.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（ん、向こうの人は鈴を知ってるのか）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Mm, that person knows Rin.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Mm, that person knows Rin.)

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『そうですか…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Is that so...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Is that so...]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『では、失礼します。また明日教室で』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Then, if you'll excuse me. See you tomorrow in class.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Then, if you'll excuse me. See you tomorrow in class.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「く…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「クラスメイトじゃないかよおぉぉーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't she your classmate!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't she your classmate!❞

MESSAGE.JP: より先に真人がツッコんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato beat me to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato beat me to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『…再び目標をロスト』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...Target lost again.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...Target lost again.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえな、クラスメイトだったろ、今の。顔見たことがあるだろ。知らない顔って嘘ついたろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey now, if she's a classmate of ours, you should say you know her instead of lying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey now, if she's a classmate of ours, you should say you know her instead of lying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんだ、ここは…暗いな…暗視カメラを…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What, it's... dark in here... I need nightvision...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What, it's... dark in here... I need nightvision...]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「こらこらこらこら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, hey, hey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, hey, hey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ま、それ以上は詮索しないでやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's not not pry any further.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's not not pry any further.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その代わり、次は指示なしで、ひとりで頑張ってみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In return, try your best to find another target without instruction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In return, try your best to find another target without instruction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『それはないな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It's not possible.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It's not possible.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「やれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんでじゃーっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Why do I have to!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Why do I have to!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうしてもやばくなったら、こっちからフォロー入れるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If things turn ugly, we'll provide support to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If things turn ugly, we'll provide support to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なにぃ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What...]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕も無理だと思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think it's possible either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think it's possible either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、今日始めたミッションじゃない。だいぶ慣れてきてるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's not like she just started on this mission today. She should be used to it for the most part already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's not like she just started on this mission today. She should be used to it for the most part already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「とりあえずやってみるんだ。経験を生かしてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Give it a try. Put into use what you've learned so far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Give it a try. Put into use what you've learned so far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『…やりたくないが、ラジャ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...I don't want to, but roger.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...I don't want to, but roger.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫かなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will she be okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will she be okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『あら…また棗さん？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[My... is it you again, Natsume-san?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[My... is it you again, Natsume-san?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「この声は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This voice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This voice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『さささささささみ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasamisasasasasa.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasamisasasasasa.]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『笹瀬川佐々美ですわっ！　いきなりケンカ売ってるんですのっ!?』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[It is Sasami Sasasegawa! Are you picking a fight with me!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[It is Sasami Sasasegawa! Are you picking a fight with me!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『そのつもりはない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I had no such intention.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I had no such intention.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これはフォローしてあげたほうがいいんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'd better provide that support now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'd better provide that support now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、敢えてやらせる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, leave it to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, leave it to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『経験を生かしているだけだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'm just trying to put into use what I've learned so far.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'm just trying to put into use what I've learned so far.]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『意味がわかりませんわ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[I have no idea what you're talking about...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[I have no idea what you're talking about...]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『まあ、今日はあなたの相手をしている暇はありませんの。どいてくださる？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Well, I don't have the luxury of being your opponent tonight. Would you please move aside?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Well, I don't have the luxury of being your opponent tonight. Would you please move aside?]

MESSAGE.JP: あ、とりあえず衝突は回避したみたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, looks like she could avoid the conflict at least...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, looks like she could avoid the conflict at least...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『待ちたまえ美しいおじょーさん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Please wait, beautiful maiden.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Please wait, beautiful maiden.]

MESSAGE.JP: が経験を生かし始めた!!
MESSAGE.EN: She started putting what she's learned into use!
MESSAGE.Translation: She started putting what she's learned into use!

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『美しい…？　あ、あら、わたくしかしら？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Beautiful...? My, are you talking about me?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Beautiful...? My, are you talking about me?]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『棗さんも少しは見る目が出てきたようね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Natsume-san, you actually have a somewhat sharp eye for this.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Natsume-san, you actually have a somewhat sharp eye for this.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『いや、ぜんぜんそうは思わんが』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, this isn't what I really think at all.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, this isn't what I really think at all.]

MESSAGE.JP: の意見が飛び出した!!
MESSAGE.EN: She spouted out her real opinion!
MESSAGE.Translation: She spouted out her real opinion!

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『なんですってっ!?』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[What was that!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[What was that!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『まあ、チャッピーが知らない人に懐くなんて』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[My, it's unusual for Chappy to get attached to a stranger...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[My, it's unusual for Chappy to get attached to a stranger...]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『あ、あまつさえこのわたくしをチャッピー呼ばわりするとは…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Not only that, you even dare call me Chappy?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Not only that, you even dare call me Chappy?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「経験、生かしすぎだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She overdid putting what she'd learned to use...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She overdid putting what she'd learned to use...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うフォローしようがない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even providing support now would do no good...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even providing support now would do no good...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『お名前を聞かせていただけませんか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Would you tell me your name?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Would you tell me your name?]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『さ・さ・せ・が・わ・さ・さ・みですわっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Sa-sa-mi Sa-sa-se-ga-wa!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Sa-sa-mi Sa-sa-se-ga-wa!]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『難しいな…チャッピーと呼んでもいいか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It's difficult... Can I call you Chappy?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It's difficult... Can I call you Chappy?]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『徹底的にケンカを売ってるんですわね…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You're really picking a fight with me...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You're really picking a fight with me...]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『おまえたち、やっておしまいなさい！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]

MESSAGE.JP: しっ！　ばしっ！　ばきっ！　どぐっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ、これまた戦ってませんか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, are they fighting again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, are they fighting again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然だ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Of course!
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないのにわたくしをこき下ろそうなんて百年早いですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. You're a hundred years too early to be thinking of challenging me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. You're a hundred years too early to be thinking of challenging me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『ミッションコンプリート』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、してないしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、戦利品だ。やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「本気になれば、よっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's just a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's just a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソフト部員@「さすがは、佐々美様っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝As expected from Sasami-sama!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝As expected from Sasami-sama!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソフト部員@「華麗でございましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Your fighting style is really elegant!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Your fighting style is really elegant!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: うして今夜も更けていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...
